analyzed: nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa nas mtshan ma med pa'i bar du de dag thigs pa tsam du 'du byed thams cad nye bar zhi bar rab tu shes pa ji lta bur thigs pa gcig la rnam pa brgyad po de dag gis ji lta ba bzhin du brtag go /
translated: He knows the pacification of all formations just as it is, and he knows the absence of formations just as it is.🔽He knows the absence of characteristics just as it is, and he knows the absence of signs just as it is.

original: de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / de bzhin du gsum pa nas nang gi lus kyi chu'i khams thams cad rnam pa brgyad po de dag gis so so re re la thigs pa phra ba ji lta ba bzhin du brtag go /
analyzed: de bzhin du gnyis pa dang / de bzhin du gsum pa nas nang gi lus kyi chu'i khams thams cad rnam pa brgyad po de dag gis so so re re la thigs pa phra ba ji lta ba bzhin du brtag go /
translated: He knows the pacification of all formations just as it is, and he knows the absence of formations just as it is.

original: mtshan nyid med pa nas mtshan ma med pa'i bar du nang gi chu'i khams ji lta ba de bzhin du phyi rol gyi chu'i khams che ba'am /🔽phra ba'am / dma' ba'am /🔽bde ba'am / gang ring ba'am /
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa nas mtshan ma med pa'i bar du nang gi chu'i khams ji lta ba de bzhin du phyi rol gyi chu'i khams che ba'am / phra ba'am / dma' ba'am / bde ba'am / gang ring ba'am /
translated: He knows the absence of characteristics just as it is, and he knows the absence of signs just as it is.🔽He knows the pacification of all formations just as it is, and he knows the absence of formations just as it is.🔽He knows the absence of characteristics just as it is, and he knows the absence of signs just as it is.

original: gang nye ba de dag thams cad zad pa'i chos su yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
analyzed: gang nye ba de dag thams cad zad pa'i chos su yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //

original: gang zad pa'i chos de'ang mi rtag pa'o //🔽de'ang rtog pa med pa'o //
analyzed: gang zad pa'i chos de'ang mi rtag pa'o // de'ang rtog pa med pa'o //
translated: That which is a dharma of exhaustion is impermanent.🔽That which is not conceptual is also suffering.

original: gang rtog pa med pa de'ang sdug bsngal ba'o //
analyzed: gang rtog pa med pa de'ang sdug bsngal ba'o //
translated: That which is not conceptual is also suffering.

original: gang 'byung ba med pa de'ang bdag med pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'byung ba med pa de'ang bdag med pa'o //
translated: That which is non-arising is also selfless.

original: @310b gang 'du byed thams cad kyi tshig gi lam dang bral ba de'ang stong pa ste /
analyzed: @310b gang 'du byed thams cad kyi tshig gi lam dang bral ba de'ang stong pa ste /
translated: That which is free from the path of words of all conditioned things is also empty.

original: ji ltar nang dang phyi rol gyi chu'i khams ji lta ba bzhin du stong par shes pa de ltar rab 'bring tha ma'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar nang dang phyi rol gyi chu'i khams ji lta ba bzhin du stong par shes pa de ltar rab 'bring tha ma'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Just as one understands the inner and outer water element to be empty, in the same way, the afflictions of the highest, middling, and lowest levels are pacified.

original: nam mkha' ji ltar gnas med cing spros pa med pa de bzhin du phyi dang nang gi chu'i khams kyang spros pa med cing gnas med pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bzod pa sgom par byed pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sems can yongs su smin pa nye bar 'tsho ba ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' ji ltar gnas med cing spros pa med pa de bzhin du phyi dang nang gi chu'i khams kyang spros pa med cing gnas med pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i bzod pa sgom par byed pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sems can yongs su smin pa nye bar 'tsho ba ste /
translated: This patience is also a bodhisattva’s nourishment for bringing sentient beings to full maturity.

original: sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams ji lta ba bzhin du me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams rgya chen pos bya'o //
analyzed: sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams ji lta ba bzhin du me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams rgya chen pos bya'o //
translated: Just as with the earth element and the water element, the fire element and the wind element should be understood in the same way.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: “Son of noble family,

original: gzhan yang 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gzugs ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gzugs ni /
translated: form, which is derived from the four great elements,

original: the tshom gyi rgyu lta bu ste /
analyzed: the tshom gyi rgyu lta bu ste /
translated: is like a cause for doubt.

original: nang gi'am / phyi rol gyi'am /🔽che ba'am / phra ba'am /
analyzed: nang gi'am / phyi rol gyi'am / che ba'am / phra ba'am /
translated: Whether it is internal or external,🔽whether it is gross or subtle,

original: dma' ba'am / bde ba'am /
analyzed: dma' ba'am / bde ba'am /
translated: whether it is low or high,

original: gang ring ba'am /
analyzed: gang ring ba'am /
translated: whether it is far or near,

original: gang nye ba de dag thams cad dngos po med cing gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / drug gi skye mched dbang du gyur pa /
analyzed: gang nye ba de dag thams cad dngos po med cing gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / drug gi skye mched dbang du gyur pa /
translated: All that is near is unreal, like a reflection, and is subject to the six sense-fields.

original: sa'i khams nas rnam par shes pa'i rgyu'i bar du'o //
analyzed: sa'i khams nas rnam par shes pa'i rgyu'i bar du'o //
translated: It is the element of earth up to the element of consciousness.🔽The extinction of that which arises and ceases moment by moment is the extinction of the sense-faculty.

original: gang skad cig skad cig tu 'byung ba zad pa'i chos nyid dbang po de la zad pa dang / 'gog pa de ni /🔽'byung ba zad pa nyid du brtag go /🔽dngos po med pa dang bdag med par dmigs pa /🔽tshig gi lam med pa dang / rnam par mi 'gro ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / bdag med pa dang / bdag gi med pa @311a *//
analyzed: gang skad cig skad cig tu 'byung ba zad pa'i chos nyid dbang po de la zad pa dang / 'gog pa de ni / 'byung ba zad pa nyid du brtag go / dngos po med pa dang bdag med par dmigs pa / tshig gi lam med pa dang / rnam par mi 'gro ba dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / bdag med pa dang / bdag gi med pa @311a *//
translated: That extinction should be investigated as the extinction of the elements.

original: mtshan nyid med pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / rnam pa dang bral ba dang / bdag med pa dang / smod kyi 'du byed dang bral ba dang / yi ge med pa dang / rgyu dang rkyen dang bral bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral ba dang / rnam pa dang bral ba dang / bdag med pa dang / smod kyi 'du byed dang bral ba dang / yi ge med pa dang / rgyu dang rkyen dang bral bar rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows that it is without characteristics, free from all afflictions, free from aspects, without a self, free from negative conditioning, without syllables, and free from causes and conditions.

original: dngos po med pa shin tu skad cig ma dang bral bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: dngos po med pa shin tu skad cig ma dang bral bar rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows that it is not a thing and is free from the momentary.

original: 'du byed thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / yul rgyun chad pa med par rab tu shes so //
analyzed: 'du byed thams cad mtshan ma med pa dang / yul rgyun chad pa med par rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows that all conditioning factors are without characteristics and are not interrupted in the field.

original: 'du byed thams cad gnas med cing nye bar zhi bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: 'du byed thams cad gnas med cing nye bar zhi bar rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows that all conditioning factors are without a basis and are completely pacified.

original: rnam pa 'di dag gis gzugs dngos po med pa dbu ba'i phung po ltar brtag go /
analyzed: rnam pa 'di dag gis gzugs dngos po med pa dbu ba'i phung po ltar brtag go /
translated: By means of these aspects, he should investigate form, which is unreal and like a mass of foam.

original: mtshan nyid med pa dang mtshan ma med pa'i bar du de dag thams cad zad pa'i chos su yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //🔽gang zad pa'i chos de mi rtag pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa dang mtshan ma med pa'i bar du de dag thams cad zad pa'i chos su yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // gang zad pa'i chos de mi rtag pa'o //
translated: He sees that all of them are phenomena that are exhausted, from being without characteristics up to being without signs.🔽That which is a phenomenon of exhaustion is impermanent.

original: gang mi rtag pa de ni /
analyzed: gang mi rtag pa de ni /
translated: That which is impermanent

original: rtog pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rtog pa med pa'o //
translated: It is non-conceptual.

original: gang rtog pa med pa de'ang sdug bsngal ba'o //
analyzed: gang rtog pa med pa de'ang sdug bsngal ba'o //
translated: That which is non-conceptual is also suffering.

original: gang 'byung ba med pa de'ang bdag med pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'byung ba med pa de'ang bdag med pa'o //
translated: That which is non-arising is also selfless.

original: gang 'du byed thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba de'ang stong pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'du byed thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba de'ang stong pa'o //
translated: That which is free from the path of all formations is also empty.

original: gang nang dang phyi rol gyi gzugs de dag lbu ba'i phung po lta bu dngos po med cing gzugs brnyan lta bur stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa de ltar rab 'bring tha ma'i nyon mongs pa @311b nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang nang dang phyi rol gyi gzugs de dag lbu ba'i phung po lta bu dngos po med cing gzugs brnyan lta bur stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa de ltar rab 'bring tha ma'i nyon mongs pa @311b nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Just as one should understand that inner and outer forms are like a mass of foam, non-existent, and empty like a reflection, so too the afflictions of the highest, middling, and lowest levels will be pacified.

original: nam mkha' ji ltar dmigs pa med cing 'dus byas pa med pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang lbu ba lta bur 'du shes pa med cing 'gyur ba med pa dang / tshor ba med pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang /
analyzed: nam mkha' ji ltar dmigs pa med cing 'dus byas pa med pa de bzhin du gzugs kyang lbu ba lta bur 'du shes pa med cing 'gyur ba med pa dang / tshor ba med pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang /
translated: Just as space is non-apprehensible and unconditioned, so too forms are like foam, without perception, unchanging, without feeling, impermanent, suffering,

original: bdag med pa dang / stong pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bzod pa sgom par byed pa 'di dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems can yongs su smin pa nye bar 'tsho ba'i bzod pa blta bar bya'o //🔽rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: bdag med pa dang / stong pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bzod pa sgom par byed pa 'di dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems can yongs su smin pa nye bar 'tsho ba'i bzod pa blta bar bya'o // rigs kyi bu /
translated: This is the patience of the bodhisattvas, who are free from the characteristics of selflessness and emptiness.

original: gzhan yang gzugs ni /
analyzed: gzhan yang gzugs ni /
translated: “Noble son, moreover, form

original: phyi rol dang nang gi gnas gang nye ba'i bar du rang bzhin gyis gzugs brnyan lta bu'i rgyu 'dra ba mngon par mi 'gyur ba dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / lus mngon pa'i mtshan nyid du brtag go /
analyzed: phyi rol dang nang gi gnas gang nye ba'i bar du rang bzhin gyis gzugs brnyan lta bu'i rgyu 'dra ba mngon par mi 'gyur ba dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / lus mngon pa'i mtshan nyid du brtag go /
translated: is to be examined as the cause of the reflection-like nature of external and internal phenomena, which is neither apparent nor non-apparent, and as the illusory nature of the body.

original: gzugs ni / ci la'ang chags pa med /
analyzed: gzugs ni / ci la'ang chags pa med /
translated: Form is not attached to anything.

original: snyems pa'ang med /
analyzed: snyems pa'ang med /
translated: It is not conceited.

original: blang ba dang dor ba med par shes te /
analyzed: blang ba dang dor ba med par shes te /
translated: It is understood to be beyond acceptance and rejection.

original: gzugs ni; gnyis su med do //
analyzed: gzugs ni; gnyis su med do //
translated: Form is nondual.

original: chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings la yang dag par gzhol bar shes pas 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i gzugs thams cad cung zad kyang dbyer med do //
analyzed: chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings la yang dag par gzhol bar shes pas 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i gzugs thams cad cung zad kyang dbyer med do //
translated: Since it is understood that all phenomena are subsumed within the realm of phenomena, the forms of the four great elements are not differentiated in the slightest.

original: tshig gi lam thams cad gnas med par yang dag par shes so //
analyzed: tshig gi lam thams cad gnas med par yang dag par shes so //
translated: They know that all verbal paths are baseless.

original: gzugs ni / gzhan du song ba'ang med cing yul med pa dang / glo bur gyi sdug bsngal ba dang / rgyun bcad pa dang rgyun ma bcad pa'i mdud pa gnyis dang bral ba dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / gnas med par brtag go /
analyzed: gzugs ni / gzhan du song ba'ang med cing yul med pa dang / glo bur gyi sdug bsngal ba dang / rgyun bcad pa dang rgyun ma bcad pa'i mdud pa gnyis dang bral ba dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / gnas med par brtag go /
translated: “They should investigate form as being without transition, without location, as a temporary suffering, as free from the two knots of continuity and discontinuity, as a reflection, and as baseless.

original: gzugs thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ni /
analyzed: gzugs thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ni /
translated: “The characteristic of all forms

original: lbu ba'i phung po lta bur dmigs pa med pa dang / kun @312a *//
analyzed: lbu ba'i phung po lta bur dmigs pa med pa dang / kun @312a *//
translated: is to be perceived as a mass of foam,🔽as non-arising,

original: 'byung ba med pa dang / shin tu rang bzhin med par brtag go /
analyzed: 'byung ba med pa dang / shin tu rang bzhin med par brtag go /
translated: and as utterly insubstantial.

original: 'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams ni /
analyzed: 'byung ba chen po bzhi rnams ni /
translated: “The four great elements

original: rnam par dag pa /
analyzed: rnam par dag pa /
translated: are pure,

original: rnam par mi rtog pa /
analyzed: rnam par mi rtog pa /
translated: nonconceptual,

original: mi 'byung ba /
analyzed: mi 'byung ba /
translated: nonarising,

original: mngon par mi sgrub pa; chos thams cad spros pa'i rgyun bcad pa thams cad du zhugs pa med par brtag go /
analyzed: mngon par mi sgrub pa; chos thams cad spros pa'i rgyun bcad pa thams cad du zhugs pa med par brtag go /
translated: and not accomplished. They should be investigated as the cessation of all conceptual elaborations and as not engaging in anything.

original: 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i gzugs kyi phung po'i mtshan nyid ni /
analyzed: 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i gzugs kyi phung po'i mtshan nyid ni /
translated: “The characteristic of the aggregate of form, which is the four great elements,

original: snyems pa med pa dang / gtong ba med pa dang / mun pa med pa dang / snang ba med pa dang / yid la mi byed pa dang / gnyis su med pa dang / gsog pa med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang /
analyzed: snyems pa med pa dang / gtong ba med pa dang / mun pa med pa dang / snang ba med pa dang / yid la mi byed pa dang / gnyis su med pa dang / gsog pa med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang /
translated: It is without pride, without giving up, without darkness, without light, without mental activity, nondual, without accumulation, and without conceptual elaboration.

original: gzugs brnyan lta bu dbyer med pa dang / dngos po med par brtag go /
analyzed: gzugs brnyan lta bu dbyer med pa dang / dngos po med par brtag go /
translated: It is like a reflection, indivisible, and should be examined as non-entity.

original: gzugs 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni /
analyzed: gzugs 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni /
translated: Form is the four great elements.

original: shin tu rnam par mi rtog pa dang / zad pa dang / lbu ba lta bur blta'o //
analyzed: shin tu rnam par mi rtog pa dang / zad pa dang / lbu ba lta bur blta'o //
translated: It should be seen as utterly nonconceptual, as exhausted, and as like foam.

original: rnam pa 'di dag gis gzugs la dngos po med pa gzugs brnyan lta bur rtog go /
analyzed: rnam pa 'di dag gis gzugs la dngos po med pa gzugs brnyan lta bur rtog go /
translated: By these aspects, form is imagined to be non-entity, like a reflection.

original: mtshan nyid med pa nas mtshan ma med pa'i bar du 'du byed thams cad zad pa'i chos su yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa nas mtshan ma med pa'i bar du 'du byed thams cad zad pa'i chos su yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo //
translated: From the absence of characteristics up to the absence of signs, all formations are seen as the nature of exhaustion.

original: gang zad pa'i chos de mi rtag pa'o //
analyzed: gang zad pa'i chos de mi rtag pa'o //
translated: That which is the nature of exhaustion is impermanent.

original: gang mi rtag pa de rtog pa med pa'o //
analyzed: gang mi rtag pa de rtog pa med pa'o //
translated: That which is impermanent is nonconceptual.

original: gang rtog pa med pa de sdug bsngal ba'o //
analyzed: gang rtog pa med pa de sdug bsngal ba'o //
translated: That which is nonconceptual is suffering.

original: gang 'byung ba med pa de'ang bdag med pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'byung ba med pa de'ang bdag med pa'o //
translated: That which is non-arisen is also selfless.

original: gang 'du byed thams cad kyi tshig gi lam dang bral ba de'ang stong pa ste /
analyzed: gang 'du byed thams cad kyi tshig gi lam dang bral ba de'ang stong pa ste /
translated: That which is free from the path of words of all formations is also empty.

original: ji ltar phyi dang nang gi gzugs lbu ba 'dra ba stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa de ltar rab 'bring tha ma'i nyon mongs pa'ang nye bar zhi @312b bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar phyi dang nang gi gzugs lbu ba 'dra ba stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa de ltar rab 'bring tha ma'i nyon mongs pa'ang nye bar zhi @312b bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Just as one understands outer and inner forms to be like foam and empty, in the same way, the afflictions of the highest, middling, and lowest levels will also be pacified.

original: nam mkha' ji ltar zad pa med cing gzugs med pa dang / bstan du med pa de bzhin du zad pa med cing mtshan nyid med pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / bstan du med pa dang / lpu ba lta bur mi rtag pa dang /
analyzed: nam mkha' ji ltar zad pa med cing gzugs med pa dang / bstan du med pa de bzhin du zad pa med cing mtshan nyid med pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / bstan du med pa dang / lpu ba lta bur mi rtag pa dang /
translated: Just as space is inexhaustible, formless, and cannot be shown, in the same way, the inexhaustible, signless, formless, and indescribable are impermanent like foam,

original: sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / stong pa'i mtshan nyid la dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bzod pa sgom par byed pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sems can yongs su smin pa nye bar 'tsho bar blta'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / stong pa'i mtshan nyid la dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bzod pa sgom par byed pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sems can yongs su smin pa nye bar 'tsho bar blta'o //
translated: and have the characteristics of suffering, selflessness, and emptiness. This cultivation of acceptance, which is free from the characteristics of observation, should also be seen as the bodhisattva's means of bringing sentient beings to maturity.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of a good family!🔽Moreover, the characteristics of form, which are the four great elements, are from the inside to the outside.🔽The characteristics of form are like a mirage, like a shadow, like foam,

analyzed: gzhan yang gzugs 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i mtshan nyid nang gi nas nye ba'i bar du gang smras pa de'i gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ni /

original: mig yor lta bu dang / grib ma lta bu dang / lbu ba lta bu /🔽gnas med pa dang / nam mkha' lta bu chags pa med pa dang / brjod du med pa dang / gsog ba med pa nas khams gsum gyi 'khor ba bdag med pa lta bu dang / dus gsum gyi mtshan nyid thob pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang /
analyzed: mig yor lta bu dang / grib ma lta bu dang / lbu ba lta bu / gnas med pa dang / nam mkha' lta bu chags pa med pa dang / brjod du med pa dang / gsog ba med pa nas khams gsum gyi 'khor ba bdag med pa lta bu dang / dus gsum gyi mtshan nyid thob pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang /
translated: like a dream, like a flash of lightning, like an echo, like an optical illusion, like a reflection, like a city of gandharvas, like a water bubble, like a magical creation, like a mirage, like a shadow, like foam,

original: yi ge med pa dang / gnyis su med pa'i mtha' dang / rtag pa'i mtha' dang / kun tu gzung ba'i mtha' dang / zad pa med par spyod pa'i mtha' dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i mtha' dang / yul med pa'i mtha' dang / rab tu rgyu ba med pa'i mtha' dang /
analyzed: yi ge med pa dang / gnyis su med pa'i mtha' dang / rtag pa'i mtha' dang / kun tu gzung ba'i mtha' dang / zad pa med par spyod pa'i mtha' dang / nyon mongs pa med pa'i mtha' dang / yul med pa'i mtha' dang / rab tu rgyu ba med pa'i mtha' dang /
translated: like a dream, like a flash of lightning, like an echo, like an optical illusion, like a reflection, like a city of gandharvas

original: smra ba med pa'i mtha' dang / gzugs brnyan lta bur gzugs de'i mtshan nyid du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: smra ba med pa'i mtha' dang / gzugs brnyan lta bur gzugs de'i mtshan nyid du rab tu shes so //
translated: The limit of the inexpressible, and the characteristic of form as a reflection.

original: 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / de gnyis kyi gzugs kyi snang ba nam @313a *//
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / de gnyis kyi gzugs kyi snang ba nam @313a *//
translated: The desire realm, the form realm, and the appearance of form in both of those

original: mkha' lta bur brtag go /
analyzed: mkha' lta bur brtag go /
translated: should be examined as being like space.

original: mig yor gyi mtshan nyid nam mkha' lta bur dngos por dmigs pa med pa ste /
analyzed: mig yor gyi mtshan nyid nam mkha' lta bur dngos por dmigs pa med pa ste /
translated: The characteristic of a reflected image is like space, without the observation of entities.

original: nam mkha' ji lta bur gzung du med cing kun nas ldang ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa de ltar de bzhin du gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyang mig yor lta bu dang / tshu rol dang pha rol bral ba'i gnas med pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' ji lta bur gzung du med cing kun nas ldang ba med pa dang / dngos po med pa de ltar de bzhin du gzugs kyi mtshan nyid kyang mig yor lta bu dang / tshu rol dang pha rol bral ba'i gnas med pa'o //
translated: Just as space is ungraspable, without occurrence, and insubstantial, in the same way, the characteristic of form is like a reflected image, without a location free from this side and the other side.

original: gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ni /
analyzed: gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ni /
translated: The characteristic of form

original: mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / lbu ba'i phung po lta bu dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi gzugs kyi sgra brnyan ni /
analyzed: mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / lbu ba'i phung po lta bu dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi gzugs kyi sgra brnyan ni /
translated: is the characteristic of sameness, like an echo, like a mass of foam, the realm of phenomena, and the form of an echo in the element of space.

original: khams med pa dang / tha dad pa med pa dang / mtshungs pa med pa dang / 'khrug pa med pa'o //
analyzed: khams med pa dang / tha dad pa med pa dang / mtshungs pa med pa dang / 'khrug pa med pa'o //
translated: It is without elements, without distinctions, without similarities, and without conflict.

original: de ltar de bzhin du chos 'di dag kyang nam mkha' lta bu'o //
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin du chos 'di dag kyang nam mkha' lta bu'o //
translated: In the same way, these phenomena are like space.

original: gzugs kyi snang ba de'ang gzung du med pa dang / bsags pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'phyung ba med pa dang / g-yo ba med pa dang / 'gyur pa med pa dang / 'chi 'pho ba med pa dang / mi gnas pa dang /
analyzed: gzugs kyi snang ba de'ang gzung du med pa dang / bsags pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'phyung ba med pa dang / g-yo ba med pa dang / 'gyur pa med pa dang / 'chi 'pho ba med pa dang / mi gnas pa dang /
translated: That appearance of form is ungraspable, unaccumulated, unborn, unceasing, unmoving, unchanging, deathless, and non-abiding.

original: bdag dang gzhan gyi mi len pa dang / yongs su mi rtog pa dang / chags pa med pa dang / byas pa med pa thams cad gzugs kyi snang ba'o //
analyzed: bdag dang gzhan gyi mi len pa dang / yongs su mi rtog pa dang / chags pa med pa dang / byas pa med pa thams cad gzugs kyi snang ba'o //
translated: It is the appearance of form that is not taken up by self or other, is non-conceptual, is without attachment, and is unfabricated.

original: de ltar de bzhin du 'du byed thams cad kyi lam las shin tu 'das shing mig gi rnam par shes pa'i lam kun nas ldang ba /
analyzed: de ltar de bzhin du 'du byed thams cad kyi lam las shin tu 'das shing mig gi rnam par shes pa'i lam kun nas ldang ba /
translated: In the same way, all formations are beyond the path, and the path of eye consciousness is free from arising.

original: lbu ba'i phung po lta bu'i gzugs kyi snang ba mig gi rnam par shes pas snang ba de'ang mig 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i @313b rgyu'o; ;bdag med pa'i phyir 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de dag kyang stong pa ste /
analyzed: lbu ba'i phung po lta bu'i gzugs kyi snang ba mig gi rnam par shes pas snang ba de'ang mig 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i @313b rgyu'o; ;bdag med pa'i phyir 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de dag kyang stong pa ste /
translated: Because there is no self, those four great elements are also empty.

original: ji ltar gong du bshad pa bzhin du bdag tu dmigs pa'ang med do //
analyzed: ji ltar gong du bshad pa bzhin du bdag tu dmigs pa'ang med do //
translated: As explained above, there is also no observation of a self.

original: mig gnyis ni /
analyzed: mig gnyis ni /
translated: The two eyes

original: rgun 'brum tsam ste /
analyzed: rgun 'brum tsam ste /
translated: are the size of raisins.

original: mig re re la'ang tshad med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba'o //
analyzed: mig re re la'ang tshad med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba'o //
translated: Each eye has an immeasurable number of extremely subtle particles.

original: rdul shin tu phra ba la'ang 'byung ba chen po bzhi po gsog go /
analyzed: rdul shin tu phra ba la'ang 'byung ba chen po bzhi po gsog go /
translated: In each of those extremely subtle particles, the four great elements gather.

original: 'byung ba chen po bzhi po re re la'ang bdag tu mi dmigs shing sems can du mi dmigs na /🔽de la rnam par shes pa'i gnas sam /
analyzed: 'byung ba chen po bzhi po re re la'ang bdag tu mi dmigs shing sems can du mi dmigs na / de la rnam par shes pa'i gnas sam /
translated: If in each of the four great elements there is no observation of a self and no observation of a sentient being,

original: kun nas ldang ba'ang lam du shes par lta ci smos /
analyzed: kun nas ldang ba'ang lam du shes par lta ci smos /
translated: then what need is there to mention knowing the path of the abode of consciousness🔽and the arising of the afflictions?

original: rdul shin tu phra ba de dang de dag la ji lta ba bzhin du mig 'byung ba chen po bsags pa dang / rgun 'brum tsam du yongs su brtag go /
analyzed: rdul shin tu phra ba de dang de dag la ji lta ba bzhin du mig 'byung ba chen po bsags pa dang / rgun 'brum tsam du yongs su brtag go /
translated: In the same way, one should imagine the eye, which is a collection of the great elements, to be the size of a grape.

original: yongs su brtags pa des de la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i gnas pa dang / lam yang med do //
analyzed: yongs su brtags pa des de la mig gi rnam par shes pa'i gnas pa dang / lam yang med do //
translated: In that [eye], there is no place or path for the arising of eye consciousness.

original: des yang dag par yongs su brtags pas sems can mig yongs su brtags par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des yang dag par yongs su brtags pas sems can mig yongs su brtags par 'gyur ro //
translated: By that correct investigation, sentient beings are investigated in the eye.

original: gang mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa de dag 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gro'o //
analyzed: gang mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa de dag 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gro'o //
translated: Those who know the eye consciousness as it really is become free from attachment.

original: ji ltar yang mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa de bzhin du khams gsum gyi mig mig gi rnam par shes pas stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar yang mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa de bzhin du khams gsum gyi mig mig gi rnam par shes pas stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes par bya'o //
translated: Just as one knows the eye consciousness as it really is, one should know the eye of the three realms as empty of eye consciousness as it really is.

original: ji ltar yang mig gis gzugs kyi snang ba lbu ba'i phung po lta bu phyi dang nang gi gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba nas nye ba'i bar du de dag thams cad lbu ba'i phung po gzugs kyi snang ba 'byung ba chen po nam @314a *//🔽mkha' la mi brten par 'gyur ro //🔽nam mkha' ji ltar dngos po med cing mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan nyid kyis stong pa ltar gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba lbu ba'i phung po lta bu de dag thams cad kyasnan ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar yang mig gis gzugs kyi snang ba lbu ba'i phung po lta bu phyi dang nang gi gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba nas nye ba'i bar du de dag thams cad lbu ba'i phung po gzugs kyi snang ba 'byung ba chen po nam @314a *// mkha' la mi brten par 'gyur ro // nam mkha' ji ltar dngos po med cing mtshan nyid med pa dang / mtshan nyid kyis stong pa ltar gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba lbu ba'i phung po lta bu de dag thams cad kyasnan ba'o //
translated: In the same way, the appearances of forms seen by the eye, like a mass of foam, from the characteristics of external and internal forms up to the near point, all of those appearances of forms, like a mass of foam, do not rely on space, the great element of appearances.🔽Just as space is non-existent and without characteristics, and is empty of characteristics, in the same way, all those appearances of the characteristics of forms, like a mass of foam, are empty.

original: ji ltar gzugs gzhan gyi nam mkha' stong pa ltar nang dang phyi'i lus kyi mtshan nyid lbu ba lta bur snang ba nas nye ba'i bar du de dag thams cad gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba'ang stong pa'o //
analyzed: ji ltar gzugs gzhan gyi nam mkha' stong pa ltar nang dang phyi'i lus kyi mtshan nyid lbu ba lta bur snang ba nas nye ba'i bar du de dag thams cad gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba'ang stong pa'o //
translated: Just as forms are empty space, from the appearances of the characteristics of the internal and external body, like a mass of foam, up to the near point, all of those appearances of the characteristics of forms are also empty.

original: ji ltar mig mig gi rnam par shes pas stong pa de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
analyzed: ji ltar mig mig gi rnam par shes pas stong pa de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pas stong ngo //
translated: Just as the eye is empty of the eye consciousness, so the ear, nose, tongue, and body are empty of the body consciousness.

original: 'dod pa khams dang gzugs kyi khams thams cad kyi mig kyang mig dang mig gi rnam par shes pas stong pas stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: 'dod pa khams dang gzugs kyi khams thams cad kyi mig kyang mig dang mig gi rnam par shes pas stong pas stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: The desire realm and the entire form realm are empty of the eye and eye consciousness.

original: de bzhin du ran ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: de bzhin du ran ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: In the same way, the ear, nose, tongue, and body are empty of the body consciousness.

original: 'byung ba chen po lta bu mi rtog rnam par mi rtog cing dmigs par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: 'byung ba chen po lta bu mi rtog rnam par mi rtog cing dmigs par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: They do not conceive of or falsely project the great elements, and they do not see them as real.

original: sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed can dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa dang / tshor ba po dang / tshor bar 'jug pa dang / skye ba dang /🔽kun tu skye ba dang / kun nas ldang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: sems can dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed can dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa dang / tshor ba po dang / tshor bar 'jug pa dang / skye ba dang / kun tu skye ba dang / kun nas ldang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: He does not see a being, a living being, a nourished being, a creature, a person, a human, a human being, a mortal, a human born of strength, a human born of will, a human born of action, a human born of desire, a human born of ignorance, a human born of craving, a human born of birth, a human born of old age, a human born of sickness, a human born of death, a human born of sorrow, a human born of lamentation, a human born of pain, a human born of despair, a human born of defilement, a human born of rebirth, a human born of karma, a human born of action, a human born of the result of action, a human born of the result of karma, a human born of the result of desire, a human born of the result of hatred, a human born of the result of delusion, a human born of the result of the combination of desire and hatred, a human born of the result of the combination of desire and delusion, a human born of the result of the combination of hatred and delusion, a human born of the result of the combination of desire, hatred, and delusion.🔽He does not see a human born of the result of the combination of the four results of action, a human born of the result of the combination of the four results of karma, a human born of the result of the combination of the four results of desire, a human born of the result of the combination of the four results of hatred, a human born of the result of the combination of the four results of delusion, a human born of the result of the combination of the four results of the combination of desire and hatred, a human born of the result of the combination of the four results of the combination of desire and delusion, a human born of the result of the combination of the four results of the combination of hatred and delusion, a human born of the result of the combination of the four results of the combination of desire, hatred, and delusion.

original: gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba'i mtshan ma la mtshan mas @314b mtshan ma las dmigs pa'ang med do //🔽sems kyi gzung ba dang / gtang ba dang / mngon sum du bya ba dang / khong du chud pa dang / gnas dang / kun nas ldang ba'i gnas dang / yid la byed ba'i gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba dmigs pa med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba'i mtshan ma la mtshan mas @314b mtshan ma las dmigs pa'ang med do //🔽sems kyi gzung ba dang / gtang ba dang / mngon sum du bya ba dang / khong du chud pa dang / gnas dang / kun nas ldang ba'i gnas dang / yid la byed ba'i gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba dmigs pa med pa stong pa nyid kyis stong pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He does not see a human born of the result of the combination of the four results of the combination of the four results of action, a human born of the result of the combination of the four results of the combination of the four results of karma, a human born of the result of the combination of the four results of the combination of the four results of desire, a human born of the result of the combination of the four results of the combination of the four results

original: gzugs kyi phung po dang / nam mkha' dang / sems kyi rnam par shes pa tha dad par rab tu mi shes so //
analyzed: gzugs kyi phung po dang / nam mkha' dang / sems kyi rnam par shes pa tha dad par rab tu mi shes so //
translated: They do not know the aggregate of form, space, and the consciousness of the mind to be different.

original: khams gsum thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong par rab tu shes so //
analyzed: khams gsum thams cad stong pa nyid kyis stong par rab tu shes so //
translated: They know the entire three realms to be empty through emptiness.

original: gang phyi rol dang nang gi nas nye ba'i bar du gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba thams cad lbu ba'i phung po lta bur stong pa nyid dang / zad pa'i tshul dang / zhi gnas la 'tsha ba med pa'i tshul dang / rtog pa med pa'i tshul dang /
analyzed: gang phyi rol dang nang gi nas nye ba'i bar du gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba thams cad lbu ba'i phung po lta bur stong pa nyid dang / zad pa'i tshul dang / zhi gnas la 'tsha ba med pa'i tshul dang / rtog pa med pa'i tshul dang /
translated: All that appears as the characteristics of form, from the external to the internal, are like a mass of foam, empty, exhausted, peaceful, without life, without conceptualization,

original: mi skye ba dang / mi 'gog pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rtag go /
analyzed: mi skye ba dang / mi 'gog pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rtag go /
translated: without origination, without cessation, without appearance, and without characteristics.

original: nam mkha' dang bral zhing gnas med pa dang / tshig gi lam la bral bar rab tu shes so //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang bral zhing gnas med pa dang / tshig gi lam la bral bar rab tu shes so //
translated: They know that to be free from space, without location, and free from the path of words.

original: nang dang phyi rol gyi 'du byed nas nye ba'i bar du gzugs kyi mtshan nyid thams cad 'jig pa'i chos dang / zad pa'i chos dang / dngos po'i rgyun chad pa stong pa dang / 'khrug pa rgyun chad pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
analyzed: nang dang phyi rol gyi 'du byed nas nye ba'i bar du gzugs kyi mtshan nyid thams cad 'jig pa'i chos dang / zad pa'i chos dang / dngos po'i rgyun chad pa stong pa dang / 'khrug pa rgyun chad pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so //
translated: He knows that all the characteristics of form, from the inner and outer compounded phenomena up to the proximate phenomena, are empty of the phenomena of destruction, the phenomena of exhaustion, the cessation of the continuum of entities, and the cessation of conflict.

original: gang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid thams cad zad pa'i chos de'ang mi rtag pa'o //
analyzed: gang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid thams cad zad pa'i chos de'ang mi rtag pa'o //
translated: The phenomena of the exhaustion of all the characteristics of form are impermanent.

original: gang rtag pa med pa de'ang sdug bsngal ba'o //
analyzed: gang rtag pa med pa de'ang sdug bsngal ba'o //
translated: That which is impermanent is suffering.

original: gang 'byung ba med pa de'ang bdag med pa'o //🔽gang 'du byed thams cad kyi @315a *//
analyzed: gang 'byung ba med pa de'ang bdag med pa'o // gang 'du byed thams cad kyi @315a *//
translated: That which is non-arising is selfless.🔽That which is free from the path of the characteristics of all compounded phenomena

original: tshig gi mtshan nyid kyi lam dang bral ba de'ang stong pa ste /
analyzed: tshig gi mtshan nyid kyi lam dang bral ba de'ang stong pa ste /
translated: is also empty.

original: gang phyi dang nang gi nas nye ba'i bar du gzugs kyi mtshan nyid stong pa thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa de ltar rab 'bring tha ma'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gang phyi dang nang gi nas nye ba'i bar du gzugs kyi mtshan nyid stong pa thams cad ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa de ltar rab 'bring tha ma'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: He knows that all the characteristics of form, from the inner and outer up to the proximate, are empty just as they are. In that way, the afflictions of the highest, middling, and lowest levels are pacified.

original: 'di ni / mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid rgyun gcod pa med pa'i bzod pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni / mngon par 'du byed pa'i mtshan nyid rgyun gcod pa med pa'i bzod pa'o //
translated: This is the acceptance that the characteristic of formation is not interrupted.

original: nam mkha' ji ltar rlung med pa de bzhin du bag la nyal ba dang bral ba'i bzod pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' ji ltar rlung med pa de bzhin du bag la nyal ba dang bral ba'i bzod pa'o //
translated: Just as space is without wind, so is acceptance free from latent tendencies.

original: nam mkha' ji ltar 'gyur ba med pa de bzhin du gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba med pa'i bzod pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' ji ltar 'gyur ba med pa de bzhin du gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba med pa'i bzod pa'o //
translated: Just as space is unchanging, so is acceptance of the non-appearance of the characteristic of form.

original: nam mkha' ji ltar brtsegs pa med cing gnod pa med pa de bzhin du sems dang rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pas gcos pa med cing gnod pa med pa'i bzod pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' ji ltar brtsegs pa med cing gnod pa med pa de bzhin du sems dang rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pas gcos pa med cing gnod pa med pa'i bzod pa'o //
translated: Just as space is without obstruction and without harm, so is acceptance without obstruction and without harm from mind, thoughts, and analysis.

original: nam mkha' ji ltar bag la nyal ba thams cad dang bral ba de bzhin du tshig gi lam thams cad bag la nyal ba dang bral ba'i bzod pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' ji ltar bag la nyal ba thams cad dang bral ba de bzhin du tshig gi lam thams cad bag la nyal ba dang bral ba'i bzod pa'o //
translated: Just as space is free from all latent tendencies, so is acceptance free from all latent tendencies of verbal paths.

original: nam mkha' ji ltar ma skyes ma byung ba de bzhin du mtshan nyid thams cad sngar ma skyes ma byung ba'i bzod pa bsgrubs pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' ji ltar ma skyes ma byung ba de bzhin du mtshan nyid thams cad sngar ma skyes ma byung ba'i bzod pa bsgrubs pa'o //
translated: Just as space is unborn and non-arisen, so is the accomplishment of acceptance of all characteristics as unborn and non-arisen.

original: nam mkha' ji ltar spros pa med pa de bzhin du khams gsum gyi bag la nyal ba thams cad spros pa med pa'i bzod pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' ji ltar spros pa med pa de bzhin du khams gsum gyi bag la nyal ba thams cad spros pa med pa'i bzod pa'o //
translated: Just as space is free from conceptual elaboration, so too is the acceptance that all latent tendencies in the three realms are free from conceptual elaboration.

original: nam mkha' ji ltar khams gsum par gtogs pa de bzhin du gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba khams gsum par gtogs pa'ang mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / @315b bdag med pa mtshan nyid dmigs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bzod pa sgom par byed pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sems can nye bar 'tsho ba'i bzod par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' ji ltar khams gsum par gtogs pa de bzhin du gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba khams gsum par gtogs pa'ang mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / @315b bdag med pa mtshan nyid dmigs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bzod pa sgom par byed pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sems can nye bar 'tsho ba'i bzod par blta bar bya'o //
translated: Just as space is included in the three realms, so too is the acceptance that the appearance of the characteristics of form included in the three realms is impermanent, painful, empty, and devoid of self, and that it is free from the characteristics of the absence of characteristics. This is also the bodhisattva’s acceptance that sustains sentient beings.

original: yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'i le'u ste lnga pa'o ////
analyzed: yang dag par spyod pa'i tshul nam mkha'i mdog gis 'dul ba'i bzod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo'i le'u ste lnga pa'o ////
translated: This was the fifth chapter on the acceptance that tames those to be guided through the sky-like conduct, from this Dharma discourse known as “The Quintessence of the Sun.”

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Noble son,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas tshor ba'i phung po'ang tshul bzhin du brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas tshor ba'i phung po'ang tshul bzhin du brtag par bya'o //
translated: the bodhisattvas should also properly examine the aggregate of sensations.

original: de la tshor ba'i phung po gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la tshor ba'i phung po gang zhe na /
translated: What is the aggregate of feeling?

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is as follows:

original: tshor ba'i tshogs rnam pa drug ste /
analyzed: tshor ba'i tshogs rnam pa drug ste /
translated: There are six groups of feelings:

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba ste /
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba ste /
translated: feelings arising from contact with the eye, feelings arising from contact with the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mental consciousness.

original: 'di dag ni /
analyzed: 'di dag ni /
translated: These are called

original: tshor ba'i phung po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: tshor ba'i phung po zhes bya'o //
translated: the aggregate of feeling.

original: tshor ba'i phung po de la tshor ba rnam pa gsum du shes par 'gyur te /
analyzed: tshor ba'i phung po de la tshor ba rnam pa gsum du shes par 'gyur te /
translated: In that aggregate of feeling, one should know three kinds of feelings:

original: gsum gang zhe na /
analyzed: gsum gang zhe na /
translated: What are the three?

original: bde bar tshor ba dang / sdug bsngal bar tshor ba dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal du'ang mi shes par tshor ba ste /
analyzed: bde bar tshor ba dang / sdug bsngal bar tshor ba dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal du'ang mi shes par tshor ba ste /
translated: Pleasant feelings, unpleasant feelings, and feelings that are neither unpleasant nor pleasant.

original: 'di dag rnam gsum ni /
analyzed: 'di dag rnam gsum ni /
translated: These three

original: tshor ba'i phung po zhes bya'o //
analyzed: tshor ba'i phung po zhes bya'o //
translated: are called the aggregate of feeling.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa brgyad po 'di dag gis tshor ba'i phung po tshul bzhin du brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa brgyad po 'di dag gis tshor ba'i phung po tshul bzhin du brtag par bya'o //
translated: bodhisattvas should properly investigate the aggregate of feeling in eight ways.

original: de la brgyad gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la brgyad gang zhe na /
translated: What are the eight?

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba gsum ste /
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba gsum ste /
translated: there are three roots of affliction:

original: 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug ces bya'o //
analyzed: 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug ces bya'o //
translated: desire, anger, and ignorance.

original: nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba gsum po 'di dag gis sems can nyon mongs @316a *//
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba gsum po 'di dag gis sems can nyon mongs @316a *//
translated: Because of these three roots of affliction,

original: pa rnams 'dod chags dang bral ba zag pa zad pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: pa rnams 'dod chags dang bral ba zag pa zad pa dang bcas par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: sentient beings do not become free from desire, nor do they come to have exhausted defilements.

original: nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba gsum po 'di dag tshor ba rnam pa gsum la zhugs pa de la nyon mongs pa rnam pa tha dad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba gsum po 'di dag tshor ba rnam pa gsum la zhugs pa de la nyon mongs pa rnam pa tha dad par 'gyur ro //
translated: These three roots of affliction are engaged with three kinds of feelings, and from that, afflictions arise in various ways.

original: de la tshor ba'i tshogs drug gis tshor ba rnam gsum tshul bzhin du brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: de la tshor ba'i tshogs drug gis tshor ba rnam gsum tshul bzhin du brtag par bya'o //
translated: In this regard, the six collections of feelings should be properly investigated with respect to the three kinds of feelings.

original: tshor ba rnam gsum gyis nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba 'byung ba dang / las kyi rtsa ba dang / zad pa'i rtsa ba nub pa tshul bzhin du brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: tshor ba rnam gsum gyis nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba 'byung ba dang / las kyi rtsa ba dang / zad pa'i rtsa ba nub pa tshul bzhin du brtag par bya'o //
translated: With respect to the three kinds of feelings, the roots of affliction, the roots of karma, and the roots of exhaustion should be properly investigated.

original: de mig gis gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba dma' ba'am /
analyzed: de mig gis gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba dma' ba'am /
translated: When the eye sees the characteristics of forms,

original: bde ba'am / che ba'am /
analyzed: bde ba'am / che ba'am /
translated: or great,

original: phra ba'am / gang nye ba'am /
analyzed: phra ba'am / gang nye ba'am /
translated: or subtle, or near,

original: gang ring bar mthong ba de la tshor ba 'byung ngo //
analyzed: gang ring bar mthong ba de la tshor ba 'byung ngo //
translated: or far, there is a feeling.

original: gang gzugs bde ba'am /🔽che ba'am / phra ba'am /
analyzed: gang gzugs bde ba'am / che ba'am / phra ba'am /
translated: Whatever form is seen as pleasant,🔽or great, or subtle,

original: gang ring ba'am /
analyzed: gang ring ba'am /
translated: or far,

original: nye bar mthong ba de la tshor ba sred pa'i gnas chu'i chu bur lta bu dang / mngon par dga' bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba de la'ang tshul bzhin du brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: nye bar mthong ba de la tshor ba sred pa'i gnas chu'i chu bur lta bu dang / mngon par dga' bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba de la'ang tshul bzhin du brtag par bya'o //
translated: or near, there is a feeling that is a basis for craving, like a water bubble, and that arises as delight.

original: ji ltar yang mig mig gis stong pa nas ji ltar gang du bshad pa'i bar du de glo bur dang / lus ma yin pa dang / gnas med pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / bstan du med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang /🔽yi ge med pa tshor ba chu'i chu bur lta bur 'byung ngo //
analyzed: ji ltar yang mig mig gis stong pa nas ji ltar gang du bshad pa'i bar du de glo bur dang / lus ma yin pa dang / gnas med pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / bstan du med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / yi ge med pa tshor ba chu'i chu bur lta bur 'byung ngo //
translated: Just as the eye is empty of eye, up to just as the mind is empty of mind, that is adventitious, not the body, not a location, not form, not demonstrable, not a thing,🔽not a letter, and not a non-letter.

original: 'dod chags kyis kun tu bsgribs pa 'byung ngo //🔽slong ba po'am /🔽dgod pa po'am /
analyzed: 'dod chags kyis kun tu bsgribs pa 'byung ngo // slong ba po'am / dgod pa po'am /
translated: It arises like a water bubble, and craving arises as a cover-up.🔽It is not a collector,🔽not a revealer,

original: kun tu rgyu ba po'am /
analyzed: kun tu rgyu ba po'am /
translated: not a mover,

original: gsog par yang mi shes so //
analyzed: gsog par yang mi shes so //
translated: and not a hoarder.

original: 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid bdag po @316b med pa dang / 'gog pa la'ang bdag po med pa dang / mtshan nyid tshor ba la'ang bdag po med pa ste /
analyzed: 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid bdag po @316b med pa dang / 'gog pa la'ang bdag po med pa dang / mtshan nyid tshor ba la'ang bdag po med pa ste /
translated: The characteristics of feeling are also without a self.🔽All these phenomena without characteristics are also without life,🔽devoid of life, without sentient beings, devoid of sentient beings, without living beings,

original: mtshan nyid med pa'i chos 'di dag thams cad la'ang srog med pa dang / srog dang bral ba dang / sems can med pa dang / sems can dang bral ba dang / gso ba med pa dang / gso ba dang bral ba dang / gang zag med pa dang /
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa'i chos 'di dag thams cad la'ang srog med pa dang / srog dang bral ba dang / sems can med pa dang / sems can dang bral ba dang / gso ba med pa dang / gso ba dang bral ba dang / gang zag med pa dang /
translated: devoid of living beings, without individuals,🔽devoid of individuals, without desire, without things, without characteristics, without a self,

original: gang zag dang bral ba dang / 'dod pa med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / mtshan nyid 'jigs pa dang / zad pa'i 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dngos po med pa dang /
analyzed: gang zag dang bral ba dang / 'dod pa med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / bdag po med pa dang / mtshan nyid 'jigs pa dang / zad pa'i 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal dngos po med pa dang /
translated: and the suffering of conditioned existence, which is characterized by destruction and exhaustion, is also without things.

original: dus gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //
analyzed: dus gsum gyi 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //
translated: Since they are free from desire in the three times, they are empty of them.

original: brjod du med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //
analyzed: brjod du med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //
translated: Since they are inexpressible, they are empty of them.

original: gnyis su med pa'i 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //🔽rgyun chad pa med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo // rgyun chad pa med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //
translated: The extreme of non-dual desire is empty of that.🔽The extreme of desire that is not interrupted is empty of that.

original: rtag pa med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //🔽mtshan ma med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //
analyzed: rtag pa med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo // mtshan ma med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //
translated: The extreme of desire that is not permanent is empty of that.🔽The extreme of desire that is signless is empty of that.

original: smon pa med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //🔽tshor ba med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //
analyzed: smon pa med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo // tshor ba med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //
translated: The extreme of desire that is wishless is empty of that.🔽The extreme of desire that is without feeling is empty of that.

original: byed pa po'i rnam pa med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //
analyzed: byed pa po'i rnam pa med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //
translated: The extreme of desire that is without an agent is empty of that.

original: shes pa med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //🔽len pa med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //
analyzed: shes pa med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo // len pa med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //
translated: The extreme of desire that is without consciousness is empty of that.🔽The extreme of desire that is without appropriation is empty of that.

original: grol ba med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong @317a *//
analyzed: grol ba med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong @317a *//
translated: The extreme of desire that is without liberation is empty of that.

original: ngo // dngos po med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //🔽mun pa med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //
analyzed: ngo // dngos po med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo // mun pa med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //
translated: The extreme of non-entity is empty of the extreme of non-entity.🔽The extreme of non-darkness is empty of the extreme of non-darkness.

original: snang ba med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //
analyzed: snang ba med pa 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //
translated: The extreme of non-light is empty of the extreme of non-light.

original: dus gsum gyi 'dod chags dmigs pa rnam par bsags so //🔽gnas sam byed du 'jug pa'am /
analyzed: dus gsum gyi 'dod chags dmigs pa rnam par bsags so // gnas sam byed du 'jug pa'am /
translated: The three times are accumulated in the observation of desire.🔽One does not see a place or someone to make it,

original: gsog par bya ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: gsog par bya ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo //
translated: or something to accumulate.🔽The mind is like an illusion, and the three times are cut off from entity and non-entity.

original: sems sgyu ma lta bu dang / dus gsum gyi 'dod chags dngos po dang dngos po med pa yongs su chad par yang rnam par mi rtog go /
analyzed: sems sgyu ma lta bu dang / dus gsum gyi 'dod chags dngos po dang dngos po med pa yongs su chad par yang rnam par mi rtog go /
translated: One should not conceptualize.

original: ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa ci la'ang chags pa med do //
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa ci la'ang chags pa med do //
translated: One who knows reality is not attached to anything.

original: thams cad la mi rten pa dang / mi gnas pa dang / len pa med pa dang / 'phos pa med pa la gnyis su mi byed do //
analyzed: thams cad la mi rten pa dang / mi gnas pa dang / len pa med pa dang / 'phos pa med pa la gnyis su mi byed do //
translated: One does not make a duality of not relying on anything, not abiding, not grasping, and not transferring.

original: chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par gzhol bar shes pas cung zad kyang dbye bar mi byed do //
analyzed: chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par gzhol bar shes pas cung zad kyang dbye bar mi byed do //
translated: He does not make the slightest distinction, knowing that all phenomena are truly oriented toward the realm of phenomena.

original: de chags pa'i gzugs la sems rtogs pa dang / gzugs dang tshor ba gnyis bral ba'o //
analyzed: de chags pa'i gzugs la sems rtogs pa dang / gzugs dang tshor ba gnyis bral ba'o //
translated: He understands the mind in relation to the form of attachment, and he is free from both form and sensation.

original: gang chags pa'i gzugs la tshor ba gang chu'i chu bur lta bu dang / gang 'byung ba zad pa 'jig par brtag pa 'di dag ni /
analyzed: gang chags pa'i gzugs la tshor ba gang chu'i chu bur lta bu dang / gang 'byung ba zad pa 'jig par brtag pa 'di dag ni /
translated: The form of attachment is like a water bubble, and the sensation that arises from it is like a mirage.

original: 'du byed brtag pa med pa'o //
analyzed: 'du byed brtag pa med pa'o //
translated: This is the gateway to the freedom of the wishless, for it is the absence of conceptualization.

original: khams gsum las 'byung ba 'di'ang smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o //🔽gang 'dod chags de la brjod du med pa'i tshor ba dang / dus gsum gyi sgom pa thob pa 'di'ang 'du byed sdug bsngal rab tu byed pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: khams gsum las 'byung ba 'di'ang smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o // gang 'dod chags de la brjod du med pa'i tshor ba dang / dus gsum gyi sgom pa thob pa 'di'ang 'du byed sdug bsngal rab tu byed pa'i sgo'o //
translated: The arising of the three realms is the gateway to the freedom of the wishless.🔽The sensation that is inexpressible in relation to attachment, and the attainment of meditation in the three times, is the gateway to the freedom of the wishless.

original: khams gsum gyi @317b 'dod chags kyi kun gzhi tshor ba po med pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa 'di'ang mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: khams gsum gyi @317b 'dod chags kyi kun gzhi tshor ba po med pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa 'di'ang mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o //
translated: The absence of a sensation that is the ground of attachment to the three realms, and the absence of afflictions, is the gateway to the freedom of the wishless.

original: gang 'dod chags kyi kun gzhi tshor ba blang ba med cing dor ba med pa dang / tshig gi lam bdag med pa dang / yi ger dmigs pa med pa dang / khams gsum gyi tshor ba yul med cing mig yor med pa 'di'ang 'du byed rnam par zhi ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang 'dod chags kyi kun gzhi tshor ba blang ba med cing dor ba med pa dang / tshig gi lam bdag med pa dang / yi ger dmigs pa med pa dang / khams gsum gyi tshor ba yul med cing mig yor med pa 'di'ang 'du byed rnam par zhi ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The ground of attachment is the feeling that is neither to be taken up nor to be given up, the path of words is selflessness, the observation of syllables is non-apprehension, and the feeling of the three realms is non-objectification and non-appearance.

original: bdag med pa stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o //
analyzed: bdag med pa stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o //
translated: This is also the gateway to liberation that is the emptiness of selflessness.

original: gang khams gsum thams cad la tshor ba dngos po med pa dang / snang ba med pa dang / yi ge med pa dang / brjod du med pa dang / zad pa med pa dang / ci la'ang chags pa med pa de /
analyzed: gang khams gsum thams cad la tshor ba dngos po med pa dang / snang ba med pa dang / yi ge med pa dang / brjod du med pa dang / zad pa med pa dang / ci la'ang chags pa med pa de /
translated: The feeling of the entire three realms is non-entity, non-appearance, non-syllable, inexpressible, inexhaustible, and not attached to anything.

original: de ltar rab 'bring tha ma'i nyon mongs pa rgyun chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar rab 'bring tha ma'i nyon mongs pa rgyun chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the afflictions of the highest, middling, and lowest degrees are interrupted.

original: nam mkha' ji ltar sbyor ba med pa de bzhin du 'dod chags kun nas ldang ba dang / tshor ba sbyor ba med cing brjod du med pa dang / gnyis su med pa dang / sems dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la khams gsum gyi tshor ba ci la'ang chags pa med pa dang /
analyzed: nam mkha' ji ltar sbyor ba med pa de bzhin du 'dod chags kun nas ldang ba dang / tshor ba sbyor ba med cing brjod du med pa dang / gnyis su med pa dang / sems dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa la khams gsum gyi tshor ba ci la'ang chags pa med pa dang /
translated: Feeling is not engaged, is inexpressible, is nondual, and the mind consciousness is not attached to any feeling in the three realms.🔽It is impermanent, suffering, empty, and without self. The ground of attachment is the characteristic of feeling, which is nonapprehending and free from characteristics.

original: mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa dang / 'dod chags kyi kun gzhi tshor ba mtshan nyid dmigs pa med pa dang / mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bzod pa sgom par byed pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sems can nye bar 'tshor ba'i bzod par blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa dang / 'dod chags kyi kun gzhi tshor ba mtshan nyid dmigs pa med pa dang / mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bzod pa sgom par byed pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sems can nye bar 'tshor ba'i bzod par blta bar bya'o //
translated: This is the bodhisatvas’ patience of protecting sentient beings.

original: de bzhin du rna ba la sgra /🔽sna la dri /
analyzed: de bzhin du rna ba la sgra / sna la dri /
translated: In the same way, it is the same for the ear and sound,

original: lce la ro /
analyzed: lce la ro /
translated: the nose and smell,🔽the tongue and taste,

original: lus la reg /🔽yid la chos te /
analyzed: lus la reg / yid la chos te /
translated: the body and touch,🔽and the mind and phenomena.

original: gang yid kyis 'das @318a *//
analyzed: gang yid kyis 'das @318a *//
translated: Whatever is past,

original: ba dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'dod chags kyi kun gzhi kun nas ldang ba yid du 'ong ba'i chos rnam par shes shing gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa mngon par dga' ba rjes su dran pa de la'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'byung ngo //
analyzed: ba dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i 'dod chags kyi kun gzhi kun nas ldang ba yid du 'ong ba'i chos rnam par shes shing gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa mngon par dga' ba rjes su dran pa de la'ang yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'byung ngo //
translated: The mental consciousness arises in relation to the pleasant objects of the past, future, and present that are the motivating force of the store-consciousness of passion. It is the recollection of the delight in forms, sounds, smells, tastes, and touches.

original: tshor ba 'dod chags kyi kun gzhis bskyed do //
analyzed: tshor ba 'dod chags kyi kun gzhis bskyed do //
translated: The feeling of passion is produced by the store-consciousness of passion.

original: de la'ang byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin du yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / tshor ba 'dod chags kyi kun gzhi tshul bzhin du rtog go /
analyzed: de la'ang byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin du yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / tshor ba 'dod chags kyi kun gzhi tshul bzhin du rtog go /
translated: The bodhisattva should properly understand the mental consciousness and the feeling of passion in the same way.

original: gzugs kyi dngos po rang bzhin gyis sgyu ma lta bu'i sems dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di sems dang / yid kyi sgras brjod do //
analyzed: gzugs kyi dngos po rang bzhin gyis sgyu ma lta bu'i sems dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'di sems dang / yid kyi sgras brjod do //
translated: The entity of form is the mind and the mental consciousness, which are naturally illusory. They are referred to by the terms “mind” and “mental consciousness.”

original: gang 'das pa'i sems de 'gags pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i ma byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnas pa'ang med do //
analyzed: gang 'das pa'i sems de 'gags pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i ma byung ba dang / da ltar byung ba'i sems dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa gnas pa'ang med do //
translated: The past mind has ceased, the future mind has not yet arisen, and the present mind and mental consciousness do not remain.

original: skad cig tu 'jig pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / lus med pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa dang / yi ge med pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / bya ba med pa dang / 'gyur ba med pa dang / gzung du med pa dang /
analyzed: skad cig tu 'jig pa dang / mi rtag pa dang / lus med pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa dang / yi ge med pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa dang / bya ba med pa dang / 'gyur ba med pa dang / gzung du med pa dang /
translated: It is momentary destruction, impermanence, bodilessness, essencelessness, wordless, characterless, actionless, changeless, ungraspable,

original: gtong ba med pa dang / mun pa med pa dang / snang ba med pa dang / gcig bu ma yin pa dang / tha mi dad pa dang / gnyis su med pa dang / gnyis lta bu med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang /
analyzed: gtong ba med pa dang / mun pa med pa dang / snang ba med pa dang / gcig bu ma yin pa dang / tha mi dad pa dang / gnyis su med pa dang / gnyis lta bu med pa dang / dngos po med pa dang /
translated: unabandonable, non-dark, non-bright, not one, not different, non-dual, non-dualistic, insubstantial,

original: snyems pa med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / phul ba med pa dang / sel ba med pa dang / kun gzhi thams cad dang bral ba dang / chu zla lta bu dang / @318b 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang /
analyzed: snyems pa med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / phul ba med pa dang / sel ba med pa dang / kun gzhi thams cad dang bral ba dang / chu zla lta bu dang / @318b 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang /
translated: It is without pride, without conceptual elaboration, without offering, without removal, free from all bases, like the reflection of the moon in water, and free from the past, future, and present.

original: da ltar byung ba'i cha'i gnas mngon par dga' ba'i phyi rol gyi dngos po sems dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du snang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i cha'i gnas mngon par dga' ba'i phyi rol gyi dngos po sems dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du snang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The external things that are the objects of delight of the mind and mental consciousness appear according to conditions.

original: nam mkha' ji ltar nyi ma dang / zla ba la snang ba med pa'i nam mkha' dang snang ba gnyis kyi mtshan nyid med pa de ming tsam gyis brjod pa de bzhin du sems dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la 'dod chags kyi gnas snang ba dang /
analyzed: nam mkha' ji ltar nyi ma dang / zla ba la snang ba med pa'i nam mkha' dang snang ba gnyis kyi mtshan nyid med pa de ming tsam gyis brjod pa de bzhin du sems dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la 'dod chags kyi gnas snang ba dang /
translated: Just as the sky is said to be the appearance of the sun and moon, and the characteristics of the sky and appearance are merely expressed by names, in the same way, the appearance of the abode of desire in the mind and mental consciousness

original: brjod du med pa la gnyis kyi mtshan nyid kyang ming tsam gyis brjod pa'ang gnyis su med pa dang / gnas med pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / bstan du med pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa dang / yi ge med pa dang /
analyzed: brjod du med pa la gnyis kyi mtshan nyid kyang ming tsam gyis brjod pa'ang gnyis su med pa dang / gnas med pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / bstan du med pa dang / ngo bo nyid med pa dang / yi ge med pa dang /
translated: The characteristics of the inexpressible are also expressed by mere names, and are nondual, nonabiding, formless, unteachable, essenceless, and without syllables.

original: slong ba po med pa nas ston pa'i bar du 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //
analyzed: slong ba po med pa nas ston pa'i bar du 'dod chags kyi mtha' la des de dag stong ngo //
translated: From the absence of one who is aroused up to the absence of a teacher, the extremes of desire are empty of them.

original: dus gsum gyi 'dod chags la kun gzhi rnam par gsog go /
analyzed: dus gsum gyi 'dod chags la kun gzhi rnam par gsog go /
translated: The three times of desire are accumulated in the foundation consciousness.

original: 'di la gnas med pas ci'ang chags pa med pa'i bar du de ltar rab 'bring tha ma'i nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di la gnas med pas ci'ang chags pa med pa'i bar du de ltar rab 'bring tha ma'i nyon mongs pa nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Since there is no basis here, the afflictions of the highest, middling, and lowest types are pacified, up to the absence of any attachment whatsoever.

original: nam mkha' ji ltar mun pa med cing snang ba med pa dang mtshan nyid med pa de bzhin du yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dod chags kyi kun gzhi'ang mun pa med cing snang ba med pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa ngo bo nyid med pa dang /
analyzed: nam mkha' ji ltar mun pa med cing snang ba med pa dang mtshan nyid med pa de bzhin du yid kyi rnam par shes pa 'dod chags kyi kun gzhi'ang mun pa med cing snang ba med pa dang / mtshan nyid med pa ngo bo nyid med pa dang /
translated: Just as space is without darkness, without light, and without characteristics, so too the mental consciousness, the foundation consciousness of desire, is without darkness, without light, without characteristics, and without an essence.

original: sems dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ci la'ang chags pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ci la'ang ma chags pa dang / khams gsum gyi 'dod chags kyi kun gzhi tshor ba mi rtag @319a *//
analyzed: sems dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ci la'ang chags pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ci la'ang ma chags pa dang / khams gsum gyi 'dod chags kyi kun gzhi tshor ba mi rtag @319a *//
translated: The mind and mental consciousness are attached to anything, and the mental consciousness is not attached to anything.🔽The patience of the three realms of desire, form, and formlessness is the cultivation of patience that is free from the characteristics of impermanence, suffering, emptiness, and no-self.

original: pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bzod pa bsgom par bya ba 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sems can yongs su smin pa nye bar 'tsho ba'i bzod par yongs su blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bzod pa bsgom par bya ba 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sems can yongs su smin pa nye bar 'tsho ba'i bzod par yongs su blta bar bya'o //
translated: This should be regarded as the bodhisattva's patience that benefits sentient beings by bringing them to maturity.

original: de bzhin du 'dod chags kyi rgyun gcod par yang 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'dod chags kyi rgyun gcod par yang 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, the stream of desire will be cut off.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang skye ba nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba las zad par nus pa'i tshul bzhin du brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang skye ba nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba las zad par nus pa'i tshul bzhin du brtag par bya'o //
translated: furthermore, the bodhisattva should properly investigate the ability to eliminate the root afflictions that give rise to anger.

original: gang mig gis gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba yid du 'ong ba dma' ba nas nye ba'i bar du de la tshor ba chu'i chu bur lta bur mi sdug pa mngon par dga' ba med par 'byung ba'i tshor ba ste /
analyzed: gang mig gis gzugs kyi mtshan nyid snang ba yid du 'ong ba dma' ba nas nye ba'i bar du de la tshor ba chu'i chu bur lta bur mi sdug pa mngon par dga' ba med par 'byung ba'i tshor ba ste /
translated: Whatever is the characteristic of form that appears to the eye, from the pleasant to the unpleasant, that is a feeling like a water bubble, which arises without delight.

original: de la'ang byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du rtog go /
analyzed: de la'ang byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin du rtog go /
translated: The bodhisattva properly investigates that.🔽As the eye is empty of the eye, and the eye is empty of the consciousness of form, up to as explained above.🔽The bodhisattva properly investigates the impermanence of the eye, the impermanence of form, and the impermanence of eye consciousness.

original: ji ltar mig mig gis stong pa dang / mig gzugs rnam par shes pas stong pa nas ji ltar gong du bshad pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: ji ltar mig mig gis stong pa dang / mig gzugs rnam par shes pas stong pa nas ji ltar gong du bshad pa'i bar du'o //
translated: The bodhisattva properly investigates the impermanence of the eye, the impermanence of form, and the impermanence of eye consciousness.🔽The bodhisattva properly investigates the impermanence of the eye, the impermanence of form, and the impermanence of eye consciousness.

original: skad cig tu 'jig pa zad pa'i 'du byed dus gsum gyi zhe sdang gi mtha' la des de stong pa nas snang ba med pa'i bar du zhe sdang gi mtha' la des do stong ste /🔽dus gsum gyi zhe sdang dmigs pa rnam par gsog go /
analyzed: skad cig tu 'jig pa zad pa'i 'du byed dus gsum gyi zhe sdang gi mtha' la des de stong pa nas snang ba med pa'i bar du zhe sdang gi mtha' la des do stong ste /🔽dus gsum gyi zhe sdang dmigs pa rnam par gsog go /
translated: The bodhisattva properly investigates the impermanence of the eye, the impermanence of form, and the impermanence of eye consciousness.🔽The bodhisattva properly investigates the impermanence of the eye, the impermanence of form, and the impermanence of eye consciousness.🔽The bodhisattva properly investigates the impermanence of the eye, the impermanence of form, and the impermanence of eye consciousness.🔽The bodhisattva properly investigates the impermanence of the eye, the impermanence of form, and the impermanence of eye consciousness.🔽The bodhisattva properly investigates the impermanence of the eye, the impermanence of form, and the impermanence of eye consciousness.🔽The bodhisattva properly investigates the impermanence of the eye, the impermanence of form, and the impermanence of eye consciousness.🔽The bodhisattva properly investigates the impermanence of the eye, the impermanence of form, and the impermanence of eye consciousness.🔽The bodhisattva properly investigates the impermanence of the eye, the impermanence of form, and the impermanence of eye consciousness.🔽The bodhisattva properly investigates the impermanence of the eye, the impermanence of form, and the impermanence of eye consciousness.🔽The bodhisattva properly investigates the impermanence of the eye, the impermanence of form, and the impermanence of eye consciousness.

original: zhe sdang gnas med pa nas zhe sdang can gyi gzugs snang ba la sems gzhog pa dang / zhe sdang gi tshor ba dang gnyis bral bar 'gyur ba'i bar du'o //
analyzed: zhe sdang gnas med pa nas zhe sdang can gyi gzugs snang ba la sems gzhog pa dang / zhe sdang gi tshor ba dang gnyis bral bar 'gyur ba'i bar du'o //
translated: From the absence of any basis for anger, the mind is fixed on the appearance of the form of an angry person, up to the absence of the two, the angry person and the feeling of anger.

original: gang zhe sdang can gyi gzugs la zhe sdang gi kun gzhi 'byung ba dang / @319b tshor ba chu'i chu bur 'byung ba zad pa 'jig par brtag pa 'di dag kyang 'du byed mi rtag pa zhes bya ba'i bar du bzad pa blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: gang zhe sdang can gyi gzugs la zhe sdang gi kun gzhi 'byung ba dang / @319b tshor ba chu'i chu bur 'byung ba zad pa 'jig par brtag pa 'di dag kyang 'du byed mi rtag pa zhes bya ba'i bar du bzad pa blta bar bya'o //
