translated: The arising of the store-consciousness of anger in regard to the form of an angry person, and the arising and passing away of the feeling of anger, like a bubble in water, should be seen as the impermanence of the formative forces.

original: de bzhin du rna bas sgra nas yid kyis chos kyi bar du yid kyis gang mi sdug pa dang / mi mdzes pa'i chos rnam par shes pa de la'ang zhe sdang gi kun gzhi kun nas ldang ba'i tshor ba kun nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de bzhin du rna bas sgra nas yid kyis chos kyi bar du yid kyis gang mi sdug pa dang / mi mdzes pa'i chos rnam par shes pa de la'ang zhe sdang gi kun gzhi kun nas ldang ba'i tshor ba kun nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In the same way, whatever unpleasant and unappealing things are cognized by the mind, from sounds heard by the ear up to mental objects cognized by the mind, the store-consciousness of anger arises in regard to them, and the feeling of the arising of the store-consciousness of anger arises.

original: de la'ang byang chub sems dpa'i zhe sdang gi kun gzhi yid bzhin gyi tshul kun tu rtog par bya ste /
analyzed: de la'ang byang chub sems dpa'i zhe sdang gi kun gzhi yid bzhin gyi tshul kun tu rtog par bya ste /
translated: In regard to that, the bodhisattva should imagine the store-consciousness of anger to be like a wish-fulfilling gem.

original: 'di dag ni /
analyzed: 'di dag ni /
translated: These are the ten kinds of skill in regard to the store-consciousness of anger.

original: gzugs med pa las ji lta bur gang ma bshad pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: gzugs med pa las ji lta bur gang ma bshad pa'i bar du'o //
translated: and so on up to the formless realm.

original: nam mkha' ji ltar khro ba med gshe ba med pa ltar zhe sdang gi kun gzhi'ang de bzhin no //
analyzed: nam mkha' ji ltar khro ba med gshe ba med pa ltar zhe sdang gi kun gzhi'ang de bzhin no //
translated: Just as space is without anger and without reproach, so too is the foundation consciousness of anger.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhi ba de la zhe sdang med cing gshe ba med pa dang / ci la'ang chags pa med pa dang / khams gsum thams cad kyi zhe sdang gi kun gzhi tshor ba mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa zhi ba de la zhe sdang med cing gshe ba med pa dang / ci la'ang chags pa med pa dang / khams gsum thams cad kyi zhe sdang gi kun gzhi tshor ba mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang /
translated: The mind consciousness is peaceful, without anger and without reproach, without attachment to anything, and the foundation consciousness of anger in all three realms is impermanent, painful,🔽empty, selfless, and devoid of any defining characteristics.

original: stong pa dang / bdag med pa dang / mtshan nyid dang bral ba dang / bdag med pa mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bzod pa sgom par byed pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sems can thams cad yongs su smin pa nye par 'tsho ba'i bzod pa yongs su smin par bya'o //
analyzed: stong pa dang / bdag med pa dang / mtshan nyid dang bral ba dang / bdag med pa mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i bzod pa sgom par byed pa 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'i sems can thams cad yongs su smin pa nye par 'tsho ba'i bzod pa yongs su smin par bya'o //
translated: This cultivation of patience with regard to the selfless and devoid of defining characteristics is the patience of bodhisattvas that brings sentient beings to maturity and is itself brought to maturity.

original: bam po drug pa /
analyzed: bam po drug pa /
translated: Chapter Six

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' mig gis nang gi'am /
analyzed: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' mig gis nang gi'am /
translated: furthermore, bodhisattvas, with their eyes, whether internal or external,

original: phyi'i gzugs gang ji snyed yod pa dag mthong nas gang yang 'di la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i gzugs yang dag pa @320a *//
analyzed: phyi'i gzugs gang ji snyed yod pa dag mthong nas gang yang 'di la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i gzugs yang dag pa @320a *//
translated: “When they see any external forms, they conceive of them as unreal forms that are past, future, and present.

original: ma yin pa'i gzugs yang dag pa ma yin par kun tu rtog pa /
analyzed: ma yin pa'i gzugs yang dag pa ma yin par kun tu rtog pa /
translated: They conceive of them as unreal forms.

original: mun par gyur pa /🔽'dod chags kyi gnas /
analyzed: mun par gyur pa / 'dod chags kyi gnas /
translated: They are in the dark.🔽They are a basis for desire.

original: zhe sdang gi gnas /
analyzed: zhe sdang gi gnas /
translated: They are a basis for anger.

original: rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / ther zug pa dang / bdag dang / mi g-yo ba'i 'du byed du dmigs la khams gsum la dmigs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i rkun po skye zhing 'phel ba dang / khams gsum po thams cad bsdus nas rnam pa gnyis su nye bar 'gro /
analyzed: rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / ther zug pa dang / bdag dang / mi g-yo ba'i 'du byed du dmigs la khams gsum la dmigs pa'i nyon mongs pa'i rkun po skye zhing 'phel ba dang / khams gsum po thams cad bsdus nas rnam pa gnyis su nye bar 'gro /
translated: They observe the impermanent, the painful, the empty, the insubstantial, the self, and the formations that are not subject to destruction. They give rise to and increase the thieves of the afflictions that observe the three realms. They include the three realms and are directed toward two things.

original: nye bar len /
analyzed: nye bar len /
translated: They take them up.

original: byin gyis rlob /
analyzed: byin gyis rlob /
translated: They bless them.

original: mngon par chags shing rgyu dang rkyen grangs med dpag tu med pa la dmigs shing nye bar 'dzin te /
analyzed: mngon par chags shing rgyu dang rkyen grangs med dpag tu med pa la dmigs shing nye bar 'dzin te /
translated: They are attached to them. They observe and take up causes and conditions that are beyond number and measure.

original: de la rang bzhin gyis mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par mi ston /
analyzed: de la rang bzhin gyis mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / stong pa dang / bdag med par mi ston /
translated: He does not teach them that things are essentially impermanent, painful, empty, or selfless.

original: skye ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 'jig par yang nye bar mi rtag go /
analyzed: skye ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 'jig par yang nye bar mi rtag go /
translated: He does not teach them that things arise, cease, or perish.

original: bdag dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag tu dmigs shing rtag pa dang chad par snyems te /
analyzed: bdag dang / srog dang / gso ba dang / gang zag tu dmigs shing rtag pa dang chad par snyems te /
translated: He does not teach them to observe a self, a life-force, a nourisher, or a person, or to conceive of permanence or annihilation.

original: nang dang phyi'i rkyen la phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes /
analyzed: nang dang phyi'i rkyen la phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes /
translated: He teaches them to understand correctly the aggregates, elements, and sense-spheres, which are the inner and outer conditions.

original: rgyu dang / 'bras bu dang / las dang / rnam par smin pa'i kun nas ldang ba la dmigs pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa med pa dang / 'khrugs pa dang / ma 'khrugs pa dang / nye bar zhi ba dang /
analyzed: rgyu dang / 'bras bu dang / las dang / rnam par smin pa'i kun nas ldang ba la dmigs pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa med pa dang / 'khrugs pa dang / ma 'khrugs pa dang / nye bar zhi ba dang /
translated: He teaches them to observe the causes, effects, actions, and ripening of things, and to analyze and not analyze them, to be disturbed and undisturbed, and to be pacified and not pacified.

original: yang dag par rtog pa dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes shing bde ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang bral ba /
analyzed: yang dag par rtog pa dang / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes shing bde ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang bral ba /
translated: It is the correct understanding of things, the correct knowledge of things as they are, and the experience of neither pleasure nor pain.

original: shes rab @320b kyi dbang po ma skyes pas chos la rnam par rtog pa 'di'ang sdug bsngal ba'ang med /
analyzed: shes rab @320b kyi dbang po ma skyes pas chos la rnam par rtog pa 'di'ang sdug bsngal ba'ang med /
translated: The non-arising of the faculty of wisdom is the discernment of phenomena, which is neither pleasant nor painful.

original: bde ba'ang med pa'i tshor ba'o //
analyzed: bde ba'ang med pa'i tshor ba'o //
translated: It is the experience of neither pleasure nor pain.

original: de la byang chub sems dpas nang dang phyi'i mtshan nyid du snang ba dang / gzugs kyi mtshan nyid du snang ba gang ji snyed pa dag la yang dag pa nyid dang / de kho na nyid du brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpas nang dang phyi'i mtshan nyid du snang ba dang / gzugs kyi mtshan nyid du snang ba gang ji snyed pa dag la yang dag pa nyid dang / de kho na nyid du brtag par bya'o //
translated: “Here, the bodhisattvas should investigate the appearances of the characteristics of the inner and outer, and the appearances of the characteristics of form, in terms of reality and suchness.

original: gang ji ltar sngar bstan pa'i 'dod chags kyi gnas dang / zhe sdang gi gnas la 'di ltar brtag pa'am /
analyzed: gang ji ltar sngar bstan pa'i 'dod chags kyi gnas dang / zhe sdang gi gnas la 'di ltar brtag pa'am /
translated: They should investigate the objects of desire and the objects of anger, as previously explained, in terms of their being neither pleasant nor painful.

original: skad cig gis 'jig pa'i tshul dang / rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'i tshul dang / bde ba'am /
analyzed: skad cig gis 'jig pa'i tshul dang / rtag pa'am mi rtag pa'i tshul dang / bde ba'am /
translated: They should investigate them in terms of their being momentary, impermanent, and neither pleasant nor painful.

original: sdug bsngal gyi tshul dang / bdag gam bdag med pa'i tshul dang / khams gsum po thams cad kyi 'du byed dang / nyon mongs pa'i rgyun ma zhi ba dang / rgyu med pa dang / bdag po med pa'i rgyun ma zhi ba dang / gnyis dang bral ba mi skye ba la mngon par mi chags pa'i tshul gyis yongs su rtog pa dang /
analyzed: sdug bsngal gyi tshul dang / bdag gam bdag med pa'i tshul dang / khams gsum po thams cad kyi 'du byed dang / nyon mongs pa'i rgyun ma zhi ba dang / rgyu med pa dang / bdag po med pa'i rgyun ma zhi ba dang / gnyis dang bral ba mi skye ba la mngon par mi chags pa'i tshul gyis yongs su rtog pa dang /
translated: They are the way of suffering, the way of self and non-self, the way of the non-cessation of the formations of the three realms, the way of the non-cessation of the continuity of afflictions, the way of the non-cessation of the continuity of the absence of cause and the absence of a dominant condition, and the way of non-attachment to the non-arising of the absence of duality.🔽They are the way of the non-arising of feeling in the three realms,

original: khams gsum po thams cad dang / dus gsum gyi sdug bsngal yang med /
analyzed: khams gsum po thams cad dang / dus gsum gyi sdug bsngal yang med /
translated: the way of the non-arising of feeling in the three times, the way of the non-arising of feeling of suffering,

original: bde ba'ang med pa'i tshor ba mi skye ba ni /
analyzed: bde ba'ang med pa'i tshor ba mi skye ba ni /
translated: and the way of the non-arising of feeling of pleasure.

original: tshor ba gnyis mi skye ba'i mthar khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: tshor ba gnyis mi skye ba'i mthar khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: They are the way of the non-arising of the two feelings.🔽They are the way of the non-arising of the two feelings.🔽They are the way of the non-arising of the two feelings.🔽They are the way of the non-arising of the two feelings.🔽They are the way of the non-arising of the two feelings.🔽They are the way of the non-arising of the two feelings.🔽They are the way of the non-arising of the two feelings.🔽They are the way of the non-arising of the two feelings.🔽They are the way of the non-arising of the two feelings.🔽They are the way of the non-arising of the two feelings.🔽They are the way of the non-arising of the two feelings.🔽They are the way of the non-arising of the two feelings.🔽They are the way of the non-arising of the two feelings.🔽They are the way of the non-arising of the two feelings.🔽They are the way of the non-arising of the two feelings.🔽They are the way of the non-arising of the two feelings.🔽They are the way of the non-arising of the two feelings.🔽They are the way of the non-arising of the two feelings.🔽They are the way of the non-arising of the two feelings.🔽They are the way of the non-arising of the two feelings.🔽They are the way of the non-arising of the two feelings.🔽They are the way of the non-arising of the two feelings.

original: de dag gi rtag pa med pa'i mtha' dang / chad pa med pa'i mtha' dang / brjod du med pa'i rjes kyi rgyun gyi mtha' dang / lus med pa'i mtha' dang / gnas med pa'i mthar khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: de dag gi rtag pa med pa'i mtha' dang / chad pa med pa'i mtha' dang / brjod du med pa'i rjes kyi rgyun gyi mtha' dang / lus med pa'i mtha' dang / gnas med pa'i mthar khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: They are the way of the non

original: tshig gi lam dang bral ba'i bag la nyal gyi sems dang / yid dang rnam par shes pa la sdug bsngal yang med /
analyzed: tshig gi lam dang bral ba'i bag la nyal gyi sems dang / yid dang rnam par shes pa la sdug bsngal yang med /
translated: The mind that is free from the path of words, the unconscious mind, the intellect, and consciousness are not suffering.

original: bde ba'ang med pa'i tshor ba mi dmigs par @321a *//
analyzed: bde ba'ang med pa'i tshor ba mi dmigs par @321a *//
translated: They are not happiness.

original: so sor brtag par bya'o //
analyzed: so sor brtag par bya'o //
translated: They are not discerned.

original: yang de ltar zhi gnas kyi tshul gyis rgyu dang / rkyen dang / rgyu med pa dang / rkyen med pa'i lhag mthong rnam pa bcu gnyis ni /
analyzed: yang de ltar zhi gnas kyi tshul gyis rgyu dang / rkyen dang / rgyu med pa dang / rkyen med pa'i lhag mthong rnam pa bcu gnyis ni /
translated: In this way, through the method of śamatha, the twelve aspects of vipaśyanā, which are the causes, conditions, absence of causes, and absence of conditions,

original: yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis gti mug gi mun par blta'o //🔽'di la ma rig pa'i gnas tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni /🔽gang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis gti mug gi mun par blta'o // 'di la ma rig pa'i gnas tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni / gang / tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa ni /
translated: are seen with right wisdom in the darkness of delusion.🔽What is the condition of ignorance?🔽What is the incorrect mental engagement?

original: gang la dmigs /
analyzed: gang la dmigs /
translated: What is the object of incorrect mental engagement?

original: lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi 'du byed la dmigs na ni /
analyzed: lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi 'du byed la dmigs na ni /
translated: If it is the body, speech, and mental formations that are the objects,

original: lus de'ang 'byung ba chen po bzhi la gnas pa /
analyzed: lus de'ang 'byung ba chen po bzhi la gnas pa /
translated: then the body is based on the four great elements.

original: 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de dag kyang g-yo ba med pa /
analyzed: 'byung ba chen po bzhi po de dag kyang g-yo ba med pa /
translated: Those four great elements are without movement.

original: 'gyur ba med pa /🔽bdag med pa /
analyzed: 'gyur ba med pa / bdag med pa /
translated: They are without change.🔽They are without self.

original: bdag gi med pa ste /
analyzed: bdag gi med pa ste /
translated: They are without a self-entity.

original: ji ltar sngar bstan pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ji ltar sngar bstan pa bzhin no //
translated: As it was taught before.

original: tshig gi lam yang dmigs su med pa /
analyzed: tshig gi lam yang dmigs su med pa /
translated: The path of words is also unobservable.

original: yi ge med pa ste /
analyzed: yi ge med pa ste /
translated: It is without letters.

original: bdag mi dmigs pa'i phyir gnas med pa'o //
analyzed: bdag mi dmigs pa'i phyir gnas med pa'o //
translated: Since the self is unobservable, it is without abode.

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang gnas med pa /
analyzed: yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang gnas med pa /
translated: The mental consciousness is also without abode.

original: mi gnas pa /
analyzed: mi gnas pa /
translated: It does not abide.

original: tshig gi lam tsam du brjod pa ste /
analyzed: tshig gi lam tsam du brjod pa ste /
translated: It is merely expressed as a path of words.

original: 'di la bdag dang / yan lag can dang / gang zag med do //
analyzed: 'di la bdag dang / yan lag can dang / gang zag med do //
translated: Here there is no self, no possessor of parts, and no person.

original: lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi dmigs pa gnyis ka stong pa ste /
analyzed: lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi dmigs pa gnyis ka stong pa ste /
translated: The objects of observation of body, speech, and mind are both empty.

original: des na ma rig pa'ang stong pa'o //
analyzed: des na ma rig pa'ang stong pa'o //
translated: Therefore, ignorance is also empty.

original: lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyang 'gro ba med pa'o //
analyzed: lung du ma bstan pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyang 'gro ba med pa'o //
translated: The continuum of an indeterminate mind also has no going.

original: mtshan nyid du snang ba'ang brjod du med pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid du snang ba'ang brjod du med pa'o //
translated: The appearance of characteristics is also inexpressible.

original: ma rig pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa dang / sems dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / khams gsum dang / dus gsum la dmigs pa'ang yang dag pa'i mtha' @321b mi dmigs la /
analyzed: ma rig pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa dang / sems dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / khams gsum dang / dus gsum la dmigs pa'ang yang dag pa'i mtha' @321b mi dmigs la /
translated: Ignorance, craving for existence, mind, mental consciousness, the three realms, and the observation of the three times are also unobservable in the final reality.

original: dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / dge ba'i mtshan nyid kyis med de /
analyzed: dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / dge ba'i mtshan nyid kyis med de /
translated: Virtue, nonvirtue, and the characteristics of virtue do not exist.

original: des na ma rig pa ni /🔽stong pa'o // yang ma rig pa ni /
analyzed: des na ma rig pa ni / stong pa'o // yang ma rig pa ni /
translated: Therefore, ignorance🔽is empty.

original: shin tu byang nas 'du byed la rtog ste /
analyzed: shin tu byang nas 'du byed la rtog ste /
translated: Moreover, ignorance is completely purified, and then it conceptualizes formations.

original: skad cig ma gang la ma rig pa skye ba skad cig ma de nyid la mi gnas shing 'gag ste skad cig ma gnyis la mi gnas so //
analyzed: skad cig ma gang la ma rig pa skye ba skad cig ma de nyid la mi gnas shing 'gag ste skad cig ma gnyis la mi gnas so //
translated: In the moment when ignorance arises, it does not remain in that very moment, but ceases. It does not remain in a second moment.

original: skad cig ma gcig la gnyis ka skye ba'am 'gag pa med kyi /
analyzed: skad cig ma gcig la gnyis ka skye ba'am 'gag pa med kyi /
translated: In a single moment, both do not arise or cease.

original: ma rig pa 'gags nas skad cig ma gnyis pa la 'du byed skye ste /
analyzed: ma rig pa 'gags nas skad cig ma gnyis pa la 'du byed skye ste /
translated: When ignorance ceases, in the second moment, formations arise.

original: des na ma rig pa stong ste /
analyzed: des na ma rig pa stong ste /
translated: Therefore, ignorance is empty.

original: bdag med pa'i ngo bo'o //🔽yang skad cig ma gang la 'du byed skye ba de la lus kyi 'du byed dang / ngag gi 'du byed dang / yid kyi 'du byed dang / 'du byed gsum 'gag go /
analyzed: bdag med pa'i ngo bo'o // yang skad cig ma gang la 'du byed skye ba de la lus kyi 'du byed dang / ngag gi 'du byed dang / yid kyi 'du byed dang / 'du byed gsum 'gag go /
translated: It is the essence of selflessness.🔽Moreover, in the moment when formations arise, the three formations of the body, speech, and mind cease.

original: yang lus kyi 'du byed skyes nas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha'i gnas na ngag gi 'du byed skye'o //
analyzed: yang lus kyi 'du byed skyes nas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha'i gnas na ngag gi 'du byed skye'o //
translated: Moreover, when the formation of the body arises, the formation of speech arises in the stage of freedom from attachment.

original: yang rnam par grol ba'i mtha' yang yid kyi 'du byed kyi rjes kyi rgyun gyis ngag gi 'du byed la 'jug go /
analyzed: yang rnam par grol ba'i mtha' yang yid kyi 'du byed kyi rjes kyi rgyun gyis ngag gi 'du byed la 'jug go /
translated: Moreover, the end of liberation is the engagement of verbal formations through the subsequent continuum of mental formations.

original: lus kyi 'du byed de ma skyes na /
analyzed: lus kyi 'du byed de ma skyes na /
translated: If bodily formations are not produced,

original: ngag dang yid kyi 'du byed kyi 'jug pa mi gsog go /
analyzed: ngag dang yid kyi 'du byed kyi 'jug pa mi gsog go /
translated: the engagement of verbal and mental formations is not accumulated.

original: 'du byed nye bar len pa yang dag par rtog pa dang / lus kyi 'du byed nye bar 'tsho ba la rnam par dpyod cing chags par yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'du byed nye bar len pa yang dag par rtog pa dang / lus kyi 'du byed nye bar 'tsho ba la rnam par dpyod cing chags par yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The correct understanding of the appropriation of formations and the analysis of the sustenance of bodily formations will not lead to attachment.

original: yid kyi 'du byed ma skyes na /
analyzed: yid kyi 'du byed ma skyes na /
translated: If mental formations are not produced,

original: lus dang / ngag gi 'du byed rnams kyi dus gsum gyi 'jug pa bsags pa bsal du'ang med do //
analyzed: lus dang / ngag gi 'du byed rnams kyi dus gsum gyi 'jug pa bsags pa bsal du'ang med do //
translated: the accumulation of the engagement of bodily and verbal formations in the three times cannot be removed.

original: ngag gi 'du byed ma skyes na /
analyzed: ngag gi 'du byed ma skyes na /
translated: If verbal formations are not produced,

original: lus dang / yid kyi 'du byed rnams kyi dus gsum gyi 'jug pa bsags pa @322a *//
analyzed: lus dang / yid kyi 'du byed rnams kyi dus gsum gyi 'jug pa bsags pa @322a *//
translated: the accumulation of the engagement of bodily and mental formations in the three times

original: bsal du'ang med do //
analyzed: bsal du'ang med do //
translated: cannot be removed.

original: yang 'du byed gsum gyi mtshan nyid kyi gnas de 'dra bas khams gsum na spyod pa'i rnam par shes pa'i gnas dang snang ba thob par byed pa'ang med /
analyzed: yang 'du byed gsum gyi mtshan nyid kyi gnas de 'dra bas khams gsum na spyod pa'i rnam par shes pa'i gnas dang snang ba thob par byed pa'ang med /
translated: There is no basis for consciousness to operate in the three realms, nor is there any basis for the attainment of appearances.

original: sel bar byed pa'ang med de /
analyzed: sel bar byed pa'ang med de /
translated: There is no basis for the elimination of appearances.

original: des na de dag stong pa'o //
analyzed: des na de dag stong pa'o //
translated: Therefore, they are empty.

original: 'du byed kyi mtha' las skyes pa'ang rang bzhin gyis bsal bas rnam par dag pa gnyis su med pa'i rjes su song ba /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi mtha' las skyes pa'ang rang bzhin gyis bsal bas rnam par dag pa gnyis su med pa'i rjes su song ba /
translated: Since the extremes of the formative factors are naturally eliminated, they are included in the nondual purity.

original: smon pa med pa /
analyzed: smon pa med pa /
translated: They are free from wishes.

original: 'du byed rnam par bzhag pa /
analyzed: 'du byed rnam par bzhag pa /
translated: They are the presentation of the formative factors.

original: nam mkha' ltar stong pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' ltar stong pa'o //
translated: They are empty like space.

original: lus kyi 'du byed kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin bdag med pa ste /
analyzed: lus kyi 'du byed kyang yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin bdag med pa ste /
translated: The formative factors of the body are also the nature of the limit of reality, which is selfless.

original: sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / bar du'ang ma byung ba dang / gnas med pa'i phyir stong pa'o //
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / bar du'ang ma byung ba dang / gnas med pa'i phyir stong pa'o //
translated: Since they do not occur in the past, future, or present, and since they have no location, they are empty.

original: ngag gi 'du byed kyang tshig gi lam dang bral ba'i rjes su 'gro ba /
analyzed: ngag gi 'du byed kyang tshig gi lam dang bral ba'i rjes su 'gro ba /
translated: The formative factors of speech are also included in the absence of verbal paths.

original: nam mkha' ltar sgro btags pa ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' ltar sgro btags pa ste /
translated: They are like space, which is a superimposition.

original: khams gsum dang gnyis dang bral bas stong pa'o //
analyzed: khams gsum dang gnyis dang bral bas stong pa'o //
translated: It is empty because it is free from the three realms and the two.

original: yid kyi 'du byed kyang thob pa med pa /
analyzed: yid kyi 'du byed kyang thob pa med pa /
translated: Mental formations are not attained,

original: mngon sum du bya ba med pa /
analyzed: mngon sum du bya ba med pa /
translated: not actualized,

original: dus gsum thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba /
analyzed: dus gsum thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba /
translated: and are free from the characteristics of all three times.

original: sems can med pa nas gang zag gi bar du byed pa med pa la rnam par rtog pa gti mug gis rnam par bsgrubs pa /🔽mun pa med pa /
analyzed: sems can med pa nas gang zag gi bar du byed pa med pa la rnam par rtog pa gti mug gis rnam par bsgrubs pa / mun pa med pa /
translated: They are devoid of sentient beings up to individuals, and are established by the ignorance of conceptual thought.🔽They are not darkness,

original: snang ba med pa /🔽blang ba med pa /
analyzed: snang ba med pa / blang ba med pa /
translated: not light,🔽not taken up,

original: spros pa med pa /
analyzed: spros pa med pa /
translated: not elaborated,

original: yi ge med pa /
analyzed: yi ge med pa /
translated: not syllables,

original: stong pa / nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o //🔽'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa la yongs su rtog par byed de /🔽'du byed rnams ni /
analyzed: stong pa / nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o // 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa la yongs su rtog par byed de / 'du byed rnams ni /
translated: empty, and similar to space.

original: skyes nas @322b 'gag pa yin gyi /
analyzed: skyes nas @322b 'gag pa yin gyi /
translated: “They examine consciousness, which is conditioned by formations, in the following way: ‘Formations arise and cease,

original: rnam par shes pa'i rgyun ni /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i rgyun ni /
translated: but the stream of consciousness

original: bkri bar bya ba med pa ste /
analyzed: bkri bar bya ba med pa ste /
translated: cannot be led anywhere.

original: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug po 'di dag kyang 'dra ba dang / mi 'dra ba dang / bdag po med pa dang / skad cig ma dang / 'god pa'i mtshan nyid la mi gnas pa'o //🔽yang rnam par shes pa ni /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug po 'di dag kyang 'dra ba dang / mi 'dra ba dang / bdag po med pa dang / skad cig ma dang / 'god pa'i mtshan nyid la mi gnas pa'o // yang rnam par shes pa ni /
translated: These six collections of consciousness are not based on the characteristics of sameness, difference, absence of a self, momentariness, or projection.

original: rnam par dpyod pa'i mtshan nyid mi dmigs pa dang / nang dang phyi mi dmigs pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa mi dmigs pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: rnam par dpyod pa'i mtshan nyid mi dmigs pa dang / nang dang phyi mi dmigs pa dang / dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa mi dmigs pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: Moreover, consciousness is not based on the characteristics of analysis, the non-apprehension of the internal and external, the non-apprehension of virtue and nonvirtue, the non-apprehension of the contaminated and the uncontaminated, the non-apprehension of the compounded and the uncompounded,

original: rgyu dang rkyen mi dmigs pa dang / khams gsum gyi dang / dus gsum gyi tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang / 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan nyams pa mi dmigs pa dang / 'byung ba chen po bzhi mi dmigs pa dang / khams drug mi dmigs pa dang /
analyzed: rgyu dang rkyen mi dmigs pa dang / khams gsum gyi dang / dus gsum gyi tshor ba mi dmigs pa dang / 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan nyams pa mi dmigs pa dang / 'byung ba chen po bzhi mi dmigs pa dang / khams drug mi dmigs pa dang /
translated: the non-apprehension of causes and conditions, the non-apprehension of the three realms, the non-apprehension of the three times, the non-apprehension of the decline of the five sense pleasures, the non-apprehension of the four great elements, and the non-apprehension of the six constituents.

original: sgom pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / bar chad med pa'i lam nas phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / phung po'i lhag ma ma lus pa'i bar gyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pas gzugs la nye bar bkri ba med pa nas yid kyi bar la nye bar bkri ba med pa sgyu ma snang ba lta bur rang bzhin med pa /🔽lus med pa /🔽gnas med pa'o //🔽rnam par shes pa ni /
analyzed: sgom pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / bar chad med pa'i lam nas phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa dang / phung po'i lhag ma ma lus pa'i bar gyi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pas gzugs la nye bar bkri ba med pa nas yid kyi bar la nye bar bkri ba med pa sgyu ma snang ba lta bur rang bzhin med pa / lus med pa / gnas med pa'o // rnam par shes pa ni /
translated: from the path of cultivation, from proper mental activity, from the uninterrupted path, from the state with a remainder of aggregates, from the state without a remainder of aggregates, up to the non-apprehension of consciousness, from the non-guidance of form up to the non-guidance of mind, which is like an illusory appearance, without intrinsic nature,🔽without a body,🔽and without a location.🔽Consciousness🔽

original: sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / bar gyi mtha'i yang dag pa'i mtha' 'byung ba med pa'i gzugs kyi mtshan nyid gang du'ang rnam par brtag pa'i gnas su snang ba dang / spyod par shes par mi nus te /🔽des na rnam par @323a *//🔽shes pa ni /🔽stong pa'o // yang rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs la rtog par byad de /
analyzed: sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / bar gyi mtha'i yang dag pa'i mtha' 'byung ba med pa'i gzugs kyi mtshan nyid gang du'ang rnam par brtag pa'i gnas su snang ba dang / spyod par shes par mi nus te /🔽des na rnam par @323a *//🔽shes pa ni /🔽stong pa'o // yang rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs la rtog par byad de /

original: skad cig ma gcig la rnam par shes pa skyes shing 'gags nas ming dang gzugs skye'o //
analyzed: skad cig ma gcig la rnam par shes pa skyes shing 'gags nas ming dang gzugs skye'o //
translated: In a single moment, consciousness arises and ceases, and name-and-form arises.

original: ming yang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / gzugs med pa'i phung po 'di dag go /
analyzed: ming yang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / gzugs med pa'i phung po 'di dag go /
translated: Name refers to the aggregates of feeling, perception, mental formations, and consciousness, which are formless.

original: phung po'ang rdzas med pa'i don te /🔽gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang / dbyibs kyi snang ba la mi 'jug pas de dag ni /
analyzed: phung po'ang rdzas med pa'i don te / gzugs kyi mtshan nyid dang / dbyibs kyi snang ba la mi 'jug pas de dag ni /
translated: The meaning of aggregate is that they are not substantial.

original: ming zhes bya'o //🔽gzugs zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ming zhes bya'o // gzugs zhes bya ba ni /
translated: They are called name because they do not engage with the characteristics of form or the appearance of shape.

original: 'byung ba chen po bzhi la gzugs zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'byung ba chen po bzhi la gzugs zhes bya'o //
translated: Form is the four great elements.

original: gzugs med pa'i phung po bzhi po 'di dag kyang dngos po med pa /🔽gnas med pa /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i phung po bzhi po 'di dag kyang dngos po med pa / gnas med pa /
translated: These four formless aggregates are also unreal,🔽baseless,

original: rdzas med pa /
analyzed: rdzas med pa /
translated: insubstantial,

original: mtshan nyid med pa /
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa /
translated: without characteristics,

original: mtshan nyid dang bral ba ste /
analyzed: mtshan nyid dang bral ba ste /
translated: and free from characteristics.

original: tshor ba'i rnam par smin pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu mi shes pa'o //
analyzed: tshor ba'i rnam par smin pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu mi shes pa'o //
translated: They do not understand the characteristic of the ripening of feeling.

original: rgyu dang rkyen la dmigs pa dang / 'bras bu 'grub par rab tu mi shes pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu dang rkyen la dmigs pa dang / 'bras bu 'grub par rab tu mi shes pa'o //
translated: They do not understand the observation of causes and conditions and the accomplishment of results.

original: chos 'di dag ni /
analyzed: chos 'di dag ni /
translated: These phenomena

original: phan tshun nas 'du ba dang gnas rnam par dbye ba rab tu mi shes pa'o //
analyzed: phan tshun nas 'du ba dang gnas rnam par dbye ba rab tu mi shes pa'o //
translated: They do not understand the distinction between coming together and separation.

original: 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i rnam par smin pa nas rnam par phye ba'i bar du rab tu mi shes pa'o //
analyzed: 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phung po'i rnam par smin pa nas rnam par phye ba'i bar du rab tu mi shes pa'o //
translated: They do not understand the distinction between the ripening of the aggregates of perception, formation, and consciousness.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: chos 'di dag thams cad ni /
analyzed: chos 'di dag thams cad ni /
translated: All these phenomena

original: khams gsum las grol ba /
analyzed: khams gsum las grol ba /
translated: are free from the three realms,

original: dus gsum las shin tu 'das pa /
analyzed: dus gsum las shin tu 'das pa /
translated: completely beyond the three times,

original: mnyam pa med pa /
analyzed: mnyam pa med pa /
translated: unequaled,

original: yongs su 'dzin pa med pa /
analyzed: yongs su 'dzin pa med pa /
translated: unowned,

original: kha zas med pa /
analyzed: kha zas med pa /
translated: without food,

original: dngos po med pa /
analyzed: dngos po med pa /
translated: without substance,

original: chags @323b shing rnam par rtog pa med pa /
analyzed: chags @323b shing rnam par rtog pa med pa /
translated: without attachment or conceptualization,

original: sgra med pa /
analyzed: sgra med pa /
translated: without sound,

original: 'byung ba med pa /
analyzed: 'byung ba med pa /
translated: without origin,

original: gnyis su med pa /
analyzed: gnyis su med pa /
translated: nondual,

original: rgyu med pa /🔽kun gzhi med pa /
analyzed: rgyu med pa / kun gzhi med pa /
translated: causeless,🔽without foundation,

original: dbang du gyur pa med pa /
analyzed: dbang du gyur pa med pa /
translated: without mastery,

original: 'chi 'pho med pa /
analyzed: 'chi 'pho med pa /
translated: without death or transference,

original: rkyen med pa /
analyzed: rkyen med pa /
translated: without conditions,🔽without characteristics,

original: mtshan nyid med pa; byas pa med pa /
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa; byas pa med pa /
translated: uncreated,

original: rgyu med pa /
analyzed: rgyu med pa /
translated: causeless,

original: bdag gi med pa /
analyzed: bdag gi med pa /
translated: without self,

original: brjod du med pa /
analyzed: brjod du med pa /
translated: inexpressible,

original: chad pa med pa /
analyzed: chad pa med pa /
translated: without annihilation,

original: rtag pa med pa /
analyzed: rtag pa med pa /
translated: without permanence,

original: bya ba med pa /
analyzed: bya ba med pa /
translated: without action,

original: ming med pa'o //
analyzed: ming med pa'o //
translated: and without name.

original: gnas med pas gzugs med pa'o //
analyzed: gnas med pas gzugs med pa'o //
translated: It is formless because it has no location.

original: yid med pa'o //
analyzed: yid med pa'o //
translated: It is without mind.

original: rnam par rtog pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa med pa'o //
translated: It is without conceptualization.

original: rnam par smin pa med pa'o //🔽rnam par shes par bya ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par smin pa med pa'o // rnam par shes par bya ba med pa'o //
translated: It is without maturation.🔽It is without consciousness.

original: gzhal ba med pa'o //
analyzed: gzhal ba med pa'o //
translated: It is without measure.

original: mngon par 'grub pa med pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par 'grub pa med pa'o //
translated: It is without accomplishment.

original: dus gsum dang khams gsum thams cad kyi gzugs med pa'o //
analyzed: dus gsum dang khams gsum thams cad kyi gzugs med pa'o //
translated: It is formless in the three times and the three realms.

original: phung po bzhi po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: phung po bzhi po 'di dag ni /
translated: These four aggregates

original: nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o //
translated: are like space.

original: mtshan nyid med pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa'o //
translated: They are without characteristics.

original: rlung dang mtshungs pa'o //
analyzed: rlung dang mtshungs pa'o //
translated: They are like the wind.

original: rtog pa med pa'o //
analyzed: rtog pa med pa'o //
translated: They are without conceptualization.

original: mig gi lam du brjod pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: mig gi lam du brjod pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: They are the characteristic of the path of the eye.

original: dus gsum tha dad pa med cing 'gro ba med pa'i tshul gyis yang dag pa'i mtha' rjes su ma zhugs pa'o //
analyzed: dus gsum tha dad pa med cing 'gro ba med pa'i tshul gyis yang dag pa'i mtha' rjes su ma zhugs pa'o //
translated: They are the limit of reality that does not enter into the three times, because they are without going.

original: 'jug pa med pa'o //🔽mun pa med pa'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa med pa'o // mun pa med pa'o //
translated: They are without engagement.🔽They are without darkness.

original: snang ba med pa'o //🔽rang bzhin med pa'o //
analyzed: snang ba med pa'o // rang bzhin med pa'o //
translated: They are without light.🔽They are without essence.

original: ngo bo nyid kyis rtsa ba med pa'o //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyis rtsa ba med pa'o //
translated: They are without a root by nature.

original: yi ge med pa'o //
analyzed: yi ge med pa'o //
translated: They are without syllables.

original: de dag ni /
analyzed: de dag ni /
translated: They are

original: gang du'ang sgom pa dang / skyes pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / bsags pa med pa'o; ;khams gsum thams cad ni /
analyzed: gang du'ang sgom pa dang / skyes pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / bsags pa med pa'o; ;khams gsum thams cad ni /
translated: The entire three realms

original: gtam gyi dngos por gdags pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'jug pa med pa'o //🔽blang ba med pa'o //
analyzed: gtam gyi dngos por gdags pa'i mtshan nyid kyi 'jug pa med pa'o // blang ba med pa'o //
translated: are not characterized by the engagement of designating verbal expressions.🔽They are not taken up.

original: dor ba med pa'o //🔽gzugs med pa'i phung po bzhi po @324a *//
analyzed: dor ba med pa'o // gzugs med pa'i phung po bzhi po @324a *//
translated: They are not put down.

original: 'di dag ni /
analyzed: 'di dag ni /
translated: These four formless aggregates

original: mtshan nyid kyi 'jug pa med pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid kyi 'jug pa med pa'o //
translated: are not characterized by engagement.

original: phung po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: phung po 'di dag ni /
translated: These aggregates

original: mig gi gnas kyi dbyibs su mi gnas pa nas lus kyi gnas kyi bar gyi dbyibs su ma gnas pa yin /
analyzed: mig gi gnas kyi dbyibs su mi gnas pa nas lus kyi gnas kyi bar gyi dbyibs su ma gnas pa yin /
translated: do not abide in the shape of the location of the eyes up to the shape of the location of the body.

original: no; ;lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i gnas kyi dbyibs su gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: no; ;lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i gnas kyi dbyibs su gnas pa ma yin /
translated: They do not abide in the shape of the location of the body consciousness.

original: sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa'i gnas sel ba'i brda dang / mtshan ma rnam par bzhag par rnam par bzhag pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa'i gnas sel ba'i brda dang / mtshan ma rnam par bzhag par rnam par bzhag pa ma yin no //
translated: They are not established as the arrangement of symbols and signs that eliminate the location of the mind, mentality, and consciousness.

original: gzugs med pa'i phung po bzhi po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i phung po bzhi po 'di dag ni /
translated: These four formless aggregates🔽are not characterized by engagement.

original: gnas kyi dbyibs su gnas kyang gzugs med pa'i phung po bzhi po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: gnas kyi dbyibs su gnas kyang gzugs med pa'i phung po bzhi po 'di dag ni /
translated: Although they are present in the shape of a location, these four formless aggregates

original: gzugs kyi phung po'i gnas kyi dbyibs su gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs kyi phung po'i gnas kyi dbyibs su gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: are not present in the shape of a location of the form aggregate.

original: khams gsum gyi las kyi mtshan nyid rnam par dpyod pa'i rjes su 'brel pa gzugs med pa'i phung po bzhi po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: khams gsum gyi las kyi mtshan nyid rnam par dpyod pa'i rjes su 'brel pa gzugs med pa'i phung po bzhi po 'di dag ni /
translated: These four formless aggregates, which are related to the analysis of the characteristics of the actions of the three realms,

original: gnas kyi dbyibs su mi gnas pa'o //
analyzed: gnas kyi dbyibs su mi gnas pa'o //
translated: are not present in the shape of a location.

original: de dag ni /
analyzed: de dag ni /
translated: They

original: bdag med pa nas gang zag gi bar du med pa'o //
analyzed: bdag med pa nas gang zag gi bar du med pa'o //
translated: are not a self up to and including an individual.

original: brjod du med pa'o //
analyzed: brjod du med pa'o //
translated: They are inexpressible.

original: yi ge med pa'o //
analyzed: yi ge med pa'o //
translated: They are without letters.

original: gzugs med pa'i phung po bzhi po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i phung po bzhi po 'di dag ni /
translated: These four formless aggregates

original: stong pa'i mtshan nyid kyis shin tu skad cig gis 'jig pa ther zug ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa'i mtshan nyid kyis shin tu skad cig gis 'jig pa ther zug ma yin pa'o //
translated: are momentary and impermanent due to the characteristic of emptiness.

original: gnas mi dmigs pas mtshan ma med pa'o //
analyzed: gnas mi dmigs pas mtshan ma med pa'o //
translated: They are signless because a location is not observed.

original: skad cig gis skye zhing 'bri ba'i tshul gyis smon pa med pa'o //
analyzed: skad cig gis skye zhing 'bri ba'i tshul gyis smon pa med pa'o //
translated: They are wishless because they arise and diminish in a moment.

original: 'geg pa med pas chags pa med pa'i shes rab 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: 'geg pa med pas chags pa med pa'i shes rab 'jug pa ste /
translated: They are the engagement of nonattached wisdom because they are unobstructed.🔽Therefore, these four aggregates

original: des na phung po bzhi po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: des na phung po bzhi po 'di dag ni /
translated: are

original: stong pa'o // gzugs kyi phung po 'byung ba chen po 'di dag kyang ji ltar sngar @324b bstan pa bzhin du stong pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa'o // gzugs kyi phung po 'byung ba chen po 'di dag kyang ji ltar sngar @324b bstan pa bzhin du stong pa'o //
translated: These aggregates of form and the great elements are empty, as previously explained.

original: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag kyang skad cig ma'i rgyun gyi tshul gyis skye ba ma yin /
analyzed: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag kyang skad cig ma'i rgyun gyi tshul gyis skye ba ma yin /
translated: These five appropriated aggregates do not arise in the manner of a continuum of moments.🔽They do not arise in the manner of not abiding through mutual superimposition.

original: phan tshun las shin tu 'das shing mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis ma yin; phan tshun du nye bar nyon mongs pa ma yin /
analyzed: phan tshun las shin tu 'das shing mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis ma yin; phan tshun du nye bar nyon mongs pa ma yin /
translated: They do not arise through mutual affliction.

original: phan tshun las shin tu 'das pa ma yin no //
analyzed: phan tshun las shin tu 'das pa ma yin no //
translated: They do not arise through mutual superimposition.

original: skad cig ma dang po la gzugs med par mi skye ba ma yin /
analyzed: skad cig ma dang po la gzugs med par mi skye ba ma yin /
translated: They do not arise in the first moment without form.

original: skad cig ma gnyis pa'i gnas la ming med par gzugs skye ba ma yin gyi /
analyzed: skad cig ma gnyis pa'i gnas la ming med par gzugs skye ba ma yin gyi /
translated: Form does not arise in the second moment without name.

original: skad cig ma gcig gi gnas pa nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag thams cad skye zhing 'gag ste /
analyzed: skad cig ma gcig gi gnas pa nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag thams cad skye zhing 'gag ste /
translated: All of these five appropriated aggregates arise and cease in the state of a single moment.

original: skad cig ma lhag ma gnyis po la gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: skad cig ma lhag ma gnyis po la gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: They do not abide in the remaining two moments.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: ji ltar sems las byung ba'i chos myur du 'gyur ba bzhin du sgrub par sla ba ma yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar sems las byung ba'i chos myur du 'gyur ba bzhin du sgrub par sla ba ma yin te /
translated: It is not easy to practice in the same way that mental phenomena quickly change.

original: de dag kyang dngos po med pa skad cig gis 'jig par gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de dag kyang dngos po med pa skad cig gis 'jig par gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: They also do not abide as non-entities that disintegrate in an instant.

original: yang ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug la rtog par byed de /
analyzed: yang ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug la rtog par byed de /
translated: “ ‘Next, the condition of name-and-form is contemplated in relation to the six sense sources.

original: ming dang gzugs skyes shing 'gag nas skad cig ma gnyis pa la skye mched drug skye ste; skye mched drug po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: ming dang gzugs skyes shing 'gag nas skad cig ma gnyis pa la skye mched drug skye ste; skye mched drug po 'di dag ni /
translated: When name-and-form arises and ceases, the six sense sources arise in the second instant.

original: mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid do //
analyzed: mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid do //
translated: These six sense sources are the eye, the ear, the nose, the tongue, the body, and the mind.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang 'dre ba dang 'brel pa'i las gsog pa ma yin /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang 'dre ba dang 'brel pa'i las gsog pa ma yin /
translated: The eye consciousness does not accumulate karma that is related to or connected with the ear consciousness.

original: gcig la gcig 'brel pa sel ba ma yin /
analyzed: gcig la gcig 'brel pa sel ba ma yin /
translated: They do not mutually exclude each other.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i las kyi dmigs pa skyes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i skad cig mar bya bar mi nus /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i las kyi dmigs pa skyes pa rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i skad cig mar bya bar mi nus /
translated: The object of the eye consciousness cannot be the object of the ear consciousness.

original: rna ba'i @325a *//
analyzed: rna ba'i @325a *//
translated: The ear consciousness

original: rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa'ang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa'i rgyur mi skyed pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa'ang mig gi rnam par shes pa'i dmigs pa'i rgyur mi skyed pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
translated: The object of consciousness is not produced as the cause of the object of eye consciousness, up to the object of mind consciousness.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dang 'dres te 'byung ba ma yin /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang rtag pa dang mi rtag pa dang 'dres te 'byung ba ma yin /
translated: Eye consciousness is not produced as a mixture of the permanent and the impermanent.

original: khams gsum gyi chad pa dang / rtag pa'i mtha' dang 'dres te 'byung ba ma yin /
analyzed: khams gsum gyi chad pa dang / rtag pa'i mtha' dang 'dres te 'byung ba ma yin /
translated: It is not produced as a mixture of the extreme of annihilation and the extreme of permanence in the three realms.

original: chos thams cad dus gsum dang / tha mi dad pa'i mtha' nye bar len pa ma yin pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad dus gsum dang / tha mi dad pa'i mtha' nye bar len pa ma yin pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
translated: All phenomena are not produced as a mixture of the three times and the extreme of non-differentiation. Up to the mind consciousness, it should be explained.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa ni /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa ni /
translated: Eye consciousness

original: bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi dngos po'i bdag gi mtha' dang 'dres te 'byung ba ma yin /
analyzed: bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi dngos po'i bdag gi mtha' dang 'dres te 'byung ba ma yin /
translated: is not produced as a mixture of the extreme of self and the entity of happiness and suffering.

original: bdag dang bdag med pa ma yin /
analyzed: bdag dang bdag med pa ma yin /
translated: It is not self and not selflessness.

original: sdug pa dang mi sdug pa ma yin /
analyzed: sdug pa dang mi sdug pa ma yin /
translated: It is not attractive and not unattractive.

original: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa ma yin /
analyzed: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa ma yin /
translated: It is not conditioned and not unconditioned.

original: chad pa dang rtag pa ma yin; mtshan ma dang mtshan ma med pa ma yin /
analyzed: chad pa dang rtag pa ma yin; mtshan ma dang mtshan ma med pa ma yin /
translated: It is neither annihilated nor eternal, neither with characteristics nor without characteristics.

original: gnyis su ma yin /
analyzed: gnyis su ma yin /
translated: It is neither dual nor nondual.

original: gnyis su med pa'i mtha' ma yin /
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i mtha' ma yin /
translated: It is not the extreme of nonduality.🔽It does not grasp the limit of reality.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' nye bar 'dzin pa ma yin pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' nye bar 'dzin pa ma yin pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar dag kyang ngo //
translated: It is the same for the mental consciousness.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid stong pa'am mi stong pa zhes chags pa med /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid stong pa'am mi stong pa zhes chags pa med /
translated: “The eye consciousness is not attached to the characteristics of form as empty or not empty.

original: sel ba med /
analyzed: sel ba med /
translated: It is not eliminated.

original: tha dad pa med /
analyzed: tha dad pa med /
translated: It is not differentiated.

original: bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / nang dang phyi'i rnam par smig rgyu ba lta bu dang 'dres ste 'byung ba ma yin /
analyzed: bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / nang dang phyi'i rnam par smig rgyu ba lta bu dang 'dres ste 'byung ba ma yin /
translated: It does not arise as a mixture of happiness and suffering, the internal and the external, and mirages.

original: theg pa gsum dang / mi khom pa'i mtha' dang / 'jig tshogs kyi mtha' sel ba ma yin /
analyzed: theg pa gsum dang / mi khom pa'i mtha' dang / 'jig tshogs kyi mtha' sel ba ma yin /
translated: It does not eliminate the extremes of the three vehicles, the unfavorable, and the view of the transitory collection as real.

original: gsum gyis @325b gus pa'i tshul du byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: gsum gyis @325b gus pa'i tshul du byed pa ma yin /
translated: It is not the three in the manner of respect.

original: zad pa mi shes pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khyams pa ma yin pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa la tshor ba skad cig mi bden pa dang / mi bden pa nye bar 'gro ba med; skyed pa med pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: zad pa mi shes pa'i mtha' rnam par 'khyams pa ma yin pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa la tshor ba skad cig mi bden pa dang / mi bden pa nye bar 'gro ba med; skyed pa med pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar du brjod par bya'o //
translated: “The infinite exhaustion of the mind consciousness is not a wandering, and the non-true arising and non-true going of the sensations of the mind consciousness should be expressed up to the mind consciousness.

original: sgyu ma lta bu'i mig gi rnam par shes pa yod pa ma yin pa 'di la skad cig mi spyod pa med /
analyzed: sgyu ma lta bu'i mig gi rnam par shes pa yod pa ma yin pa 'di la skad cig mi spyod pa med /
translated: “This non-existent illusory eye consciousness has no activity of moments.

original: shes pa med /
analyzed: shes pa med /
translated: It has no cognition,

original: snang ba med; yi ge med de /
analyzed: snang ba med; yi ge med de /
translated: no appearance, and no letters.

original: skad cig ma'i mi skye ba dang / 'gog pa dang / chos 'di dag ni /
analyzed: skad cig ma'i mi skye ba dang / 'gog pa dang / chos 'di dag ni /
translated: The non-arising, cessation, and non-existence of moments🔽are taught to be the same as the non-arising, cessation, and non-existence of the eye consciousness.

original: skad cig ma gcig la skye zhing 'gag ste /
analyzed: skad cig ma gcig la skye zhing 'gag ste /
translated: These phenomena arise and cease in a single moment.

original: 'di la byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa dang / tshor ba po dang / tshor bar byed pa po dang / skyed pa po dang / skyed par byed pa dang / ldang bar byed pa dang / ldang bar byed du 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: 'di la byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa dang / tshor ba po dang / tshor bar byed pa po dang / skyed pa po dang / skyed par byed pa dang / ldang bar byed pa dang / ldang bar byed du 'jug pa dang /
translated: Here there is no agent, no instigator, no feeler, no causer of feeling, no creator, no causer of creation, no one who arises, and no one who causes arising.

original: byin gyis rlob pa po dang / rnam par 'jig pa po med do //🔽de dag ni /
analyzed: byin gyis rlob pa po dang / rnam par 'jig pa po med do // de dag ni /
translated: There is no one who blesses or destroys them.

original: skad cig ma dang po la skyes la skad cig ma gnyis pa la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: skad cig ma dang po la skyes la skad cig ma gnyis pa la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: They are not born in the first moment, nor do they endure in the second moment.

original: skyes nas phan tshun tha dad par byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: skyes nas phan tshun tha dad par byed pa ma yin /
translated: They do not cause each other to arise.

original: rgyu med pa las byung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyu med pa las byung ba ma yin te /
translated: They do not arise without a cause.

original: chos de dag ni /
analyzed: chos de dag ni /
translated: These phenomena

original: skad cig gis 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid pas des na /
analyzed: skad cig gis 'jig pa'i mtshan nyid pas des na /
translated: are characterized by momentary destruction.

original: de dag ni /
analyzed: de dag ni /
translated: Therefore,

original: stong pa'o // yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu rtog pa las skyes shing 'gag ste /
analyzed: stong pa'o // yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu rtog pa las skyes shing 'gag ste /
translated: they are empty. They arise and cease from false imagination.

original: des na de dag ni /
analyzed: des na de dag ni /
translated: Therefore,

original: stong pa'o // skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa la rtog par byed de /
analyzed: stong pa'o // skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa la rtog par byed de /
translated: they are empty. One should consider contact in terms of the condition of the six sense bases.

original: rnam par shes pa drug gi tshogs skyes shing 'gags pa dang / skad cig ma gnyis pa'i gnas la mig gi 'dus te reg pa nas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar dag gi @326a *//
analyzed: rnam par shes pa drug gi tshogs skyes shing 'gags pa dang / skad cig ma gnyis pa'i gnas la mig gi 'dus te reg pa nas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar dag gi @326a *//
translated: The collection of the six consciousnesses arises and ceases, and in the second moment of abiding, the six collections of contact arise from the contact of eye up to the contact of mind.

original: 'dus te reg pa drug gi tshogs skye ba'i rgyu med do //
analyzed: 'dus te reg pa drug gi tshogs skye ba'i rgyu med do //
translated: There is no cause for the arising of the six collections of contact.

original: de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni /
analyzed: de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni /
translated: The contact of eye contact is

original: mig gi rnam par shes pas yul la reg pa la gnas pa'i bya ba ste /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pas yul la reg pa la gnas pa'i bya ba ste /
translated: the activity of abiding in the contact of the object by the eye consciousness.

original: chags par bya ba'i phyir skad cig ma gnyis pa la 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: chags par bya ba'i phyir skad cig ma gnyis pa la 'byung ba'o //
translated: It arises in the second moment in order to cause attachment.🔽It is

original: de ni / gnyis ka'ang dngos po med pa ste /
analyzed: de ni / gnyis ka'ang dngos po med pa ste /
translated: said that both are unreal,

original: nam mkha' la brtag pa'i mtshan nyid lta bu'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' la brtag pa'i mtshan nyid lta bu'o //
translated: like the characteristics of space.

original: mig gi yul gyi reg pa ni /🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'i chags par bya ba'i don du skad cig ma gnyis la 'byung ba ni /
analyzed: mig gi yul gyi reg pa ni / mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas pa'i chags par bya ba'i don du skad cig ma gnyis la 'byung ba ni /
translated: The contact of the object of the eye is

original: ma yin no //
analyzed: ma yin no //
translated: not the arising in the second moment in order to cause attachment to the object of the eye consciousness.

original: de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang brjod par bya'o //🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rkyen kyang gzugs kyi 'dus te reg pa la dmigs pa la yod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin du chags par bya ba'i phyir skad cig ma gnyis la 'byung ba ni /
analyzed: de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang brjod par bya'o // mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rkyen kyang gzugs kyi 'dus te reg pa la dmigs pa la yod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin du chags par bya ba'i phyir skad cig ma gnyis la 'byung ba ni /
translated: In the same way, the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind should be explained.

original: ma yin no //
analyzed: ma yin no //
translated: The condition of the eye consciousness is not the arising in the second moment in order to cause attachment to the nature of the characteristics that exist in the contact of the form aggregate.🔽It is

original: de ni / gnyis ka'ang dngos po med pa ste /
analyzed: de ni / gnyis ka'ang dngos po med pa ste /
translated: said that both are unreal,🔽like the characteristics of space.

original: nam mkha' la brtag pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' la brtag pa lta bu'o //
translated: It is like the sky.

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang brjod par bya'o //
translated: The same should be said of feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness.

original: mig ni / mig gis gnyis su med de /
analyzed: mig ni / mig gis gnyis su med de /
translated: The eye is not two.

original: gnyis ka'ang dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis ka'ang dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because both are unreal.

original: mig ni / mig gi rnam par shes pas gnyis su med de /
analyzed: mig ni / mig gi rnam par shes pas gnyis su med de /
translated: The eye is not two with the eye consciousness.

original: gnyis ka'ang dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis ka'ang dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because both are unreal.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang yul gyi 'dus te reg pa dang gnyis su med do //
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang yul gyi 'dus te reg pa dang gnyis su med do //
translated: The eye consciousness is not two with the object contact.

original: gnyis ka'ang dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis ka'ang dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because both are unreal.

original: de bzhin du gnas pa'i bya @326b ba'ang chags par byas pas gnyis su med cing dngos po med de /
analyzed: de bzhin du gnas pa'i bya @326b ba'ang chags par byas pas gnyis su med cing dngos po med de /
translated: In the same way, the bird of the mind, when it is caught, is not two and is unreal,

original: nam mkha' la brtag pa'i mtshan nyid lta bu'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nam mkha' la brtag pa'i mtshan nyid lta bu'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is like the characteristic of the sky.

original: dngos po 'di dag ni /
analyzed: dngos po 'di dag ni /
translated: These things

original: mtshan nyid med par rnam par brtag ste /
analyzed: mtshan nyid med par rnam par brtag ste /
translated: should be imagined to be without characteristics,

original: bya ba med pa; chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid zhen pa med pa'o //
analyzed: bya ba med pa; chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid zhen pa med pa'o //
translated: without action, without attachment, and without clinging.

original: dus gsum dang khams gsum de dag thams cad ni /
analyzed: dus gsum dang khams gsum de dag thams cad ni /
translated: All of the three times and the three realms

original: chos kyi dbyings rnam par mi rtog pa /
analyzed: chos kyi dbyings rnam par mi rtog pa /
translated: are the nonconceptual basic field of phenomena.

original: chos nges par sems pa /
analyzed: chos nges par sems pa /
translated: They are the ascertainment of phenomena,🔽without consciousness,

original: shes pa med pa; sbyor ba las rnam par bzlog pa /
analyzed: shes pa med pa; sbyor ba las rnam par bzlog pa /
translated: turned away from engagement,

original: dka' ba med pa /
analyzed: dka' ba med pa /
translated: without difficulty,

original: byis pa sems can ji lta ba bzhin du ming med pa /
analyzed: byis pa sems can ji lta ba bzhin du ming med pa /
translated: without names, just as they are, for childish beings,

original: rkyen med pa /
analyzed: rkyen med pa /
translated: without conditions,

original: kha dog dang mtshan ma med pa /
analyzed: kha dog dang mtshan ma med pa /
translated: without color or characteristics,

original: gnas pa med pa /
analyzed: gnas pa med pa /
translated: without location,

original: rnam par dmigs pa med pa /
analyzed: rnam par dmigs pa med pa /
translated: without observation,

original: brjod du med pa yin na /
analyzed: brjod du med pa yin na /
translated: and inexpressible.

original: nam mkha'i rang bzhin lta bu la chos dang chos kyi dbyings tha dad du 'byed do //
analyzed: nam mkha'i rang bzhin lta bu la chos dang chos kyi dbyings tha dad du 'byed do //
translated: In the nature of space, phenomena and the basic field of phenomena are distinguished.

original: rang gi rgyud kyi yongs su rtog pas chos kyi dbyings gcig la tshul sna tshogs kyis de ltar tha dad du 'byed do //
analyzed: rang gi rgyud kyi yongs su rtog pas chos kyi dbyings gcig la tshul sna tshogs kyis de ltar tha dad du 'byed do //
translated: Through their own conceptualization, they distinguish the single basic field of phenomena in various ways.

original: ming dang / rkyen dang / kha dog dang / mtshan dang dbyibs su 'dogs so //
analyzed: ming dang / rkyen dang / kha dog dang / mtshan dang dbyibs su 'dogs so //
translated: They impute names, conditions, colors, characteristics, and shapes.

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ni /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ni /
translated: The five sense pleasures

original: skye ba med pa /
analyzed: skye ba med pa /
translated: are unborn,

original: ldang ba med pa /
analyzed: ldang ba med pa /
translated: unarisen,

original: mtshan nyid med pa /
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa /
translated: without characteristics,🔽and without a basis.

original: rnam par gzhag pa med pa /
analyzed: rnam par gzhag pa med pa /
translated: It is not a presentation.

original: rnam par thar pa gsum ni /
analyzed: rnam par thar pa gsum ni /
translated: The three gates of liberation

original: dbyings gcig pa'i rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid de /
analyzed: dbyings gcig pa'i rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid de /
translated: are the very essence of the nature of the single realm.

original: dus gsum thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i lam lta bur rnam par dpyad ba ste /🔽des ni / mig gi yul dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i yul gyi 'dus te reg pa dang / khams gsum thams cad la 'jug pa dang / mtshan @327a *//
analyzed: dus gsum thams cad la rnam par mi rtog pa'i chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i lam lta bur rnam par dpyad ba ste / des ni / mig gi yul dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa'i yul gyi 'dus te reg pa dang / khams gsum thams cad la 'jug pa dang / mtshan @327a *//
translated: The three times are all analyzed in the nonconceptual realm, like the path of space.

original: dang; kha dog dang / dbyibs dang bral ba /
analyzed: dang; kha dog dang / dbyibs dang bral ba /
translated: Thus, the object of the eye, the object of the eye consciousness, the contact that arises from the union of the two, the engagement with all three realms, and the characteristics, colors, and shapes are all the realm of phenomena.

original: nam mkha' la brtag pa'i mtshan nyid lta bu la 'jug pa thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: nam mkha' la brtag pa'i mtshan nyid lta bu la 'jug pa thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: The engagement with all of them is like the characteristic of space.

original: de bzhin du rna ba dang; sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'dus te reg pa'ang gnyis su med pa ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du rna ba dang; sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i 'dus te reg pa'ang gnyis su med pa ste /
translated: In the same way, the contact of the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mental consciousnesses is nondual.

original: gnyis ka'ang dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnyis ka'ang dngos po med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Both are unreal.

original: nges na rnam par shes pa dang 'dus te reg pa ldang ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang / khams gsum thams cad dang / khong du chud pa dang / kha dog dang / mtshan dang / dbyibs khong du chud pa dang / nam mkha' la brtag pa la 'jug pa'ang chos kyi dbyings so //
analyzed: nges na rnam par shes pa dang 'dus te reg pa ldang ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang / khams gsum thams cad dang / khong du chud pa dang / kha dog dang / mtshan dang / dbyibs khong du chud pa dang / nam mkha' la brtag pa la 'jug pa'ang chos kyi dbyings so //
translated: understanding, color, characteristics, and shape are understood, and the engagement in the investigation of space is the dharma-dhātu.

original: gang reg pa'i skye ched drug la rnam par dpyod cing 'brel bar 'byung ba kun tu slong ba'i rnam par dpyod pa /
analyzed: gang reg pa'i skye ched drug la rnam par dpyod cing 'brel bar 'byung ba kun tu slong ba'i rnam par dpyod pa /
translated: That which investigates the six sense bases of contact and arouses dependent origination,

original: khong du chud pa /
analyzed: khong du chud pa /
translated: is understanding.

original: chags pa thams cad brjod pas bcings pa /
analyzed: chags pa thams cad brjod pas bcings pa /
translated: It is bound by the expression of all attachments.

original: bdud kyi dbang du song ba ni /
analyzed: bdud kyi dbang du song ba ni /
translated: Having fallen under the power of Māra,

original: bdud kyi 'dod pa ji lta ba bzhin du byed pa'o //
analyzed: bdud kyi 'dod pa ji lta ba bzhin du byed pa'o //
translated: one acts according to the desires of Māra.🔽That which does not investigate the six sense bases of contact, does not arouse non-arising,

original: gang reg pa'i skye mched drug la mi dpyod cing mi skye ba kun tu slong ba dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs thams cad sel ba dang / skad cig gis 'jig pa /
analyzed: gang reg pa'i skye mched drug la mi dpyod cing mi skye ba kun tu slong ba dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs thams cad sel ba dang / skad cig gis 'jig pa /
translated: removes all colors and shapes, and is momentary destruction,

original: nam mkha' la brtag pa'i mtshan nyid lta bu 'di ni /
analyzed: nam mkha' la brtag pa'i mtshan nyid lta bu 'di ni /
translated: like the characteristic of investigating space,🔽is the dharma-dhātu.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa brjod du med pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa brjod du med pa'i ye shes khong du chud pa'o //
translated: It is the realization of supramundane, inexpressible pristine awareness.🔽“

original: gang gzugs la ro mang zhing reg pa'i skye mched drug dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la rtag pa'am /
analyzed: gang gzugs la ro mang zhing reg pa'i skye mched drug dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la rtag pa'am /
translated: It is the realization that the six sense sources of contact with form, and the five sense pleasures, are either permanent or impermanent.

original: mi rtag pa zhes dpyod pa khong du chud cing chags pa thams cad @327b brjod pa'i bar dag kyang bdud kyi 'dod pa ji lta ba bzhin byed pa'o //🔽gang yang gzugs la ro myang ba dang / 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan dang / reg pa'i skye mched drug la rtag pa'am /
analyzed: mi rtag pa zhes dpyod pa khong du chud cing chags pa thams cad @327b brjod pa'i bar dag kyang bdud kyi 'dod pa ji lta ba bzhin byed pa'o // gang yang gzugs la ro myang ba dang / 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan dang / reg pa'i skye mched drug la rtag pa'am /
translated: It is the expression of all attachments, just as Mara desires.🔽“

original: mi rtag pa zhes rnam par dpyod par nus pa /
analyzed: mi rtag pa zhes rnam par dpyod par nus pa /
translated: It is the ability to analyze the taste of form, the five sense pleasures, and the six sense sources of contact with form, as either permanent or impermanent.

original: kun tu slong ba'i mtshan nyid yid la byed pa de ni /
analyzed: kun tu slong ba'i mtshan nyid yid la byed pa de ni /
translated: It is the attention that has the characteristic of motivation.

original: chags pa thams cad yongs su gcod pa /
analyzed: chags pa thams cad yongs su gcod pa /
translated: It is the complete elimination of all attachments.

original: 'jig rten las 'das pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa /
translated: It is supramundane.

original: brjod du med pa /
analyzed: brjod du med pa /
translated: It is inexpressible.

original: khong du chud pa'i byang chub kyi lam rnam par spyod pa'o //
analyzed: khong du chud pa'i byang chub kyi lam rnam par spyod pa'o //
translated: It is the realization of the path of awakening.🔽“

original: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang yang rnam par shes pa dang / reg pa'i skye mched drug la rtag pa'am /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang yang rnam par shes pa dang / reg pa'i skye mched drug la rtag pa'am /
translated: When one understands that the six sense sources of contact are neither permanent nor impermanent,

original: mi rtag pa zhes dpyod pa khong du chud pa chags pa thams cad brjod pa'i bar de'ang bdud kyi 'dod pa ji lta ba bzhin du byed pa'o //
analyzed: mi rtag pa zhes dpyod pa khong du chud pa chags pa thams cad brjod pa'i bar de'ang bdud kyi 'dod pa ji lta ba bzhin du byed pa'o //
translated: one will also understand that all attachments are expressions of the māras’ wishes.

original: gang yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang reg pa'i skye mched drug la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i ro myang bar mi byed cing mun pa'ang med pa /🔽snang ba'ang med de /
analyzed: gang yang yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang reg pa'i skye mched drug la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i ro myang bar mi byed cing mun pa'ang med pa / snang ba'ang med de /
translated: “When one does not experience the five sense objects with the six sense sources of contact and mental consciousness,🔽there is neither darkness nor light.

original: nam mkha' ltar gnyis lta bur bya ba ma yin pa 'di'ang 'jig rten las 'das pa /
analyzed: nam mkha' ltar gnyis lta bur bya ba ma yin pa 'di'ang 'jig rten las 'das pa /
translated: Like space, it is not dualistic.

original: brjod du med pa khong du chud pa'i byang chub kyi lam rnam par spyod pa'o //
analyzed: brjod du med pa khong du chud pa'i byang chub kyi lam rnam par spyod pa'o //
translated: This is the transcendent path of awakening, which is beyond expression and understanding.

original: chos 'di dag ni /
analyzed: chos 'di dag ni /
translated: “These phenomena

original: 'du shes dang / sems pa dang / skad cig ma'i rgyun gyis 'jug pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'du shes dang / sems pa dang / skad cig ma'i rgyun gyis 'jug pa ma yin no //
translated: are not engaged through the continuity of perceptions, thoughts, and moments.

original: reg pa phan tshun 'dres nas 'byung bar byed pa yang ma yin no //🔽skad cig ma'i rgyun gyis phan tshun skyed par byed pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: reg pa phan tshun 'dres nas 'byung bar byed pa yang ma yin no // skad cig ma'i rgyun gyis phan tshun skyed par byed pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: It is not that they are produced by mutual contact.🔽It is not that they are produced by a mutual generation through a stream of moments.

original: 'gog par byed pa'ang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'gog par byed pa'ang ma yin no //
translated: It is not that they are produced by mutual obstruction.

original: chos 'di dag ni /
analyzed: chos 'di dag ni /
translated: These phenomena

original: skad cig ma dang po la @328a *//
analyzed: skad cig ma dang po la @328a *//
translated: are produced in the first moment.

original: skyes nas skad cig ma 'di nyid la 'jig ste /
analyzed: skyes nas skad cig ma 'di nyid la 'jig ste /
translated: They are destroyed in that very moment.

original: skad cig ma gnyis pa la gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: skad cig ma gnyis pa la gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: They do not endure in the second moment.

original: de 'gags te reg pa'i skye mched drug dang / 'du shes dang sems pa 'jig pa'i skad cig ma gnyis pa la tshor ba skye'o //
analyzed: de 'gags te reg pa'i skye mched drug dang / 'du shes dang sems pa 'jig pa'i skad cig ma gnyis pa la tshor ba skye'o //
translated: When they are destroyed, feeling is produced in the second moment of the destruction of the six sense-spheres and the destruction of perception and intention.

original: de la tshor ba gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la tshor ba gang zhe na /
translated: What is feeling?

original: tshor ba'i tshogs drug go /
analyzed: tshor ba'i tshogs drug go /
translated: It is the group of six feelings.

original: mig gis reg nas tshor ba skye ste /
analyzed: mig gis reg nas tshor ba skye ste /
translated: Feeling is produced from contact with the eye.

original: rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba skye ste /🔽de'ang skad cig ma gcig ma yin /
analyzed: rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las skyes pa'i tshor ba skye ste / de'ang skad cig ma gcig ma yin /
translated: Feeling is produced from contact with the ear, nose, tongue, body, and mind.🔽It is not a single moment.

original: las gcig rnam par dmigs pa'i skad cig ma ma yin /
analyzed: las gcig rnam par dmigs pa'i skad cig ma ma yin /
translated: It is not a moment that is observed as a single action.

original: tshor ba gsum ni bde ba'i tshor ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang / bde ba'ang med sdug bsngal yang med pa'i tshor ba ste /
analyzed: tshor ba gsum ni bde ba'i tshor ba dang / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba dang / bde ba'ang med sdug bsngal yang med pa'i tshor ba ste /
translated: The three feelings are pleasant feeling, unpleasant feeling, and neither pleasant nor unpleasant feeling.

original: dus gsum dang / khams gsum thams cad kyi reg pa'i skye mched drug la tshor ba rnam pa gsum po stong bar khong du chud par bya ste /
analyzed: dus gsum dang / khams gsum thams cad kyi reg pa'i skye mched drug la tshor ba rnam pa gsum po stong bar khong du chud par bya ste /
translated: One should understand that the six sense bases of contact in the three times and in all the three realms are empty of the three kinds of feeling.

original: ji ltar sngar bstan pa bzhin no //
analyzed: ji ltar sngar bstan pa bzhin no //
translated: As it was explained above.

original: yang la la dag 'di skad ces reg pa'i skye mched drug las tshor ba rnam gsum skye ste /
analyzed: yang la la dag 'di skad ces reg pa'i skye mched drug las tshor ba rnam gsum skye ste /
translated: Some say that the three kinds of feeling arise from the six sense bases of contact.

original: skal pa mnyam par phung po la rnam par dpyod pa las gnas pa de lta bu ni rtag par lta ba zhes 'dzer to //
analyzed: skal pa mnyam par phung po la rnam par dpyod pa las gnas pa de lta bu ni rtag par lta ba zhes 'dzer to //
translated: They say that the view of permanence is to maintain a position that analyzes the aggregates in terms of sameness.

original: yang gang dag 'di skad ces gang reg pa'i skye mched drug las tshor ba rnam gsum skye ste /
analyzed: yang gang dag 'di skad ces gang reg pa'i skye mched drug las tshor ba rnam gsum skye ste /
translated: Some say that the three kinds of feeling arise from the six sense bases of contact.

original: phung po med pa'i tshig la gnas pa de lta bu'i chad pa zhes zer te /
analyzed: phung po med pa'i tshig la gnas pa de lta bu'i chad pa zhes zer te /
