translated: They say that the view of annihilation is to maintain a position that analyzes the aggregates in terms of difference.

original: gnyis ka'ang yongs su spang bar bya'o //
analyzed: gnyis ka'ang yongs su spang bar bya'o //
translated: Both of these should be abandoned.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: phung po rnams ni rnam par mi rtog pa ste /
analyzed: phung po rnams ni rnam par mi rtog pa ste /
translated: The aggregates are nonconceptual.

original: phyir ldog pa la gnas pa 'di @328b ni bzod pa'o //
analyzed: phyir ldog pa la gnas pa 'di @328b ni bzod pa'o //
translated: This patience is the patience of one who abides in the absence of return.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / 'byung ba chen po'i lus kyi phyi rol sems med pa de la ni bskye par bya ba'i gzugs dang / mi bya ba'i gzugs kyi glog gis snang bar byed /
analyzed: dper na / 'byung ba chen po'i lus kyi phyi rol sems med pa de la ni bskye par bya ba'i gzugs dang / mi bya ba'i gzugs kyi glog gis snang bar byed /
translated: For example, the external, mindless body of the great elements is illuminated by the lightning of form that is to be produced and the lightning of form that is not to be produced.

original: lus kyi nang du ni snang bar mi byed /
analyzed: lus kyi nang du ni snang bar mi byed /
translated: It does not illuminate the inside of the body.

original: glog ni gzugs kyi rkyen las skyes pa ma yin /
analyzed: glog ni gzugs kyi rkyen las skyes pa ma yin /
translated: Lightning does not arise from the condition of form.

original: gzugs rnam par dmigs pa ma yin /
analyzed: gzugs rnam par dmigs pa ma yin /
translated: Form is not observed.

original: gzugs kyi gnas ma yin /
analyzed: gzugs kyi gnas ma yin /
translated: It is not the abode of form.

original: gzugs kyi ro myang bar byed pa ma yin /
analyzed: gzugs kyi ro myang bar byed pa ma yin /
translated: It does not experience the taste of form.

original: glog gi gzugs phan tshun la 'jug pa ma yin /
analyzed: glog gi gzugs phan tshun la 'jug pa ma yin /
translated: The form of lightning does not mutually engage.

original: gzugs mtshan mar 'dzin pa ma yin /
analyzed: gzugs mtshan mar 'dzin pa ma yin /
translated: It does not apprehend the marks of form.

original: gzugs spangs nas snang bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs spangs nas snang bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not illuminate by abandoning form.

original: glog gi gzugs kyi sa dang mthun par 'brel te byung ba ma yin /
analyzed: glog gi gzugs kyi sa dang mthun par 'brel te byung ba ma yin /
translated: The form of lightning does not arise in connection with the earth.

original: gzugs la sogs pa dang / 'gag pa ma yin pa de bzhin du myur pa'i phyir reg pa'i skye mched drug la gzugs med pa'i phung po bzhi snang bar byed de /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa dang / 'gag pa ma yin pa de bzhin du myur pa'i phyir reg pa'i skye mched drug la gzugs med pa'i phung po bzhi snang bar byed de /
translated: Just as form and so on are not ceased, in the same way, because of speed, the four formless aggregates appear in the six sense bases of contact.

original: 'di la tshor ba gsum dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa 'jug go //
analyzed: 'di la tshor ba gsum dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa 'jug go //
translated: Here, the three feelings, perception, volitions, and consciousness engage.

original: 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rig pas 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal skyed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rig pas 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal skyed pa ma yin no //
translated: The appearance of perception, volitions, and consciousness does not produce the suffering of volitions.

original: tshor ba la gnas par ma yin no //🔽tshor ba sgrub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tshor ba la gnas par ma yin no // tshor ba sgrub pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not based on feeling.🔽It does not accomplish feeling.

original: tshor ba'i rjes su 'gro ba ma yin no //
analyzed: tshor ba'i rjes su 'gro ba ma yin no //
translated: It does not follow feeling.

original: tshor ba 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tshor ba 'phel bar byed pa ma yin no //
translated: It does not increase feeling.

original: tshor ba'i ro myang ba'i phyir ma yin no //🔽tshor ba mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i phyir ma yin no //
analyzed: tshor ba'i ro myang ba'i phyir ma yin no // tshor ba mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i phyir ma yin no //
translated: It is not for the sake of savoring the taste of feeling.🔽It is not for the sake of apprehending the signs of feeling.

original: tshor ba la kun tu dmigs pa'i phyir ma yin no //
analyzed: tshor ba la kun tu dmigs pa'i phyir ma yin no //
translated: It is not for the sake of observing feeling.

original: tshor ba'i ro myang ba dang mtshungs shing 'dra ba'i phung po la 'du @329a *//
analyzed: tshor ba'i ro myang ba dang mtshungs shing 'dra ba'i phung po la 'du @329a *//
translated: The aggregates are similar to and resemble the experience of sensations.🔽

original: byed kyi sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal ba'i sdug bsngal skyed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: byed kyi sdug bsngal dang / sdug bsngal ba'i sdug bsngal skyed pa ma yin no //
translated: The aggregates that are similar to and resemble the taste of feeling do not produce the suffering of formations and the suffering of suffering.

original: tshor ba skyes pa na 'du byed 'gag pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tshor ba skyes pa na 'du byed 'gag pa ma yin no //
translated: When feeling arises, formations do not cease.

original: tshor ba 'gags pa na 'du byed rnams gsog pa ma yin no //
analyzed: tshor ba 'gags pa na 'du byed rnams gsog pa ma yin no //
translated: When feeling ceases, formations do not accumulate.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: dper na / glog ni /
analyzed: dper na / glog ni /
translated: for example,

original: nam mkha' bor nas gzugs rnams la snang bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: nam mkha' bor nas gzugs rnams la snang bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: lightning does not appear in forms after leaving the sky.

original: nam mkha' dang glog gnyis ka'ang rdzas med cing brjod du med pa de bzhin du chos rnams dang / ming dang gzugs dang / tshor ba rnams kyang phan tshun tha dad par mi byed do //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang glog gnyis ka'ang rdzas med cing brjod du med pa de bzhin du chos rnams dang / ming dang gzugs dang / tshor ba rnams kyang phan tshun tha dad par mi byed do //
translated: Just as the sky and lightning are both substanceless and inexpressible, so too phenomena, names and forms, and feelings do not make each other different.

original: khams gsum thams cad kyang rjes med pa /
analyzed: khams gsum thams cad kyang rjes med pa /
translated: The entire three realms are without trace,

original: brjod du med pa /
analyzed: brjod du med pa /
translated: inexpressible,

original: yi ge med pa ste /
analyzed: yi ge med pa ste /
translated: and without letters.

original: skad cig ma'i rgyun gyis gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: skad cig ma'i rgyun gyis gnas pa ma yin /
translated: They do not abide as a continuum of moments.

original: phan tshun du gsog cing 'phel bas chos kyi dbyings tha dad du byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: phan tshun du gsog cing 'phel bas chos kyi dbyings tha dad du byed pa ma yin te /
translated: They are not differentiated by the realm of phenomena.

original: des na de dag ni; stong pa'o //
analyzed: des na de dag ni; stong pa'o //
translated: Therefore, they are empty.

original: skad cig ma gang la skyes ba skad cig ma de nyid la 'gag ste /
analyzed: skad cig ma gang la skyes ba skad cig ma de nyid la 'gag ste /
translated: The moment they arise, they cease.

original: skad cig ma'i rgyun la gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: skad cig ma'i rgyun la gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: They do not remain in a continuum of moments.

original: des na khams gsum dang / dus gsum dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched thams cad 'byung ba med pa /
analyzed: des na khams gsum dang / dus gsum dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched thams cad 'byung ba med pa /
translated: Therefore, the three realms, the three times, and all the aggregates, elements, and sense sources are non-arising,

original: spyod pa med pa /
analyzed: spyod pa med pa /
translated: non-abiding,

original: brjod du med pa /🔽stong pa'o // me tog gi glog gis brgyan pa 'di ni /
analyzed: brjod du med pa / stong pa'o // me tog gi glog gis brgyan pa 'di ni /
translated: inexpressible,🔽and empty.

original: rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zad mi shes pa snang ba'i chos kyi sgo'i gnas tshul zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zad mi shes pa snang ba'i chos kyi sgo'i gnas tshul zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called the principle of the Dharma gateway of the appearance of the inexhaustible ocean mudrā.

original: skad cig ma dang po la tshor ba skyes te 'gags nas skad cig ma gnyis pa la sred pa skye'o //
analyzed: skad cig ma dang po la tshor ba skyes te 'gags nas skad cig ma gnyis pa la sred pa skye'o //
translated: In the first moment, feeling arises and ceases, and in the second moment, craving arises.

original: de la sred pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la sred pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is craving?

original: @329b sred pa'i tshogs drug ste /
analyzed: @329b sred pa'i tshogs drug ste /
translated: It is the six groups of craving.

original: mig gi 'dus te reg pa nas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar gyi sred pa 'byung ngo //
analyzed: mig gi 'dus te reg pa nas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i bar gyi sred pa 'byung ngo //
translated: Craving arises from the contact of the eye up to the contact of the mind.

original: gang gzugs la mngon par dga' ba /
analyzed: gang gzugs la mngon par dga' ba /
translated: One who delights in form

original: gti mug gi dra ba sgrub pa /
analyzed: gti mug gi dra ba sgrub pa /
translated: creates the net of delusion.

original: lus dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya la 'jug pa thibs po ni /
analyzed: lus dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya la 'jug pa thibs po ni /
translated: The thicket of engaging in form, sound, smell, taste, and touch

original: nam mkha' bzhin no //
analyzed: nam mkha' bzhin no //
translated: is like space.

original: zugs la yongs su mi rtog pa'i tshor ba ni /
analyzed: zugs la yongs su mi rtog pa'i tshor ba ni /
translated: The feeling that does not conceive of form

original: glog dang nam mkha' bzhin no //
analyzed: glog dang nam mkha' bzhin no //
translated: is like lightning and space.

original: 'du shes ni /
analyzed: 'du shes ni /
translated: Perception

original: rlung dang nam mkha' bzhin no //
analyzed: rlung dang nam mkha' bzhin no //
translated: is like wind and space.

original: 'du byed rnams ni /
analyzed: 'du byed rnams ni /
translated: Formations

original: sprin med pa'i nam mkha' bzhin no //
analyzed: sprin med pa'i nam mkha' bzhin no //
translated: are like cloudless space.

original: rnam par shes pa ni /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa ni /
translated: Consciousness

original: smig rgyu ba dang nam mkha' bzhin no //
analyzed: smig rgyu ba dang nam mkha' bzhin no //
translated: is like a mirage and space.

original: gzugs las yongs su mi rtog cing thar zug tu mos te /
analyzed: gzugs las yongs su mi rtog cing thar zug tu mos te /
translated: Not conceiving of form, being devoted to liberation,

original: mi rtag pa nyid yongs su mi rtog pa 'di ni /
analyzed: mi rtag pa nyid yongs su mi rtog pa 'di ni /
translated: and not conceiving of impermanence

original: srid pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: srid pa zhes bya'o //
translated: is called existence.

original: gzhan yang gzugs la sdug bsngal du yongs su mi rtog pa dang / sgra dang dri la kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog par yongs su mi rtog pa dang / ro la lam du yongs su mi rtog pa dang / reg bya la skye ba dang /
analyzed: gzhan yang gzugs la sdug bsngal du yongs su mi rtog pa dang / sgra dang dri la kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog par yongs su mi rtog pa dang / ro la lam du yongs su mi rtog pa dang / reg bya la skye ba dang /
translated: Furthermore, they do not fully understand form as suffering,🔽they do not fully understand sound and smell as the origin of suffering,🔽they do not fully understand taste as the path,

original: 'gog pa brjod du med par yongs su mi rtog pa 'di ni /
analyzed: 'gog pa brjod du med par yongs su mi rtog pa 'di ni /
translated: and they do not fully understand touch as arising and ceasing.🔽This is the realm of existence.

original: srid pa'i gnas la chags pa /
analyzed: srid pa'i gnas la chags pa /
translated: It is attached to the abodes of existence,

original: khams gsum thams cad du 'phro ba /
analyzed: khams gsum thams cad du 'phro ba /
translated: it extends throughout the three realms,

original: dus gsum gyi dngos po la srid pa'i gnas zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dus gsum gyi dngos po la srid pa'i gnas zhes bya'o //
translated: and it is called the realm of existence in the three times.

original: byis pa so so'i skye ba ngan pa rnams ni /
analyzed: byis pa so so'i skye ba ngan pa rnams ni /
translated: Evil ordinary beings

original: 'khor ba'i chu klung gi rgyun gyi shugs 'bab pa la mngon par brtson pa ste /
analyzed: 'khor ba'i chu klung gi rgyun gyi shugs 'bab pa la mngon par brtson pa ste /
translated: are engaged in the flow of the river of saṃsāra.

original: de la byang chub sems dpas gzugs la 'di ltar tshul bzhin gyis so sor brtag par bya ste /🔽'byung ba chen po bzhi'i @330a *//
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpas gzugs la 'di ltar tshul bzhin gyis so sor brtag par bya ste / 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i @330a *//
translated: Regarding that, bodhisattvas should properly investigate form in the following way:🔽This form of the four great elements

original: gzugs 'di ni /
analyzed: gzugs 'di ni /
translated: is impermanent,

original: nad dang / 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: nad dang / 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid do //
translated: and has the characteristic of cessation.

original: gang rab tu rnam par 'jig pa'i mtshan nyi de ni /
analyzed: gang rab tu rnam par 'jig pa'i mtshan nyi de ni /
translated: The characteristic of complete destruction

original: mi rtag pa ste /
analyzed: mi rtag pa ste /
translated: is impermanence.

original: ji ltar 'byung ba chen po yongs su brtag pa sngar bstan pa de bzhin du so sor brtag go /
analyzed: ji ltar 'byung ba chen po yongs su brtag pa sngar bstan pa de bzhin du so sor brtag go /
translated: Just as the great elements were previously examined, so should they be individually examined.

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la ni /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la ni /
translated: The five sense pleasures

original: sdong po'i tshul du so sor brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: sdong po'i tshul du so sor brtag par bya ste /
translated: should be individually examined in the manner of a tree trunk.

original: ji ltar sdong po nam mkha' la gnas bcas te mi gnas shing sa la brten te gnas pa de bzhin du gzugs ni /
analyzed: ji ltar sdong po nam mkha' la gnas bcas te mi gnas shing sa la brten te gnas pa de bzhin du gzugs ni /
translated: Just as a tree trunk is not established in space but is established in the earth, so form

original: dbu ba'i gong bu lta bu ste /
analyzed: dbu ba'i gong bu lta bu ste /
translated: is like a bubble on water.

original: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i rnam par dmigs pas gzugs dang gzugs med pa la 'jug /
analyzed: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i rnam par dmigs pas gzugs dang gzugs med pa la 'jug /
translated: Since form and the formless are observed, one engages with form and the formless.

original: gzugs dang gzugs med pa dang mi 'bral /
analyzed: gzugs dang gzugs med pa dang mi 'bral /
translated: One is not separate from form and the formless.

original: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i las dang / gzugs dang gzugs med pa spangs nas dbu ba'i gong bu ltar snying po med par brtags na stong pa ste /
analyzed: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i las dang / gzugs dang gzugs med pa spangs nas dbu ba'i gong bu ltar snying po med par brtags na stong pa ste /
translated: When the karma of form and the formless and form and the formless are abandoned and examined as being without essence, like a bubble, they are empty.

original: 'jug pa dang mi 'jug pa ni /
analyzed: 'jug pa dang mi 'jug pa ni /
translated: Engaging and not engaging

original: ji ltar rlung 'dus pa'i rkyen gyis kha nas sgra 'byung ba /
analyzed: ji ltar rlung 'dus pa'i rkyen gyis kha nas sgra 'byung ba /
translated: Just as the sound that comes out of the mouth is a condition of the gathering of the winds,

original: yi ge med cing brjod du med pa de bzhin du khams gsum gyi sgra'ang stong par khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: yi ge med cing brjod du med pa de bzhin du khams gsum gyi sgra'ang stong par khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: and is without syllables and inexpressible, so one should understand that the sounds of the three realms are empty.

original: ji ltar rlung 'dus pa dang / nam mkha'i rlung dang / nam mkha' dri med de stong pa de bzhin du khams gsum yang dri lta bur khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: ji ltar rlung 'dus pa dang / nam mkha'i rlung dang / nam mkha' dri med de stong pa de bzhin du khams gsum yang dri lta bur khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: Just as the gathering of the winds, the wind of space, and the stainless space are empty, so one should understand that the three realms are like smells.

original: ji ltar bum pa char ba'i thigs pas gang yang de'i nang du sus kyang thigs pa blugs pa med /
analyzed: ji ltar bum pa char ba'i thigs pas gang yang de'i nang du sus kyang thigs pa blugs pa med /
translated: Just as a vase is filled with drops of rain, and no one puts those drops in it,

original: bsgrubs pa med /
analyzed: bsgrubs pa med /
translated: it is not established,

original: byas pa med /
analyzed: byas pa med /
translated: it is not made,

original: byed du bcug pa med de /
analyzed: byed du bcug pa med de /
translated: and it is not caused to be made,

original: thams cad yongs su bzung ba dang / nye bar spyod pa dang bral @330b pa de bzhin du khams gsum bdag dang bcas pa'i ro'i yon tan yang stong par khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: thams cad yongs su bzung ba dang / nye bar spyod pa dang bral @330b pa de bzhin du khams gsum bdag dang bcas pa'i ro'i yon tan yang stong par khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: and it is free from being appropriated and being used, so one should understand that the three realms, which have the quality of taste, are empty.

original: ji ltar bum pa gar yang nam mkha' dang 'dres par bsgrubs ba med de /
analyzed: ji ltar bum pa gar yang nam mkha' dang 'dres par bsgrubs ba med de /
translated: Just as a vase is not established as being mixed with space anywhere,

original: ji ltar nam mkha' la ma yin /
analyzed: ji ltar nam mkha' la ma yin /
translated: How is it not in space?

original: nam mkha' dang bum pa phan tshun reg pa dang bral ba /
analyzed: nam mkha' dang bum pa phan tshun reg pa dang bral ba /
translated: Space and a pot are mutually devoid of contact.

original: sems med pa de bzhin du khams gsum gyi reg pa'ang stong par khong du chud par bya'o //🔽'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la gti mug gi 'khor los bung ba me tog gi dri la chags pa de bzhin du gang yang 'dod pa'i sred pa dang / gang yang gzugs kyi sred pa 'di dag ni /
analyzed: sems med pa de bzhin du khams gsum gyi reg pa'ang stong par khong du chud par bya'o // 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la gti mug gi 'khor los bung ba me tog gi dri la chags pa de bzhin du gang yang 'dod pa'i sred pa dang / gang yang gzugs kyi sred pa 'di dag ni /
translated: Just as space is devoid of mind, so too should one understand the contact of the three realms to be empty.🔽Just as a bee is attached to the scent of a flower, so too is one who is attached to the five sense pleasures due to the wheel of delusion.

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i tshul gyis stong par khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga'i tshul gyis stong par khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: Just as one who is attached to the five sense pleasures is empty, so too should one understand the craving for the five sense pleasures and the craving for form to be empty.

original: gang yang gzugs med pa'i phung po bzhi la srid pa gzugs med pa ni /
analyzed: gang yang gzugs med pa'i phung po bzhi la srid pa gzugs med pa ni /
translated: The four formless aggregates that are the existence of the formless realm

original: yi ge med pa rang bzhin med pa ste /
analyzed: yi ge med pa rang bzhin med pa ste /
translated: are without syllables and without intrinsic nature.

original: cung zad ma yod pa'i tshul gyis ji ltar sngar bstan pa bzhin du stong par khong du chu par bya'o //
analyzed: cung zad ma yod pa'i tshul gyis ji ltar sngar bstan pa bzhin du stong par khong du chu par bya'o //
translated: Just as they do not exist in the slightest, so too should one understand them to be empty, just as they were previously explained.

original: ji ltar nam mkha' la brten te rlung rgyu ba nam mkha' la rlung gis 'dres par byas shing chags pa yang med de /
analyzed: ji ltar nam mkha' la brten te rlung rgyu ba nam mkha' la rlung gis 'dres par byas shing chags pa yang med de /
translated: Just as the wind moves in dependence on space, the wind mixes with space, but it is not attached to it.

original: nam mkha' las kyang rlung la ma yin zhing gnyis ka'ang brjod du med cing yi ge srid pa de bzhin du gzugs med pa'i phung pa la'ang phan tshun dngos po med par 'grub cing ldan pa ste /
analyzed: nam mkha' las kyang rlung la ma yin zhing gnyis ka'ang brjod du med cing yi ge srid pa de bzhin du gzugs med pa'i phung pa la'ang phan tshun dngos po med par 'grub cing ldan pa ste /
translated: The wind is not in space, and both are inexpressible and beyond syllables. In the same way, the formless aggregates are established as mutually insubstantial and connected.

original: phan tshun gnod pa dang / sbyor ba dang / 'dre ba dang / chags pa dang / gnod pa bskyed pa med pa de bzhin du phung po 'di dag yang chos thams cad mi skye ba'i tshul gyis dngos po'i mtshan nyid du nye bar mi 'gro zhing skyed pa med par khong du chud @331a *//
analyzed: phan tshun gnod pa dang / sbyor ba dang / 'dre ba dang / chags pa dang / gnod pa bskyed pa med pa de bzhin du phung po 'di dag yang chos thams cad mi skye ba'i tshul gyis dngos po'i mtshan nyid du nye bar mi 'gro zhing skyed pa med par khong du chud @331a *//
translated: They do not harm each other, nor do they combine, mix, attach, or generate harm. In the same way, these aggregates do not approach the characteristics of entities in the manner of all phenomena being unborn, and they are not generated.

original: par bya'o // ji ltar nam mkha' dang / rlung dang / glog yi ge med cing brjod du med de lhan cig tu rgyu'ang phan tshun chags pa med pa de bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa'ang zad pa med de //
analyzed: par bya'o // ji ltar nam mkha' dang / rlung dang / glog yi ge med cing brjod du med de lhan cig tu rgyu'ang phan tshun chags pa med pa de bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa'ang zad pa med de //
translated: Just as space, wind, and lightning are without letters and inexpressible, and although they move together, they are not mutually attached, in the same way, nirvana is not exhausted.

original: ji ltar mya ngan las 'das pa zad pa'ang ma yin mi zad pa'ang ma yin pa de bzhin du chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam ste /
analyzed: ji ltar mya ngan las 'das pa zad pa'ang ma yin mi zad pa'ang ma yin pa de bzhin du chos thams cad mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam ste /
translated: Just as nirvana is neither exhausted nor inexhaustible, all phenomena are the same as nirvana.

original: mnyam pa'ang med /
analyzed: mnyam pa'ang med /
translated: There is no sameness,🔽and there is no difference.

original: mi mnyam pa'ang med la gnyen po mi dmigs te /🔽gnyis su bya ba ma yin zhing chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par spyod par shes nas chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag pa'i mtha' la skye ba'am /
analyzed: mi mnyam pa'ang med la gnyen po mi dmigs te / gnyis su bya ba ma yin zhing chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par spyod par shes nas chos kyi dbyings dang yang dag pa'i mtha' la skye ba'am /
translated: There is no antidote to be observed,🔽and all phenomena are not to be made dual.

original: 'gag pa cung zad mi sems te /
analyzed: 'gag pa cung zad mi sems te /
translated: When one understands that all phenomena are practiced in the same way as the realm of phenomena, one does not think that the realm of phenomena or the limit of reality arises or ceases in the slightest.

original: des na chos kyi dbyings ni /
analyzed: des na chos kyi dbyings ni /
translated: Therefore, the realm of phenomena

original: gnas med pa'i mtha' ste /🔽de ni / yang dag pa'i mtha'o /
analyzed: gnas med pa'i mtha' ste / de ni / yang dag pa'i mtha'o /
translated: is the limit of the absence of location.🔽That is the limit of reality.

original: gang yang dag pa'i mtha' de ni /
analyzed: gang yang dag pa'i mtha' de ni /
translated: That which is the limit of reality🔽is the limit of the realm of phenomena.

original: chos thams cad kyi mtha'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyi mtha'o //
translated: It is the limit of all phenomena.

original: de ni / dkyil 'khor gsum yongs su gcod pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: de ni / dkyil 'khor gsum yongs su gcod pa'i mtha'o //
translated: It is the limit of the complete discernment of the three circles.

original: de ni / gcod pa med cing byed pa med pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: de ni / gcod pa med cing byed pa med pa'i mtha'o //
translated: It is the limit of non-severance and non-performance.

original: de ni / chad pa med cing rtag pa med pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: de ni / chad pa med cing rtag pa med pa'i mtha'o //
translated: It is the limit of non-annihilation and non-permanence.

original: ji lta ba bzhin gyi mtha' ste /
analyzed: ji lta ba bzhin gyi mtha' ste /
translated: It is the limit of reality.

original: mtha' des chos thams cad mthar gyur pa ste /
analyzed: mtha' des chos thams cad mthar gyur pa ste /
translated: By this limit, all phenomena are limited.

original: mtha' ji snyed pa dang / mtha' med pa ni /
analyzed: mtha' ji snyed pa dang / mtha' med pa ni /
translated: The limit of the extent of the limit and the limit of the absence of limit

original: mi gnyis pa ste /
analyzed: mi gnyis pa ste /
translated: are non-dual.

original: srid pa'i sred pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: srid pa'i sred pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because craving for existence is not apprehended.

original: srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / gang zag thams cad ni /
analyzed: srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / gang zag thams cad ni /
translated: All life, transmigration, nurture, and persons

original: gnyis su med pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'i mtha'o //
translated: are the limit of non-duality.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / 'jig tshogs kyi mtha' dang / sred pa sel ba'ang @331b mi gnyis pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / 'jig tshogs kyi mtha' dang / sred pa sel ba'ang @331b mi gnyis pa'i mtha'o //
translated: The limit of reality, the limit of the perishable collection, and the removal of craving are also the limit of non-duality.

original: de ltar na 'jig tshogs kyi mtha' dang / 'dod pa gcod pa yod do //
analyzed: de ltar na 'jig tshogs kyi mtha' dang / 'dod pa gcod pa yod do //
translated: Thus, the limit of the perishable collection and the cutting off of desire exist.

original: de ltar rab tu shes na 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i cha nyi shur 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar rab tu shes na 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i cha nyi shur 'gyur ro //
translated: If known thus, the twenty aspects of the view of the perishable collection arise.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' ni /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' ni /
translated: The limit of reality

original: sred pa'i 'jug pa dang mtshungs pa nyid ma yin no //
analyzed: sred pa'i 'jug pa dang mtshungs pa nyid ma yin no //
translated: is not the same as the engagement of craving.

original: yang dag pa'i mtha' ni /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i mtha' ni /
translated: The limit of reality

original: song ba med do //
analyzed: song ba med do //
translated: is not gone.

original: nam song pa na zad pa med 'god pa med de /
analyzed: nam song pa na zad pa med 'god pa med de /
translated: When it is gone, it is not exhausted or discarded.

original: shin tu mthar gyur pa de bzhin dus red pa'ang mi zad pa'i sgo ste /
analyzed: shin tu mthar gyur pa de bzhin dus red pa'ang mi zad pa'i sgo ste /
translated: Just as it is the ultimate, so it is the door to inexhaustibility.

original: chos thams cad kyang mi zad pa'i rang bzhin med pa'o //
analyzed: chos thams cad kyang mi zad pa'i rang bzhin med pa'o //
translated: All phenomena are also the nature of inexhaustibility.

original: chos thams cad ma skyes par shes nas kun nas bskor ba thams cad gcod pa ni /
analyzed: chos thams cad ma skyes par shes nas kun nas bskor ba thams cad gcod pa ni /
translated: When all phenomena are known to be unborn, the cutting off of all entanglements

original: brjod du med pa'i don sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha' yas pa yongs su 'grub pa sgrub pa'i bzod pa'i sgo'i gter gyi gzungs rab tu thob bo //
analyzed: brjod du med pa'i don sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha' yas pa yongs su 'grub pa sgrub pa'i bzod pa'i sgo'i gter gyi gzungs rab tu thob bo //
translated: is the attainment of the treasure of the dhāraṇī gateway of acceptance that accomplishes the infinite buddha bodies of the inexpressible meaning.

original: gzungs de rab tu thob nas byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi sku mngon par grub pa ston te /
analyzed: gzungs de rab tu thob nas byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi sku mngon par grub pa ston te /
translated: Having attained that dhāraṇī, the bodhisattva displays the accomplishment of the buddha bodies in the ten directions.

original: mig gi mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo bar sems can rnams la 'chi 'pho dang skye ba'ang ston la /
analyzed: mig gi mnyam pa nyid las mi g-yo bar sems can rnams la 'chi 'pho dang skye ba'ang ston la /
translated: Without wavering from the sameness of the eyes, he displays to sentient beings death, transmigration, and birth.

original: 'chi 'pho'ang med /
analyzed: 'chi 'pho'ang med /
translated: There is no death and transmigration.

original: skye ba'ang med /
analyzed: skye ba'ang med /
translated: There is no birth.

original: gang du'ang 'gro zhing 'ong bar 'jug pa'ang med de /
analyzed: gang du'ang 'gro zhing 'ong bar 'jug pa'ang med de /
translated: There is no going or coming anywhere.

original: 'du byed rnams la rnam par rtog pa'ang med do //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams la rnam par rtog pa'ang med do //
translated: There is no conceptualization in formations.

original: de ltar don du gnyer zhing mngon par rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams skad cig la sred pa zhugs nas skad cig ma gnyis pa la len pa mngon par 'grub bo //
analyzed: de ltar don du gnyer zhing mngon par rtog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams skad cig la sred pa zhugs nas skad cig ma gnyis pa la len pa mngon par 'grub bo //
translated: Thus, the bodhisattvas who strive and conceptualize in this way enter into craving in one moment, and in the second moment, grasping is accomplished.

original: len pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: len pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is grasping?

original: len pa bzhi ste /🔽gzugs kyi len pa dang / lta ba'i len pa dang / tshul khrims kyi len pa dang / bdag @332a *//
analyzed: len pa bzhi ste / gzugs kyi len pa dang / lta ba'i len pa dang / tshul khrims kyi len pa dang / bdag @332a *//
translated: There are four graspings:

original: tu smra ba'i len pa'o //
analyzed: tu smra ba'i len pa'o //
translated: grasping at form, grasping at views, grasping at morality and asceticism, and grasping at self-theories.

original: de la 'dod pa'i len pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la 'dod pa'i len pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is grasping at sensuality?

original: 'dod pa'i ro myang bar byed pa dang / bde ba la mngon par dga' zhing mngon par chags zhen pa 'di ni /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i ro myang bar byed pa dang / bde ba la mngon par dga' zhing mngon par chags zhen pa 'di ni /
translated: It is the enjoyment of the taste of sensuality, the delight in and attachment to pleasure.

original: 'dod pa'i len pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i len pa zhes bya'o //
translated: This is called grasping at sensuality.

original: de la lta ba'i len pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la lta ba'i len pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is grasping at views?

original: chad pa'am rtag pa zhes bya ba na lta bar song ba drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi bar de ni /
analyzed: chad pa'am rtag pa zhes bya ba na lta bar song ba drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi bar de ni /
translated: The view of annihilation and the view of permanence, up to the sixty-two views that are called views,

original: lta ba'i len pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: lta ba'i len pa zhes bya'o //
translated: are called the grasping of views.

original: de la tshul khrims kyi len pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la tshul khrims kyi len pa gang zhe na /
translated: What is the grasping of morality and rituals?

original: gang dag 'phags pa'i bstan pa'i tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub dang / tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa dang / gang yang zhags pa 'thub pa dgu bcu rtsa lnga'i tshul khrims dang /🔽brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub dang / tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa 'di ni /
analyzed: gang dag 'phags pa'i bstan pa'i tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub dang / tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa dang / gang yang zhags pa 'thub pa dgu bcu rtsa lnga'i tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs dang / dka' thub dang / tshangs par spyod pa'i gnas dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsnyungs pa 'di ni /
translated: It is the morality, rituals, austerities, celibacy, ascetic practices, and frugality that are taught by the noble ones, as well as the morality, rituals, austerities, celibacy, ascetic practices, and frugality of the ninety-five non-Buddhist paths.

original: tshul khrims kyi len pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi len pa'o //
translated: This is called the grasping of morality and rituals.

original: gang dag 'di snyam du sems te /
analyzed: gang dag 'di snyam du sems te /
translated: Those who think, This is the truth,

original: bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed can dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa dang / ldang bar byed pa dang / ldang bar byed du 'jug pa dang /
analyzed: bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / shed las skyes pa dang / shed can dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa dang / ldang bar byed pa dang / ldang bar byed du 'jug pa dang /
translated: a self, a sentient being, a life-force, an individual, a human, a human being, a person, an agent, an instigator, one who rises up, one who causes to rise up,

original: tshor ba po dang / skyed pa po dang / skyed du 'jug pa 'byung zhing 'byung ba yod do snyam pa 'di ni /
analyzed: tshor ba po dang / skyed pa po dang / skyed du 'jug pa 'byung zhing 'byung ba yod do snyam pa 'di ni /
translated: a feeler, a producer, or one who causes to produce.

original: bdag tu smra ba'i len pa zhes bya ste /
analyzed: bdag tu smra ba'i len pa zhes bya ste /
translated: This is called the grasping of the doctrine of self.

original: de dag ni /
analyzed: de dag ni /
translated: These are

original: len pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: len pa bzhi'o //
translated: the four graspings.

original: de la byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i tshul gyis yang dag pa ma yin pa dang / ma byung @332b bar rtog go /
analyzed: de la byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i tshul gyis yang dag pa ma yin pa dang / ma byung @332b bar rtog go /
translated: Regarding these, bodhisattvas understand that, in terms of the inexpressible, they are unreal and do not arise.

original: chos thams cad mtshan nyid gcig ste /
analyzed: chos thams cad mtshan nyid gcig ste /
translated: All phenomena have a single characteristic.

original: dbyer med pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa dang / brjod du med pa dang / tshig gi lam ma yin pa dang / chu'i zla ba lta bu dang / nam mkha' la rtag pa'i mtshan nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med par yongs su rtog go /
analyzed: dbyer med pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa dang / brjod du med pa dang / tshig gi lam ma yin pa dang / chu'i zla ba lta bu dang / nam mkha' la rtag pa'i mtshan nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med par yongs su rtog go /
translated: They are non-existent, inexpressible, not a path of words, like the moon in the water, characterized by permanence in space, and inseparable from the realm of phenomena.

original: gang la 'dod pa'i ro myang zhing mngon par dga' ba de ni /
analyzed: gang la 'dod pa'i ro myang zhing mngon par dga' ba de ni /
translated: Those who enjoy and delight in desires

original: sdug bsngal la mngon par dga' ba'o //
analyzed: sdug bsngal la mngon par dga' ba'o //
translated: delight in suffering.

original: 'dod pa'i gnas so //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i gnas so //
translated: They are the abode of desires,

original: mngon par zhen pa'o //
analyzed: mngon par zhen pa'o //
translated: they are attachment.

original: byang chub sems dpa' gang mig gis shes par bya ba'i gzugs mdzes pa /
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' gang mig gis shes par bya ba'i gzugs mdzes pa /
translated: When a bodhisattva sees with the eye forms that are beautiful,

original: sdug pa / yid du 'ong ba mthong na /🔽mig gi rnam par shes pa la me'i phung po ji lta ba bzhin du tshul bzhin gyis rtog ste /
analyzed: sdug pa / yid du 'ong ba mthong na / mig gi rnam par shes pa la me'i phung po ji lta ba bzhin du tshul bzhin gyis rtog ste /
translated: pleasing, and attractive,🔽he or she should properly contemplate the eye consciousness as being like a mass of fire.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pas brtag tu med pa'i phung po de'ang rdzas med pa /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pas brtag tu med pa'i phung po de'ang rdzas med pa /
translated: That unobservable mass should be contemplated as being substanceless,

original: brjod du med pa /
analyzed: brjod du med pa /
translated: inexpressible,

original: yi ge med pa /
analyzed: yi ge med pa /
translated: without syllables,

original: dngos po mi dmigs par rtog go /
analyzed: dngos po mi dmigs par rtog go /
translated: and without observable entities.

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa de'ang dngos po mi dmigs pa'i phyir rdzas med pa /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa de'ang dngos po mi dmigs pa'i phyir rdzas med pa /
translated: That eye consciousness is also not a substance because a thing is not observed.

original: mtshan nyid med pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan nyid med pa'o //
translated: It is without characteristics.

original: nam mkha' dang / me dang / mig de'ang dngos po mi dmigs pas brjod du med cing yi ge med pa de bzhin du gzugs sdug pa nas 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i bar du mthong na mig gi rnam par shes pa de dang / gzugs de gnyis ka dang /
analyzed: nam mkha' dang / me dang / mig de'ang dngos po mi dmigs pas brjod du med cing yi ge med pa de bzhin du gzugs sdug pa nas 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i bar du mthong na mig gi rnam par shes pa de dang / gzugs de gnyis ka dang /
translated: Just as space, fire, and the eye are inexpressible and without syllables because a thing is not observed, in the same way, when a beautiful form up to one endowed with desire is seen, that eye consciousness and both that form

original: bar gyi nam mkha'i bar du'ang dngos po mi dmigs so //
analyzed: bar gyi nam mkha'i bar du'ang dngos po mi dmigs so //
translated: and the space in between are not observed as a thing.

original: gang gis me mthong ba'i mig gi rnam par shes pa skyes nas de 'gags te skad cig ma gnyis pa la gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gis me mthong ba'i mig gi rnam par shes pa skyes nas de 'gags te skad cig ma gnyis pa la gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: The eye consciousness that sees fire arises and ceases. It does not remain in the second moment.

original: skad cig ma gnyis pa la tshor ba skye ste /
analyzed: skad cig ma gnyis pa la tshor ba skye ste /
translated: In the second moment, feeling arises.

original: @333a *// ji ltar 'od 'phro ba'i phung po bzhin du dmigs so //
analyzed: @333a *// ji ltar 'od 'phro ba'i phung po bzhin du dmigs so //
translated: It is observed like a mass of light.

original: tshor ba de'ang brjod du med pa /🔽yi ge med pa /
analyzed: tshor ba de'ang brjod du med pa / yi ge med pa /
translated: That feeling is also inexpressible.🔽It is without syllables.

original: mtshan ma dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: mtshan ma dang bral ba'o //
translated: It is free from signs.

original: tshor ba skyes te 'gags nas skad cig ma gzhan gyi gnas la 'du shes skye ste /
analyzed: tshor ba skyes te 'gags nas skad cig ma gzhan gyi gnas la 'du shes skye ste /
translated: When feeling has arisen and ceased, perception arises in the next moment.

original: me lce 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro ba bzhin du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: me lce 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro ba bzhin du shes par bya'o //
translated: It should be understood as being like the light of a blazing fire.

original: de'ang 'du shes nas 'gags pa'i bar du ste /
analyzed: de'ang 'du shes nas 'gags pa'i bar du ste /
translated: Moreover, it is from the time of perception until it has ceased.

original: skad cig ma gnyis pa'i gnas la 'du byed rnams skye ste /
analyzed: skad cig ma gnyis pa'i gnas la 'du byed rnams skye ste /
translated: When two moments have passed, formations arise.

original: gang chung ngu dang / tshad med pa dang / gang ring ba dang / gang nye ba'i 'od 'phro ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
analyzed: gang chung ngu dang / tshad med pa dang / gang ring ba dang / gang nye ba'i 'od 'phro ba bzhin du rab tu shes te /
translated: They should be understood as being like the light of a small, immeasurable, distant, or nearby fire.

original: 'du byed rnams skyes pa nas 'gags pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams skyes pa nas 'gags pa'i bar du'o //
translated: They arise from formations and cease.

original: skad cig ma gzhan la rnam par shes pa skye ste /
analyzed: skad cig ma gzhan la rnam par shes pa skye ste /
translated: Consciousness arises in the next moment.

original: ji ltar 'od 'phro ba'i phung po'i skye ba dang 'jig pa bzhin du rab tu shes te /
analyzed: ji ltar 'od 'phro ba'i phung po'i skye ba dang 'jig pa bzhin du rab tu shes te /
translated: It should be understood as being like the arising and disintegration of a mass of light.

original: rnam par shes pa de'ang brjod du med pa /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa de'ang brjod du med pa /
translated: That consciousness is inexpressible.

original: yi ge med par gnas pa /
analyzed: yi ge med par gnas pa /
translated: It abides without syllables.

original: skad cig gis 'jig pa ste /
analyzed: skad cig gis 'jig pa ste /
translated: It disintegrates in an instant.

original: nam mkha' la brtag pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' la brtag pa lta bu'o //
translated: It is like space.

original: de la me'i bar gyi nam mkha' de'ang rdzas med pa /
analyzed: de la me'i bar gyi nam mkha' de'ang rdzas med pa /
translated: The space between the fire and the sun is not a substance.

original: brjod du med pa /
analyzed: brjod du med pa /
translated: It is inexpressible.

original: yi ge med pa'o //
analyzed: yi ge med pa'o //
translated: It is without syllables.

original: gal te 'od 'phro ba'i phung po gang skyes nas 'bar ba dang / 'gag pa mthong ba thams cad kyang nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: gal te 'od 'phro ba'i phung po gang skyes nas 'bar ba dang / 'gag pa mthong ba thams cad kyang nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: If one sees the arising of a mass of light, its blazing, and its cessation, all of that is characterized by space.

original: brjod du med pa /
analyzed: brjod du med pa /
translated: It is inexpressible.

original: dngos po med pa ste /
analyzed: dngos po med pa ste /
translated: It is insubstantial.

original: 'od 'phro ba gcig kyang rkyen med pa /
analyzed: 'od 'phro ba gcig kyang rkyen med pa /
translated: A single light is without conditions.

original: grangs med pa'o //
analyzed: grangs med pa'o //
translated: It is beyond number.

original: chos 'di dag thams cad skye zhing 'gag pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang / nam mkha' @333b la brtag pa lta bu dang / brjod du med pa dang / dngos po med par brtag cing bzod pa bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: chos 'di dag thams cad skye zhing 'gag pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la skye ba dang / 'gag pa dang / nam mkha' @333b la brtag pa lta bu dang / brjod du med pa dang / dngos po med par brtag cing bzod pa bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Just as all these phenomena arise and cease, in the same way, the bodhisattva should contemplate the arising and cessation of the five sense pleasures, which are like space, and should cultivate acceptance by contemplating them as inexpressible and insubstantial.

original: don 'di dag ni /
analyzed: don 'di dag ni /
translated: These topics

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /
translated: were taught by the Blessed One.

original: de la 'di skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de la 'di skad ces bya'o //
translated: This is what he said:

original: gzugs ni me yi phung po 'dra //
analyzed: gzugs ni me yi phung po 'dra //
translated: “Form is like a mass of fire.

original: 'dod pa yang dag nyid mthong nas //
analyzed: 'dod pa yang dag nyid mthong nas //
translated: When sense pleasures are seen correctly,

original: mig gi rnam shes 'dus ma byas //
analyzed: mig gi rnam shes 'dus ma byas //
translated: the eye consciousness is unconditioned.

original: mig ni 'od 'phro 'dra bar shes //
analyzed: mig ni 'od 'phro 'dra bar shes //
translated: The eye is known to be like a shining light.

original: gnyis ka rdzas dang bral ba ste //
analyzed: gnyis ka rdzas dang bral ba ste //
translated: Both are devoid of substance,🔽inexpressible, and without syllables.

original: brjod du med cing yi ge med; ;'od 'phro smig rgyu 'dra ba ste //
analyzed: brjod du med cing yi ge med; ;'od 'phro smig rgyu 'dra ba ste //
translated: The light is like a mirage,

original: rnam par shes pa sgyu ma 'dra //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa sgyu ma 'dra //
translated: and consciousness is like an illusion.

original: myur du skye zhing 'jig pa yang //
analyzed: myur du skye zhing 'jig pa yang //
translated: Quickly arising and disintegrating,

original: gnyis ka dngos po med pa ste //
analyzed: gnyis ka dngos po med pa ste //
translated: both are non-entities.

original: skad cig gnyis par 'od 'phro yi //
analyzed: skad cig gnyis par 'od 'phro yi //
translated: In the second moment, the light

original: dro ba tha dad shes pa med; ;skyes nas skad cig 'jig pa yi //
analyzed: dro ba tha dad shes pa med; ;skyes nas skad cig 'jig pa yi //
translated: is not known to be different from the heat.

original: tshor ba chu yi chu bur 'dra //
analyzed: tshor ba chu yi chu bur 'dra //
translated: Feeling is like a water bubble,🔽arising and disintegrating in an instant.

original: 'du shes de yang me lce ltar //
analyzed: 'du shes de yang me lce ltar //
translated: Perception is like a flame,

original: rab tu shes te mtshan nyid med //
analyzed: rab tu shes te mtshan nyid med //
translated: understood to be without characteristics.

original: 'du shes dang ni 'du byed rnams //
analyzed: 'du shes dang ni 'du byed rnams //
translated: Perception and formations

original: skad cig gnyis la 'gog pa'o //
analyzed: skad cig gnyis la 'gog pa'o //
translated: cease in two moments.

original: tshad med dag dang chung du yang //
analyzed: tshad med dag dang chung du yang //
translated: The immeasurable and the small

original: 'od 'phro'i phung po 'dra bar shes //
analyzed: 'od 'phro'i phung po 'dra bar shes //
translated: are known to be like a mass of light.

original: 'du byed rnams ni 'gog pa ltar //
analyzed: 'du byed rnams ni 'gog pa ltar //
translated: Just as formations cease,

original: de ltar rnam shes rjes su 'gro /
analyzed: de ltar rnam shes rjes su 'gro /
translated: so consciousness follows.

original: 'gags nas kyang ni yang skye ste //
analyzed: 'gags nas kyang ni yang skye ste //
translated: Having ceased, it arises again,

original: 'od 'phro phung po 'dra bar shes //
analyzed: 'od 'phro phung po 'dra bar shes //
translated: known to be like a mass of light.

original: de ltar 'od 'phro rdzas med de //
analyzed: de ltar 'od 'phro rdzas med de //
translated: In this way, light radiates without substance,

original: gzugs rnams mthong ba sgyu ma bzhin //
analyzed: gzugs rnams mthong ba sgyu ma bzhin //
translated: And forms are seen like illusions.

original: myur zhing g-yo ba med bzhin du //
analyzed: myur zhing g-yo ba med bzhin du //
translated: Swift and moving, yet without movement,

original: phung po lnga rnams rjes su 'jug /
analyzed: phung po lnga rnams rjes su 'jug /
translated: The five aggregates follow after.🔽All that moves through space

original: nam mkha' la ni rgyu ba kun; ;me yi phung po 'bar ba 'dra //
analyzed: nam mkha' la ni rgyu ba kun; ;me yi phung po 'bar ba 'dra //
translated: Is like a blazing mass of fire.

original: rdzas yod ma yin brjod med de //
analyzed: rdzas yod ma yin brjod med de //
translated: Not substantially existent, inexpressible,

original: de dag thams cad dngos po med //
analyzed: de dag thams cad dngos po med //
translated: All of them are unreal.

original: de ltar 'dod pa'i len pa yang //
analyzed: de ltar 'dod pa'i len pa yang //
translated: In this way, the appropriation of desire

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la dga'//
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la dga'//
translated: Takes delight in the five sense objects.

original: skad cig 'jig @334a *//🔽pa'i rgyun dag kyang //
analyzed: skad cig 'jig @334a *// pa'i rgyun dag kyang //
translated: Momentary and perishable,

original: thams cad stong pa dngos po med //
analyzed: thams cad stong pa dngos po med //
translated: All are empty and unreal.

original: byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa //
analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa //
translated: The fearless bodhisattvas,

original: de ltar 'dod pa rnams brtags nas //
analyzed: de ltar 'dod pa rnams brtags nas //
translated: Having examined desire in this way,

original: 'dod sems yongs su zad byed cing //
analyzed: 'dod sems yongs su zad byed cing //
translated: Completely eliminate desirous thoughts

original: tshul bzhin du ni bzod pa sgom //
analyzed: tshul bzhin du ni bzod pa sgom //
translated: And cultivate patience in the proper way.

original: 'dod pa rnams ni me 'dra ste //
analyzed: 'dod pa rnams ni me 'dra ste //
translated: Desires are like fire,

original: ro myang bya ba'i mi rigs ston //
analyzed: ro myang bya ba'i mi rigs ston //
translated: Teaching the impropriety of savoring tastes.

original: sgyu ma smig rgyu tshul gyis ni //
analyzed: sgyu ma smig rgyu tshul gyis ni //
translated: Like illusions and mirages,

original: tshor ba chu yi chu bur 'dra //
analyzed: tshor ba chu yi chu bur 'dra //
translated: Feelings are like water bubbles.

original: gang gis 'dod pa shes byed pa'i //
analyzed: gang gis 'dod pa shes byed pa'i //
translated: The consciousness that knows desire

original: rnam par shes pa sgyu ma 'dra //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa sgyu ma 'dra //
translated: is like an illusion.

original: thams cad nam mkha' 'dra bar yang //
analyzed: thams cad nam mkha' 'dra bar yang //
translated: All is like space.

original: de ltar bzod pa rnam par sgom //
analyzed: de ltar bzod pa rnam par sgom //
translated: Thus one cultivates patience.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: “Son of noble family,

original: de la lta ba'i len pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la lta ba'i len pa gang zhe na /
translated: what is the appropriation of views?

original: rigs kyi bu; gang phung po lnga la rtag par lta ba ste /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu; gang phung po lnga la rtag par lta ba ste /
translated: Son of noble family, it is the view of permanence with regard to the five aggregates.

original: gnas su snyems pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu rtog pa dang / gti mug gis rnam par bsgrubs pas gzugs la rnam par rtog /
analyzed: gnas su snyems pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu rtog pa dang / gti mug gis rnam par bsgrubs pas gzugs la rnam par rtog /
translated: Due to the conceit of a dwelling, the imagination of what is not real, and the establishment of delusion, one conceptualizes form,

original: gzugs la mngon par chags /
analyzed: gzugs la mngon par chags /
translated: one becomes attached to form,

original: gzugs kyi ro myang bar byed /
analyzed: gzugs kyi ro myang bar byed /
translated: one savors the taste of form,

original: bde ba dang sdug bsngal rlom zhing snyems so //🔽tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la'ang rtog pa nas snyems pa'i bar 'di ni /
analyzed: bde ba dang sdug bsngal rlom zhing snyems so // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la'ang rtog pa nas snyems pa'i bar 'di ni /
translated: and one conceives of and conceives oneself to be in a state of pleasure and pain.

original: rtag par lta ba zhes bya'o //
analyzed: rtag par lta ba zhes bya'o //
translated: Conceptualizing and conceiving of feeling, perception, formation, and consciousness is called the view of permanence.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: de la chad par lta ba ni /
analyzed: de la chad par lta ba ni /
translated: what is the view of annihilation?

original: gang legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa rnams kyi rgyu dang / 'bras bu dang / rkyen chud gson pa ste /
analyzed: gang legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa rnams kyi rgyu dang / 'bras bu dang / rkyen chud gson pa ste /
translated: It is the loss of the causes, results, and conditions of good and bad actions.

original: mdor na / gang cung zad 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa rnams kyi rgyu la dmigs pa'i las @334b dang / bya ba dang / 'bras bu dang / spyod pa khong du chud pa snyems par 'gyur ba 'di ni /
analyzed: mdor na / gang cung zad 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa rnams kyi rgyu la dmigs pa'i las @334b dang / bya ba dang / 'bras bu dang / spyod pa khong du chud pa snyems par 'gyur ba 'di ni /
translated: In brief, it is the loss of the understanding of the causes, actions, results, and conduct of all that is mundane and supramundane, tainted and untainted.

original: chad par lta ba ste /
analyzed: chad par lta ba ste /
translated: It is the view of annihilation.

original: lta bar song ba drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi bar dag kyang ngo //
analyzed: lta bar song ba drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi bar dag kyang ngo //
translated: It is the sixty-two views.

original: gang yang 'jig rten gyi dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / lta ba thams cad la gnas pa'i rtog pa skad cig mas klas pa /
analyzed: gang yang 'jig rten gyi dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / lta ba thams cad la gnas pa'i rtog pa skad cig mas klas pa /
translated: It is the understanding of the abode that is not mixed with any of the entities that are measured by the momentary conceptual thoughts that abide in all mundane, supramundane, tainted, untainted, and view-based states.

original: skad cig mas 'jal ba'i dngos po thams cad dang ma 'dres pa /
analyzed: skad cig mas 'jal ba'i dngos po thams cad dang ma 'dres pa /
translated: It is the understanding of the abode that is not mixed with any of the entities that are measured by the momentary.

original: gnas khong du chud pa ste /
analyzed: gnas khong du chud pa ste /
translated: It is the understanding of the abode.

original: gang gnas med pa de ni /
analyzed: gang gnas med pa de ni /
translated: It is the abode that is not an abode.

original: dngos po med pa'o //
analyzed: dngos po med pa'o //
translated: It is not a thing.

original: de mi 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: de mi 'gro ba'o //
translated: It does not go.

original: gang mi 'gro ba de kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin /
analyzed: gang mi 'gro ba de kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin /
translated: That which does not go is not defiled,

original: rnam par byang ba ma yin /
analyzed: rnam par byang ba ma yin /
translated: is not purified,

original: 'byung ba ma yin /
analyzed: 'byung ba ma yin /
translated: does not arise,

original: 'jug pa ma yin no //🔽gang 'byung ba ma yin /
analyzed: 'jug pa ma yin no // gang 'byung ba ma yin /
translated: and does not cease.

original: 'jug pa ma yin pa de rdzas med pa'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa ma yin pa de rdzas med pa'o //
translated: That which does not arise and does not cease is not a substance.

original: snang ba med pa'o //
analyzed: snang ba med pa'o //
translated: It is not an appearance.

original: rtog pa med pa'o //🔽'gro ba med pa'o //
analyzed: rtog pa med pa'o // 'gro ba med pa'o //
translated: It is not a concept.🔽It does not go.

original: 'ong ba med pa'o //
analyzed: 'ong ba med pa'o //
translated: It does not come.

original: dus gsum thams cad la skad cig /
analyzed: dus gsum thams cad la skad cig /
translated: All three times are momentary.

original: skad cig tu rtog pa'o //
analyzed: skad cig tu rtog pa'o //
translated: They are to be understood as momentary.

original: spyod pa med pa'o //
analyzed: spyod pa med pa'o //
translated: It is not a practice.

original: stong pa'o // brjod du med pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa'o // brjod du med pa'o //
translated: It is empty. It is inexpressible.

original: ji ltar rdzas kyi mtshan nyid kyis dus gsum thams cad kyi skad cig ma dang / shin tu skad cig mas stong pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: ji ltar rdzas kyi mtshan nyid kyis dus gsum thams cad kyi skad cig ma dang / shin tu skad cig mas stong pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu /
translated: Just as all three times are empty of substance and of the characteristics of substance, son of noble family,

original: gang la la 'phags pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / lta ba kun nas bskor ba dang / rnam par mi rtog pa dang / kun tu rtog pa dang / nye bar rtog pa dang /
analyzed: gang la la 'phags pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / lta ba kun nas bskor ba dang / rnam par mi rtog pa dang / kun tu rtog pa dang / nye bar rtog pa dang /
translated: Whatever is noble or not noble, worldly or transcendent, or enmeshed in views, nonconceptual, conceptual, or speculative,

original: rgyu dang / skye ba dang / lus dang / snod dang / lta ba snyems pa thams cad skad cig ma ste /
analyzed: rgyu dang / skye ba dang / lus dang / snod dang / lta ba snyems pa thams cad skad cig ma ste /
translated: whether it is a cause, origin, body, vessel, or all the conceited views, is momentary.

original: dus @335a *// gsum gyi lta ba shin tu stong pa'o //
analyzed: dus @335a *// gsum gyi lta ba shin tu stong pa'o //
translated: The views of the three times are utterly empty.

original: brjod du med pa'o //
analyzed: brjod du med pa'o //
translated: They are inexpressible.

original: 'dul bar yang dag par 'dul ba ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'dul bar yang dag par 'dul ba ma yin pa'o //
translated: They are not truly disciplined or undisciplined.

original: 'du ba ma yin par yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'du ba ma yin par yang ma yin no //
translated: They are not assembled or not assembled.

original: tshul khrims dang / len pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dga' ba dang / le lo yang dag par 'dul ba ma yin no //
analyzed: tshul khrims dang / len pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dga' ba dang / le lo yang dag par 'dul ba ma yin no //
translated: They are not the discipline of morality, livelihood, effort, joy, or laziness.

original: chags pa sel ba dang / shes rab ma yin no //
analyzed: chags pa sel ba dang / shes rab ma yin no //
translated: They are not the elimination of attachment or wisdom.

original: 'chal ba'i shes rab ma yin no //
analyzed: 'chal ba'i shes rab ma yin no //
translated: They are not faulty wisdom.

original: ltung ba ma yin no //
analyzed: ltung ba ma yin no //
translated: They are not downfalls.

original: ltung ba med pa dang / g-yo ba yang dag par 'du ba ma yin no //
analyzed: ltung ba med pa dang / g-yo ba yang dag par 'du ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not a downfall.

original: thob pa ma yin no //
analyzed: thob pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not a gain.

original: thob pa med pa dang / g-yo ba ma yin no //
analyzed: thob pa med pa dang / g-yo ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not a non-gain.

original: 'jig rten gyi dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa dang / g-yo ba yang dag par 'du ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa dang / g-yo ba yang dag par 'du ba ma yin no //
translated: It is not a worldly or transcendent analysis.

original: gnas la rnam par rtog pa'i lam ma yin no //
analyzed: gnas la rnam par rtog pa'i lam ma yin no //
translated: It is not a path of conceptual thought.

original: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams dang / gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dang / phung po ni /
analyzed: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams dang / gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dang / phung po ni /
translated: The five sense pleasures, the form and formless realms, and the aggregates

original: blang ba med pa mang po lta bu'i mtshan nyid bsdu ba'i mtshan ma yin no //
analyzed: blang ba med pa mang po lta bu'i mtshan nyid bsdu ba'i mtshan ma yin no //
translated: are the signs of the collection of the characteristics of the many that are not to be taken up.

original: phung po dang khams dang skye mched la lta ba dang / g-yo ba yang dag par 'du ba ma yin no //
analyzed: phung po dang khams dang skye mched la lta ba dang / g-yo ba yang dag par 'du ba ma yin no //
translated: The view of the aggregates, elements, and sense bases is not a gathering of movements.

original: lta ba thams cad ni /
analyzed: lta ba thams cad ni /
translated: All views

original: gnyis su med pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis su med pa'o //
translated: are nondual.

original: stong pa'o // rdzas med pa'o //
analyzed: stong pa'o // rdzas med pa'o //
translated: They are empty. They are insubstantial.

original: brjod du med pa'o //
analyzed: brjod du med pa'o //
translated: They are inexpressible.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: They are as follows:

original: dper na / me long gi dkyil 'khor la bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba'ang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor de phung pos bskyed pa ma yin no //
analyzed: dper na / me long gi dkyil 'khor la bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba'ang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor de phung pos bskyed pa ma yin no //
translated: For example, the reflection of a face in a round mirror appears, but the reflection of the face is not produced by the aggregates,

original: khams kyis bskyed pa ma yin /
analyzed: khams kyis bskyed pa ma yin /
translated: not produced by the elements,

original: skye mched kyis bskyed pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: skye mched kyis bskyed pa ma yin gyi /
translated: and not produced by the sense sources.

original: tshul @335b gcig ste /
analyzed: tshul @335b gcig ste /
translated: It is the same method.

original: yi ge med cing brjod du med pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: yi ge med cing brjod du med pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu /
translated: Just as it is without syllables and inexpressible, noble son,

original: 'phags pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa gang yang rung ste /
analyzed: 'phags pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa gang yang rung ste /
translated: whether it is of an ārya or not an ārya, or whether it is mundane or supramundane,

original: de dag thams cad ni /
analyzed: de dag thams cad ni /
translated: all of them

original: phung pos bskyed pa ma yin /🔽khams kyis bskyed pa ma yin /
analyzed: phung pos bskyed pa ma yin / khams kyis bskyed pa ma yin /
translated: are not produced by the aggregates,🔽not produced by the elements,

original: skye mched kyis bskyed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: skye mched kyis bskyed pa ma yin te /
translated: and not produced by the sense sources.

original: lta ba thams cad ni /
analyzed: lta ba thams cad ni /
translated: All views

original: brjod du med cing yi ge med pa'o //
analyzed: brjod du med cing yi ge med pa'o //
translated: are inexpressible and without syllables.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Noble son,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this.

original: dper na / nyi ma'i rkyen gyis smig rgyu ba snang bar 'gyur ba'ang smig rgyu ba phung po la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: dper na / nyi ma'i rkyen gyis smig rgyu ba snang bar 'gyur ba'ang smig rgyu ba phung po la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: For example, the mirage that appears due to the conditions of the sun is not located in the aggregates of the mirage,

original: khams la gnas pa ma yin /
analyzed: khams la gnas pa ma yin /
translated: It does not abide in the elements.🔽It does not abide in the sense sources.

original: skye mched la gnas pa ma yin pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: skye mched la gnas pa ma yin pa de bzhin du rigs kyi bu /
translated: In the same way, son of noble family,

original: 'phags pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lta ba gang yang rung ste /
analyzed: 'phags pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa dang / 'jig rten gyi dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lta ba gang yang rung ste /
translated: whether it is an ārya view, a non-ārya view, a mundane view, or a supramundane view,

original: len pa dang bcas pa gti mug gis rnam par bsgrubs pa'i rkyen gyis brjod du med pa /
analyzed: len pa dang bcas pa gti mug gis rnam par bsgrubs pa'i rkyen gyis brjod du med pa /
translated: it is taken up and established by delusion, and is inexpressible due to conditions.

original: yi ge med pa'o //
analyzed: yi ge med pa'o //
translated: It is without letters.

original: don 'di dag ni /
analyzed: don 'di dag ni /
translated: These meanings

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs te /
translated: were spoken by the Blessed One.

original: de la 'di skad ces bya'o //
analyzed: de la 'di skad ces bya'o //
translated: Regarding that, this is said:

original: rkyen gyis rnams ni rkyen bcu ste //
analyzed: rkyen gyis rnams ni rkyen bcu ste //
translated: The conditions are ten conditions,

original: lta ba skyed pa mkhas pa yin //
analyzed: lta ba skyed pa mkhas pa yin //
translated: and the wise one generates the view.

original: chos rnams stong par mi shes te //
analyzed: chos rnams stong par mi shes te //
translated: Not knowing phenomena to be empty,

original: log par lta ba'i spyod yul la //
analyzed: log par lta ba'i spyod yul la //
translated: in the domain of wrong views,

original: lta ba dag ni brjod med cing //
analyzed: lta ba dag ni brjod med cing //
translated: the views are inexpressible

original: yi ge yod pa ma yin pas //
analyzed: yi ge yod pa ma yin pas //
translated: and do not exist as letters.

original: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dag na //
analyzed: dus gsum mnyam pa nyid dag na //
translated: In the equality of the three times,

original: lta ba'i gzugs kyi lta ma yin //
analyzed: lta ba'i gzugs kyi lta ma yin //
translated: the view is not a form to be seen.

original: bcu gsum rkyen la rag las pa //
analyzed: bcu gsum rkyen la rag las pa //
translated: The thirteen are dependent on conditions,

original: chos nyid tha dad ma yin te //
analyzed: chos nyid tha dad ma yin te //
translated: and the nature of phenomena is not different.

original: mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal med la //
analyzed: mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal med la //
translated: And non-contradiction with equality.

original: lta ba skyed @336a *//
analyzed: lta ba skyed @336a *//
translated: They generate views

original: cing rtog par byed //
analyzed: cing rtog par byed //
translated: And conceptualize.

original: lta ba'i len pa smig rgyu 'dra //
analyzed: lta ba'i len pa smig rgyu 'dra //
translated: The grasping of views is like a mirage,

original: tha dad ma yin yi ge med //
analyzed: tha dad ma yin yi ge med //
translated: Not different, without letters.

original: byis pa dka' ba byed pa dag /
analyzed: byis pa dka' ba byed pa dag /
translated: The childish ones create difficulties,

original: kun tu rtog pa byin gyis rlob //
analyzed: kun tu rtog pa byin gyis rlob //
translated: Blessing their own conceptualization.

original: rkyen gyi rnam pa bcu gsum mnyam //
analyzed: rkyen gyi rnam pa bcu gsum mnyam //
translated: The thirteen aspects of conditions are equal,

original: chad med rtag pa med pa yi //🔽rnam par thar gsum rnam bsgoms pas //
analyzed: chad med rtag pa med pa yi // rnam par thar gsum rnam bsgoms pas //
translated: Without annihilation, without permanence.

original: mkhas pa 'gal bar mi byed do //
analyzed: mkhas pa 'gal bar mi byed do //
translated: The wise ones do not contradict🔽The cultivation of the three doors of liberation.

original: lta ba thams cad rgyu ba med //
analyzed: lta ba thams cad rgyu ba med //
translated: All views are without movement,

original: mtshan ma med pas bskyed pa ste //
analyzed: mtshan ma med pas bskyed pa ste //
translated: Generated by the absence of characteristics.

original: ji ltar gzugs rnams me long la //
analyzed: ji ltar gzugs rnams me long la //
translated: Just as forms in a mirror,

original: de ltar chos kyi chos nyid do //
analyzed: de ltar chos kyi chos nyid do //
translated: So is the dharmatā of phenomena.

original: chos rnams thams cad tshul gcig ste //
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad tshul gcig ste //
translated: All phenomena are of one mode,

original: dben pa stong pa nyid la gnas; ;mkhas pa lta ba thams cad kyi //
analyzed: dben pa stong pa nyid la gnas; ;mkhas pa lta ba thams cad kyi //
translated: Abiding in emptiness, in isolation.

original: kun nas ldang ba mi rtog go //
analyzed: kun nas ldang ba mi rtog go //
translated: The wise ones do not conceptualize🔽The complete arising of all views.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: de la tshul khrims kyi len pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la tshul khrims kyi len pa gang zhe na /
translated: what is the grasping of discipline?

original: gang cung zad tshul khrims dang / dka' thub dang / brtul zhugs dang / tshangs par spyod pa snyems shing rnam par dmigs te /
analyzed: gang cung zad tshul khrims dang / dka' thub dang / brtul zhugs dang / tshangs par spyod pa snyems shing rnam par dmigs te /
translated: Whatever morality, austerity, discipline, or pure conduct they may be conceited about and observe,

original: gnas la mngon par chags pa de dag thams cad ni /
analyzed: gnas la mngon par chags pa de dag thams cad ni /
translated: they all abide in attachment to a view.

original: lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las rnam par gzhig pa'i don gyi phyir /
analyzed: lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las rnam par gzhig pa'i don gyi phyir /
translated: In order to destroy the actions of body, speech, and mind,

original: 'khor ba las bsgral ba'i don gyi phyir /
analyzed: 'khor ba las bsgral ba'i don gyi phyir /
translated: in order to liberate them from saṃsāra,🔽in order to bring them out of the three realms,🔽they apply themselves to the practice of harming the body,

original: khams gsum las 'byung ba'i don gyi phyir de dang der lus la gnod pa dang ldan pa'i rjes su sbyor ba dang / sdom pa dang / sdom pa ma yin pa la sbyor ba 'di ni /
analyzed: khams gsum las 'byung ba'i don gyi phyir de dang der lus la gnod pa dang ldan pa'i rjes su sbyor ba dang / sdom pa dang / sdom pa ma yin pa la sbyor ba 'di ni /
translated: to the practice of vows and non-vows,

original: tshul khrims kyi len pa'o //
analyzed: tshul khrims kyi len pa'o //
translated: and to the practice of taking on morality.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: “Son of noble family,

original: de la gang lus la gnod pa dang ldan pa la 'jug pa dag ni /
analyzed: de la gang lus la gnod pa dang ldan pa la 'jug pa dag ni /
translated: those who engage in harming the body

original: tshor ba @336b gsum 'dris par byed pa /
analyzed: tshor ba @336b gsum 'dris par byed pa /
translated: are familiar with the three types of sensations,

original: 'phags pa ma yin pa /
analyzed: 'phags pa ma yin pa /
translated: are not noble,🔽and are endowed with what is not the true meaning.

original: don ma yin pa dang ldan pa 'di nyid bden gyi /
analyzed: don ma yin pa dang ldan pa 'di nyid bden gyi /
translated: They think, ‘This alone is true;

original: gzhan ni / gti mug go snyam pa ni /
analyzed: gzhan ni / gti mug go snyam pa ni /
translated: the rest is delusion.’

original: lus kyi tshul khrims snyems pa'o //
analyzed: lus kyi tshul khrims snyems pa'o //
translated: The morality of the body is arrogance.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /🔽lus 'di ni /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / lus 'di ni /
translated: Why is that?🔽This body

original: g-yo ba med pa /
analyzed: g-yo ba med pa /
translated: is without movement,

original: 'gyur ba med pa /
analyzed: 'gyur ba med pa /
translated: without change,

original: nyon mongs pa thams cad dang ma 'dres pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa thams cad dang ma 'dres pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not mixed with any of the afflictions.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: Son of noble family,

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: it is like this:

original: dper na / chu klung gangg'a'i bye ma ni /
analyzed: dper na / chu klung gangg'a'i bye ma ni /
translated: The sand of the Ganges River

original: g-yo ba med cing 'gyur ba med pa ste /
analyzed: g-yo ba med cing 'gyur ba med pa ste /
translated: is without movement and without change,

original: 'on kyang rlung gi rang bzhin gyis 'dril ba de bzhin du chen po bzhi las gyur ba'i lus kyang g-yo ba med cing 'gyur ba med pa ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang rlung gi rang bzhin gyis 'dril ba de bzhin du chen po bzhi las gyur ba'i lus kyang g-yo ba med cing 'gyur ba med pa ste /
translated: but by the nature of the wind it is gathered. In the same way, the body that is made from the four great elements is without movement and without change,

original: 'on kyang glo bur gyi reg pa'i rkyen nye bar len pa dang bcas pa ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang glo bur gyi reg pa'i rkyen nye bar len pa dang bcas pa ste /
translated: but by the condition of the appropriation of adventitious contact,

original: lus de la gnod pa dang 'brel ba sna tshogs la 'di lta ste /
analyzed: lus de la gnod pa dang 'brel ba sna tshogs la 'di lta ste /
translated: it is connected with various harms to the body, such as

original: zhags pa 'thub pa dgu bcu rtsa lnga'i sems can la sogs pa mchog dam par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhags pa 'thub pa dgu bcu rtsa lnga'i sems can la sogs pa mchog dam par 'gyur ro //
translated: the ninety-five fetters of sentient beings and so forth.

original: gang dus gsum gyi lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi 'du byed la snyems pa dang / gang tshul gcig pa mnyam pa nyid mi shes shing lus dang / ngag dang / yid sdom pa'i ngal ba mi skyed pa 'di'ang zag pa dang bcas shing nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal bzod pa 'khrug par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang dus gsum gyi lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi 'du byed la snyems pa dang / gang tshul gcig pa mnyam pa nyid mi shes shing lus dang / ngag dang / yid sdom pa'i ngal ba mi skyed pa 'di'ang zag pa dang bcas shing nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal bzod pa 'khrug par byed pa'o //
translated: It is also the agitation of the suffering of conditioned existence, which is defiled and subject to karma, when one does not know the sameness of the one principle, and does not undertake the effort to restrain body, speech, and mind.

original: rigs kyi bu /
analyzed: rigs kyi bu /
translated: “Son of noble family,

original: de la tshul gcig pa mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa sgom pa gang zhe na /
analyzed: de la tshul gcig pa mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa sgom pa gang zhe na /
translated: what is the cultivation of the acceptance of the sameness of the one principle?

original: gang sdom pa gsum rdul tsam yang mi skyed pa 'di ni /🔽tshul gcig pa mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa sgom pa'o //
analyzed: gang sdom pa gsum rdul tsam yang mi skyed pa 'di ni / tshul gcig pa mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa sgom pa'o //
translated: It is not to give rise to even an atom of the three vows.

original: gang 'di la nye bar len @337a *//
analyzed: gang 'di la nye bar len @337a *//
translated: This is the cultivation of the acceptance of the sameness of the one principle.

original: pa dang bcas pa'i sdom pa gsum gyi 'du shes snyems pa 'di'ang zag pa dang bcas shing nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal bzod pa 'khrug par byed pa'o //
analyzed: pa dang bcas pa'i sdom pa gsum gyi 'du shes snyems pa 'di'ang zag pa dang bcas shing nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal bzod pa 'khrug par byed pa'o //
translated: It is also the agitation of the suffering of conditioned existence, which is defiled and subject to karma, when one conceives of the three vows as being subject to appropriation.

original: gang 'di la dus gsum ro gcig cing tha mi dad pa dang / sdom pa gsum gyi skyed pa dang / rgyu ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i 'du byed rnams la rnam par rtog pa 'di ni /🔽tshul gcig pa mnyam pa nyid sgom pa'o //
analyzed: gang 'di la dus gsum ro gcig cing tha mi dad pa dang / sdom pa gsum gyi skyed pa dang / rgyu ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i 'du byed rnams la rnam par rtog pa 'di ni / tshul gcig pa mnyam pa nyid sgom pa'o //
translated: This is the meditation on the sameness of the single principle.

original: gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po mi gnyis pa'i gnas 'di dag la gnas su dmigs pa dang / dngos por dmigs pa dang / ye shes 'phel bar rtog pa dang / dus gsum yang dag par bsgrubs pa snyems pa 'di'ang zag pa dang bcas shing nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal bzod pa 'khrug par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po mi gnyis pa'i gnas 'di dag la gnas su dmigs pa dang / dngos por dmigs pa dang / ye shes 'phel bar rtog pa dang / dus gsum yang dag par bsgrubs pa snyems pa 'di'ang zag pa dang bcas shing nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal bzod pa 'khrug par byed pa'o //
translated: And this is the acceptance of the suffering of conditioned states, which is defiled and accompanied by appropriation, of those who, dwelling in these six perfections which are the state of non-duality, imagine that they are dwelling in the objective supports of the bodhisattva, that they are dwelling in the objective supports of the perfections, that they are dwelling in the objective supports of the superknowledges, that they are dwelling in the objective supports of the emptiness, signless and wishless doors of liberation, that they are dwelling in the objective supports of the
